22a2(1): tsha ba'i dus kyi skya ba dang tshungs/ dper na rab tu tshas la yang ba byung ba/ nyi ma'i 'od kyis phog pa na chu'i 'ba' rlabs 'dra bas/ bya dang ri dgas la sogs pa kun skom gyis phongs brgyang ring po nas mthong ste/ chur yang dag
22a3(1): par shes pa skyes so// 'du shes kyang de bzhin te ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan ma myed pas/ song ba sgyu ma se myi bden pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o// shes rab can ngo bo nyid yod pas mthong na so so tha dad pa dang tshungs te/ mtshan
22a4(1): nyid dang mying thob par rung ngam/ thub pas shib tu btags ma/ dpe'i ri bong gi rA dang mo sham gyi bu la sogs pa dang tshungs so// mying sgyu ma yod du zad kyi thog ma nas bden pa'i don myed de/ rmyi lam gyi gzugs dang / 
22a5(1): chungs myi bden pa'i 'du shes kyis mthong bas sad pa dang / yod pa ma yin no// ma rig pa'i rmi lam na skyes pa dang bud myed dang / la sogs pa rdam+ba po'i gzugs mthong ba drang po'i tshor ba
22a6(1): grub na ga ni yang mthong ba myed do// dper na shing chur skyes dang tshungs so/ shun dpags dang 'dab ma btsal na dbus na snying po myed do// spyod pa yang de bzhin te/ lus kyi khams dang bral ma mtshan
22a7(1): nyid myed do// rnam par shes pa yang de dang tshungs te/ myig 'phrul gyi don sgyu ma myi bden pa'o// dpe' myig 'phrul gyi khan po dang / myig 'phrul khan gyi slob ma tshungs te/ rA shing la sogs pa la sgyu mar myi dang bgrang
22a8(1): dang ta dang rnam pa mang po/ thams cad myi myang gzugs mchog tshang bar rgyan pa la gron po sgyu ma la brkam pa tshol te/ snang ba'i shes rab ma yin no// rnam par shes pa yang de dang chungs te/ gud du gnas
22a9(1): gang 'khrug pa la dang par rnam par rtog go// ji 'ang 'an nus pa la rnam pa gnyis skyes so// de la bdag gi mngon par shes na kun sbyad te myed do// de lta bas na ngo bo byed de/ sgra ma'i don dang tshungs so// rdo rje
22a10(1): po yang dag par gshegs pa rtag par 'dug se// khor mor myi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bsam pas spyod pa dang / bzhugs pa spyod pa'i khams de mying yang dag pa dgegs pa'i mdzod do// dpe' na gA Sha rang drungs
22b1(1): zhig cing myed par myi rung ste/ mying mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams zhes bya'o// mying chos kyi khams zhes kyang bya'o// snga ma 'das pa dang / da rung ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kun kyang 'di bzhin du 'dren cing chad pas na/ yang dag par
22b2(1): shes pa 'jig rten du 'byung rung / 'jig rten du ma byung yang rung / ngo bo nyid 'di rtag par 'dug ste/ mying chos la gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o// mying 'jing g.yom pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya'o// rdo rje'i snying po ji lta bu'i 'jing g.yom pa
22b3(1): zhes bya phyis ngan pa yod do// mchog 'dis kun phral ba'i phyir ro// yang ting nge 'dzin 'dis phyis ngan pa yod do// mchog 'di gdon myi za bar btsal nus te/ gzhung de lta bas na mying rjid pa'i yom pa'o// la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di la
22b4(1): gnas pa yod na/ sems can thams cad la sems chags pa myed do// yang dag pa'i dbyings dang / mya ngan las pa rig te/ dpe' lcags tsha ba chu gtsang ba grang mo'i nang du bong ba dang tshungs so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rka
22b5(1): se/ blangs nas nye bar gnas te/ rtag par sems can la bsod nams byas nasabartson 'grus dang / snying rje chen po dang / pha logs su phyin pa rnams ma btang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs ma chad do// mur 'dug dang theg pa
22b6(1): gnyis kyi lam du myi 'gro ste/ ba glang stobs po che chen po dang / chungs/ ting / nge 'dzin gyi 'dam rdzab kyis myi bying sems ni rnam par shes pa'ikhams kyi ro la myi chags so// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
22b7(1): kyi sgo po la phyogs te/ khor mor ldog cing 'gyur ba myed do// mtha' yun gyi ye shes spyang nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lus su zhugs so/ yang dag par shegs pa'i legs pa'i rdzid rgya chen po mngon
22b8(1): par bye se/ drang po tshong ba grub nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor te/ shes rab kyi chos kyi kha dog mang po'i long bapyod byas te/ yang dag par shegs pa'i thub par zhugs nas ka mya ngan las 'das pa'i khams 'cho/ 
22b9(1): de khad kyis spyod pa spyad pas sa rgyad las 'das so// khams ska phyogs sbyangs te/ chos kyi srin la thug nas/ yang dag par shegs pa'i legs pa'i rdzid rgya chen po la long spyod pas/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi nang logs rig pa'i
22b10(1): sa la gnas te/ don sbyang ba myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind dang / thun las phyogs bcur khyab par 'grod kyang gnas phyi mo las ma g.yos te/ khor mor gsang ba'i rgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul la gnas shing 'dug go// gnas/ 
23a1(1): rgyu ge/ shes ba dang / grub pa dang / yid kyibus kyi sa tha ngang pa'i nga dbang ku ldan pa'i ni dper gong nga'i zla ba'i 'azugs rgyan kyis su kun sa khyab pa dang tshungs so// sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin te sprul tha/ 
23a2(1): lus kyis 'jig rten thams cad khyab par babs te/ sems can gyi sems myi mthun pas kun ji la dang pa bzhin du phan par byas nas/ song bar mthong ba myed kyi steng du gsang bas rgya dang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'a
23a3(1): bar byas so// ngo bo ci la dang pa bzhin du dka' ba'i phye zhing drangs nas / 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi rang dbang gi lha'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ma ni po brang la sogs te/ bde'i spring ba'i gnas kun dang / 
23a4(1): sa rnams kyi rigs dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi yon tan gyis dargya rang pa dang / da rung gi ma 'ongs par zad pa dang sbyar ba bzhin mthun par sron pa kun bshadasngags kyis gzungs kyi rgyus smanang
23a5(1): bzhag na/ lha'o mchog dang pho brang gi lha myi dang / lhan cig dang 'dug kyang mtho nga bar myi nus// yang dag par gshegs pas 'phrul pa srul pa dang / sa zin nas yang dag pa'i lus la 'dug sed namyi sA
23a6(1): ba yang de dang tshungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig le'ur bcad de gsungs pa dang / dbang po'i phung po srul 'dus bzhin khams kyi rkyen ni reg pa'i gnas/ gti mug sred pa'i las
23a7(1): kyis skyes/ bag chags mang pos bcings dgrol dka'/ sems dang sems kyi chos thams cad/ sems g.yos pas na myi bde rtag tshor dang rtog pas bkris grags te/ 'brug nang cig gis
23a8(1): cig thud bzhin / zhe sdang gdug pa de nas g.yos/ dpe' du me 'bar mched pa bzhin/ zhugs pa spyod pa thams cad kun// phung po'i chos rnams btang ba'i phyir// 'di la rtag tu nan tan rtogs/ 
23a9(1): sems cig de bzhin ma gyes na/ dpe' dun mkha'i song ba'i nang // shing myed pa ru grib yod bzhin/ rlung gi lam dang bya'i rjes/ de kun thams cad mthong bar dka'/ 'dus byas dang byed do chog/ 
23a10(1): gzugs dang gzugs ma yin gyi chos// de la yang dag shes mthong ba// de'i dga' ba yang de bzhin no// yang dag myi yo bden mtha' dang / sangs rgyas rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang / nang logs rig pa'i/ 
23b1(1): spyod do chog/ smra brjod kun gyi khams las 'das/ mya ngan 'das pa'i mying sangs rgyas// sangs rgyas mying mya ngan 'das// rnam rtog 'du shes kun dang bral/ ji lta bur na mthong bar 'gyur// ser/ 
23b2(1): go rdo ba bye mar bkram// rdo ba'i nang na ser ma mthong // shes rab can gyi bzo yis bzhus/ yang dag ser ni gdong snang ngo // gzugs thams cad ni bcad cing bgos// rdul phran la ni thug par byas
23b3(1): bzhi ba se blang po rnam pa bcas// cing ngas dang rang bzhin la/ sangs rgyas ngo bo mthong myi rung / sangs rgyas myed pa'ang ma yin no// thub pas yang dag zhes pa rtags/ mtshan pazang sum bcu phra gnyis ldan/ spyid sdug rnams
23b4(1): kyi don mang po// bkram zhing byas pa kun mngon snang // de lta bas na yang dag gshegs/ myed par yang dag ces bshad myi rigs/ ting nge 'dzin cig gi rkyen sangs rgyas dang / dge' rgyu dgel bya ye sangs rgyas/ 'jig rten
23b5(1): thams cad rgyal sangs rgyas// drang snyoms tshor ba'i sangs rgyas dang / de ltar sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga/ gzhan kun yang ni sbyang zhing nam dpang phrul na// sum bcu partsa gnyis rgyal ba'i mtshan// yang
23b6(1): dgashegs rjod ldan par yod// de ltar sangs rgyas myed ma yin/ thub pas rtags te mthong bar nus/ khams sum las su byung ste 'das/ grangs myed sangs rgyas kun gyi yul/ 
23b7(1): yang dag gshegs kyi dam pa'i khams// gtsang ma'i sangs rgyas bu yis gang // bsam gtan shes rab res kyis bsangs// sran thub ngo bo nyidakyang thub/ gsang bas rgya nad pa'i yul bgrod de/ sangs rgyas
23b8(1): legs pa'i rjing bas bsan// sang bas rgyan pa'i na gi byi// thams cad sangs rgyas dang yang 'dun/ skad cigazhig nas 'phags te 'das/ 'ong mo ting badzin nang yang rjong/ bcom ldan 'das mthub chen log
23b9(1): ldan ne ru ni drang bar mnos// mtshan bzang yon tan thams cad kyis// s+yad de phyi nang rgyan tu rgyand// kun na re sangs rgyas sprul pa'i sku/ gnas bden gnas nas gshegs zhes zer// sangs rgyas rtag par gas
23b10(1): rgyand bzhags// de'i yul du gzugs pas nang // yang dag gnas de drang por gnas// rkyen bzhin du ni gzugs mang skyes// zla ba bzhin du nam khang gnas// gzugs rnyan chu kun nang du snang // ma ni
24a1(1): mas// mas sa rnaM na na/ sang gshes pan 'gral// gzus dan gan pa'ang de na na// dpe dungs dang zus rgyasarnas/ tsan mas dadas na pa/ 
24a2(1): de snang rgya ba'i skyes nas// g+sa sus cu sngo byu 'o// dus dran chub pa'i nyid man/ dus dzis ma zhes bye nangs sas byas pas cad/ 'jis te byas pa ma yin no// yangangs
24a3(1): gshegs kyis rgyu nyid kyang / de'i 'bras bu nyid la rgya nang / 'jig rten dang ni mthun pa bzhin/ rnam pa mang po kun mngon snang / ting nge 'dzinang du bgrod cing ngolang / phyi dang nang du ma byas myed/ 
24a4(1): ri kun dang ni mam bye dang// grogs po dang ni gan gshes nyams/ sna 'i kun dang nyi bla dang / me long snang sa gzugs rnams dbyangs// de lta bu'i 'jig rten kun/ lus kyi nang du kun 'dus thob
24a5(1): gdu ga pa 'du bathod/ tong bye ci'i 'jug desu bzhi/ sangs rgyas nubs dang dang te/ na kyim chog tu 'dun/ 'jig rten sus kyang bya myi dus// yangs rgyas kyi
24a6(1): bus sprul te sprul/ long ba mun pa shes rab myed/ rgyug pas kyi bden rnam par rtog/ yod dang myed la 'dzin chags che/ nga dang nga ma yin lnga// ba bang thams cad zhig ces zer/ bar bar chung shas/ 
24a7(1): myed ces zer// de lta bu la sogs pa'i myi// rtag par gi lus la gnod// ji lta bu ru de nang du/ de kun thams cad mthong bas skyes// sangs rgyas khams sum khyab pa yin/ zhugs spyod kyi ni khan cen te
24a8(1): 'jig rten rtog pa dri za'i khang // gdon gyi las mang byas so mchog/ rmi lam nang gi gzugs dang tshungs// ri dgas skom pa chung tshol ltar // las kyi rnam pa mang po'i phyir/ zag pa rlung gis skyong pa bzhin/ 
24a9(1): sangs rgyas kyis ni thabs sdang la// shes dang mthong la rab dbang ste// dpe' ru len po bzo dang 'tshungs// sbyang zhing spyod pa bsrungs mkhas pas/ cig pu mchogatan pa bzhin/ 'jug nas 'dzin cing g.yom
24a10(1): bas skyod// yang dgashegs pa dam pa'i mchog/ song zhing myi g.yo mu mtha' myed// lha chags rnams kyi dbang las 'phags/ gtsang ma'i dbang po ci yang rig// thub pa spyod cing spyod pa de/ phra rab dam
24b1(1): ba grub sa gnas zhugs zhing / myong pa'on gyi thams cad/ snang zhing mngon pa sems nang gnas/ sangs rgyas nyid ni mcho klu dang / yod tha ma yin zhing skyed pa ma yin/ tshad kyis dpas kyang dus
24b2(1): tshor// deras kung kyang yos sus pa// dam pa'i migs sems drung // blan skyed pa'i khams yin no// shes kun te zugapa lang po byed// des 'dod yang dag shes pa mthog
24b3(1): ngan drug pa'i sems kun shig/ ting nge 'dzin la gyi chags so// zhend pa myed pa'i las la gnas// thams cad kun la zhen pa byed// lha dang dri 'brog thams cad dang // lA ma yin pas
24b4(1): byil ba ci/ drang srong dang ni mung 'dus kun/ gnang pas bstod nas yon yul lo// de la bzham zhob kyi tshol te/ 'jig gnyen las rnams myi g.yol// phyi mo gtsang zhing dam la gnas
24b5(1): dam pa'i bzhung ni nab dang mthun// lha myi rnams kyis nga mthong ba ni// smyu dad cing sprulang te byas pa'o// sangs rgyas bran chub pas na ma yin// nyi gra dab kha cig tu thum/ rdzogs shig
24b6(1): smond pa'i lam la gnas// che mthob 'dod rnams/ mngon khabs la // tha dad so so slob myi mthun// chos kyi ye shes nam mapa po/ rgyal pos le ra gsum po bshad
24b7(1): thams cad yang dag gshegs pa yin/ thub 'di mthu' yis/ gsungs te bshad// rgyal po dang ni gron po rnam sa/ ri dang 'jal na gnas pa la// chos dang chog 'ayod do mchog
24b8(1): sangs rgyas las ni kun 'byung skyes/ phyogs bcu'i rin cen mdzod mang po/ gtsang dang rin cen 'byung zhing skye/ kun kyang lha'i lha yin te/ rang dab brjid kyi rdzu 'phrul lo// khams sum thams cad
24b9(1): gyun na// nga c-i shes rab yod pa rnams// rnam pa mang po thams cad kyilas// sangs rgyas rgyu las 'byod sgrung bo// gnas bden 'ams nas bab pa bstan// lha rnams mang thos zo rje
25a1(1): mag tu// lapa rdzus kyi rnamasas na// snang gis sa na ma/ sa ngas rgya pa ma // mang ba gam shing bya sa skyed// shAg zung pa 'gas che / 
25a2(1): dus so // ri gas rang brnam rten ma rton pa dang // skyel sa na namathas pa/ 'i na na sa'i sa/ 
25a3(1): bang bam sa su mas/ 'di la rtag par smad cing thongs// mdzong pa ma 'ongs dkang dus// marjid thams cad zad par kun// bag chags kyis su sems bkab pas// des kyang mthong bar kyi nus so/ 
25a4(1): shi'i nang du song zhing 'ongs// mya ngan 'das pa'i chos myed do// 
25b1(1): byang chub sems dpa' la sobs chen po yod de/ 'jig rten gyi nang na rang dbang bas// de'i lus dam par bzang ba gos bzang rab kyis spud de/ sangs rgyas kyi 'dun na 'dug pa// stan las grags te 'greng
25b2(1): ba las lus btud de thal mo sbyar nas sems cig tu rjes gus par rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpe' sems dpa' chen po la tshig 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rang gi shes rab kyi khams la phyi nad cing / 
25b3(1): tha da par 'khas pas chos kyi srid pa bstan nas// theg pa sum la 'dug ste/ 'jig rten gyi sems las 'gal ba myed pa thob pa nas// thub pa chen po'i khon po byas te// thub pa la rang dbang bas sa rnams kyi rim pa la yid bzhin du/ 
25b4(1): chad pa la ma mkhas te// rtag par sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul sa'i nang na 'dug ste/ tho bo rnams la zab mo dam pa'i chos bshad do// de lta bas na bdag gis da btsun pa skul te/ 'phags pa'i myi rnams gzhan myi spyod par nang
25b5(1): logs rig pa'i khams la 'dug pa bshad de/ bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan kun chos 'di thon par bgyis te/ bde skyid pa'i sapyang ba spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi sa la phyogs te/ yid las skyes pa'i lus dang / 
25b6(1): tshig gis bshang ba'i lus thob ste// stobs kyis chang ba'i rang dbang kun mchog tshang bar thob nas// rtenang pa'i gnas la sbyar te/ bden pa'i mtha' la myi gnas par nor bu ma ni da dang tshungs/ 
25b7(1): kha dog gi gzugs bzhin stond cing / sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad du gsang bas rgyanang pa'i spyod pa bshad/ rdo rje'i snying po byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos smras pa/ shin tu dge'a'o// nges pa'i
25b8(1): bdag po kho bo la gsang bas rgyand pa'i yang myed pa'i chos bshad pa la khas so// nges pa'i bdag po rnam par rtog pa'i khams kun sems kyi mtshan ma yin pa dang / khams kyi nang na rnam par rtog pa kun btang ba/ snga nas chos
25b9(1): zin pa'i las so// nges pa'i bdag po 'jig rten thams cad ni rnam par rtog pas mthong ba yin no// 'jig rten gyi gzugs mthong na de'i rkyen las ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ kho bos khyod la phye zhing bas nang na/ chos kyi
25b10(1): rgyal po dang legs par nyand pa'i rigs so// de nas tshig le'u bshad pa/ 'jig gnyen mang po thams cad kun/ dpe' du tsha dus spyi/ spu 'dra/ myi bden gzugs rnams spyad pas su/ byed la myi bden na
26a1(1): par rtog/ tshor ba'i thus su tshor ba skyes/ tshor bas de bzhin san ma nus/ cig dang bral na gnyis po myed/ dpe' du 'ong dang grib ma bzhin/ sems myed na ni khams kyang myed/ ga dpag par/ 
26a2(1): ni dpag pa'i don/ sems cig 'ba' zhig la ni rten/ de lta bur ni rnam par rtog/ shes pa'i chos kun khas par shes// myi bden sems ni 'ba' zhig la// rten pas shes so chog ni myed par rig gakhas lnga
26a3(1): shes pa yod ma yin// chos kyi nyid dang phyi'i rnyog/ de kun sems kyis byas pa'o// sa rgyad kyi nang du zhugs te/ ru gtsang zhing dang ba thob/ sa dgung bsam gtan thub pa spyang / sa bcung tshor ba chen po bye/ 
26a4(1): chos kyi chus su de spyid blugs// 'jig rten du btsun 'grub// chos kyi sku ni zad pa myed/ sangs rgyas kyi ni khams yin te// de ni mtha' du nam khwa bzhin/ sems kyi rnam shes kyang de bzhin// zad pa myed
26a5(1): cing 'jig pa myed/ legs pa mang s+yang rgya nad kyis rgyanang // khong mor/ bsam myi khyab la 'jug/ gsang rgyan sangs rgyas yul gyi/ rnams// dpe' ru bus pa chags zin nas// gyo mo'i
26a6(1): rgyun ni mngon par bas nang / gyo mo chag pa rdul las mngon// rdul zhig rab tu zhib mor mngon// de ltar zag pa yod pa'i rgyus/ rig pa myed pa'i chos grub bo// dpe' ru mye ru shing sregs
26a7(1): bzhin// gnas gzhan du ni yang sregs so// myi yo ba'i ye shes ros// gnas sbyar bas ni nam rtog bral// gsang rgyanang sangs rgyas yul nang na// de lta bu rtag par brtan / sems can gyi ni bag myi skye
26a8(1): 'jig rten na ni ma 'dug shig/ mthong ba thams cad kun kyang bdang / da myed 'di la phyogs shing rtend// 'khor zhing 'bab par 'dud pa mchod// skye ba myed la 'jig pa'ang myed/ mthong ba thams cad
26a9(1): kun sngon na nga'i blo myed// brdegs zhigs nang gi dpe' bas nad pas// myed par gyu dad pa ma yin no// / dpe' du me yis shing sregs bzhin// / bdag nyid de'i nang du zhi// khams sum la ni ltas rtags
26a10(1): na// ra myed shes rab kyang de bzhin// de'i mying chos skyid pa stan// 'phags pa rang gi shes rab 'khas// de la rten te sangs rgyas bzhugs// thogs myed dag par sarba yang // 'jig rten na gnas pa
26b1(1): btang shing 'bral// 'jig rten gnas 'byung ba del bar gnas// de'i sems ni phyir gsang dag/ khong mong gsang rgyan yul na 'dug/ de nas bden mthong byang chub sems dpal dang // rgyal po rnams kun gyis cig
26b2(1): char tshig 'di skad byas so// rdo rje'i rab dbang bdag le sa tshogs kun phyogs shing rten bang mos na// bdag chag la/ phyogs shing rtend pa'i gnas snyun par smon pa to// de nas rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems
26b3(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshig le'us lam/ blan/ ba// sangs rgyas nyid ni yod ma yin// sangs rgyas myed pa 'ang ma yin no// phub po la sngo po sregs zin na// bdud kyi dmag kun zlog cing
26b4(1): klag/ yang dag gshegs kyi a la gnas// gsang bas rgyand prAl+li/ lus// tshor ba kun dag dri ma myed// nges pa'i/ bdag po phyogs rten rupa// rnam par rtog pa/ rnams yongs bral// gnas su myed pa'i gnas rig go/ 
26b5(1): gsang bas rgya na pa'i 'phags gan pa khams/ 'phags pa mapa po gten pra'i gnas// bzhugs pas/ spyod pas/ rtag pong gapa/ gsabargyan yul 'dir phyogs pa rigs// de nas rdo rje snyib po byang chub sems
26b6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// tshig 'di skad bshad zin nas// yang bden mtho nga byang chub sems dpal al smras pa// des ba'i bdag po 'dug pa'i ma khrim ma/ zhugs pa skyob pa rnaMs/ d+yaH
26b7(1): kyis 'jig rten thams cad la rtags na ni/ ri mor bris pa'i gzugs kyi na pa na mthon dman yod pa dang / rmi lam la bud myed bzab mo la gzugs mtho ga dang tshungs// dri phrog gi khar gyi nang
26b8(1): na/ byas so mchog gi dang tshungs phye skong ba'i 'khor lo gyur da pa dang tshungs// stob pa'i nang na sgra phyang ba dang chungs// myig 'phrul gyi myi pa dang rta la sotshogs pa'i gzugs dang / shing dang tshal me tog dang / 
26b9(1): 'bras bu byas pa dang tshungs/ sprin lding ba'i grib ma dang tshungs// glog khrug pa'i 'od dang tshungs/ kun kyang myi bden pa'i sgyu ma'o// yang dag par bden pa yod pa ma yin te/ rnam par rtog pas grub pas kha zo bos snod spyad
26b10(1): byas pa dang tshungs// nges pa'i bdag po 'jig rten gyi sems can ni / bag chags kyis sems bkab pas/ log par smra ba rnam glo skyes so// yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa gzham ci
27a1(1): gagis 'thung de spya / chos sa da rang bzhin gsum/ dbyed pa nas gnyis tag par ldan cig thun te/ dpe mangs po bas bachu gis skyongs /  dab brdag pa gsos nas/ dbal na chol ba cig gis kyim dzu
27a2(1): de la myi rjen sa// kun gaming rnam pa shes pa 'jig rtes na gnas pa yang de yang brdungs te/ thog sa byed pa'i / chags dpe su dag po'i bab pa dang chungs pa la// rnams kyis drung gis pus te srub pas/ 
27a3(1): rnam pa shes pa rnabs kyi dbang g.yos te long song chang pa myed do// des pa'i bdag po sems 'dirnam pa brgyan la de snyed kyi rang bzhinatha dad pa myed mod kyi rkyend kyi phying bags kyis yangs so dbang bang
27a4(1): ni cig cang skyes so// sems skyes pa'i ma khams kyi rnams rnangs rdze/ 'di ste bu'i khad kyis dang / cig cang 'jug pa tha dad pa'ang yod do/ kha khyim dang / skab sa kum dang // dpag mang po dang / mings / mas dang / yal ga nga
27a5(1): 'dab pa me tog dang / do gu dang / de lta bu la sogs pa'i gan/ sa tus cig pa mang po/ bab pa thadad kyis blangs te/ rmi lam na sngo/ gyi gnas mthong bar dang tshungs pa/ yang bar thog ma skyes pa nas rgashi thug pa dang / 
27a6(1): rdzas kun gyi 'bra ba bsams te ga tshig dang rjes bkang de bamams te/ mthon gyi ri mo tha dang brtags nas kha zas bzang po blangs mes bya nos te / de nas khams la rigs kyis mngon bang nges te sa las ni dus cig
27a7(1): mas pas sdigs pa'ibs byar ba nyid mongs so/ bams kyis kyi byab ro/ yang su dang gshes pa rnams kyi sangs kyi mdzad des med do 'jug pa dang drang sate/ med la sems na ste
27a8(1): nas zhag drug kyang de bzhin te la de lta bu'i rnam pa mang pos 'jig rten gyi chos kyi napan tha dad pa myed do// nges pa'i bdag po kun zhi'i rnam par shes pa bag chags dang / sems kyi chos rnams dang / zhen
27a9(1): pa dang dag pa thams cad kyis khon bya nus te/ lhan cig tu 'dug mod kyi ngo bo nyid ni rtag pa gtsang mas yang dag par shegs pa'i rigs kyi bus gshegs na/ de bzhin no// thub pa dang myi thub pa tha dad kyang // 
27a10(1): ngo bo nyid rtag par gtsang dag te/ mtshol ni rtag 'dugs/ dpa' rlabs ni 'gyur zhing pho ba dang tshungs so// kun zhi'i rnam pa'ang de bzhin te/ sa'i rnams pags kyis sbyang nas 'og ma dang bar ma dang / bla ma tha dad de sA
27b1(1): tshogs kyi zhen pa kun btab te/ snang ba thob pa tho'o// rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang tshig le'ung bshang pa/ shin tu dge'o// bden mthong shes/ gradam gyi ni chos 'di la/ ba las nyan te thos zin nas// sems gca
27b2(1): byi bzhin mngon pang nus / phyogs bcu'i yus sa thams cad kyi/ rgyal po bang po tshogs pa'i nang / khyod kyis smon la btab pa bzhin/ de la rgya ched grangs shi zod/ myi lag ya las chos thos na// kun gzhi'i rnam shes 'ad kyis dag/ bang bar gyi nang rgyal
27b3(1): bo byas pa gling sa no khong lo'i rgyal po byas/ bang ba ba yang ni rgya byin byas// gzung ma pa ni gnas bden lha/ rang dbang lha'i pho blang thug/ 'do pa'i lha'i bdag po byas// khang yang gzugs dang gzugs myed khams de'i lha ru skye ba byas pa/ 'du shes myed pa
27b4(1): sems can dang / bsam gtam thub pa'i sgyid rnams blangs yang dgarig cing myi 'dug go// dpe' du seng ge'i sgra dang tshungs// thug pa kum la rang dbang se// dga' skyid spyad pas cig tu thun/ sems cig gsang bas rgyand pa btsal dang / myi zhes
27b5(1): kyi chags khams sum la// gsang yas rgyand pas phyir zind nas khad kyis rim gyis phye zhing tshol// sbyar zhing rtend par bde'i sgyid thob// song ba myi rtag bde' dang sdug/ dpag tu myed pa'i seng ge rnams / dakhor bar skor da te rgyan
27b6(1): tu rgya nad/ chos la rang dbang rgyal po ni/ mang po'i nang / na mchog dam pa'i/ myur 'dug bzhin du zhig myed na/ mya ngan 'das zhes myi 'chad do// sems ni bya ba yod dang thun pa shi na nyes
27b7(1): bar skye ba'ang yod las bcu bram papa ma 'og/ theg pa sum s+yad 'byung zhing skye/ mchog gi dam pa gsang rgya nad to/ sa rnams rim gyis skye zhing 'bar/ grol zhing tha dad pa'i shes rab thob
27b8(1): yang dag gshegs pa'i phra dam sku/ ci ltar mya ngan 'das bshad de zhigs zhing myed pa'i chos shes bya// mya ngan las su 'das pa dang / myed cing zhig tu zin na ni/ sems can mtha' yang zad pa yod ga sems
27b9(1): can zad du zin na ni/ de yang thog mtha' yod pa'o// skye ba myed pa'i chos yod pas/ des 'dod sems can byed pa po// sems can ma yin pa las ni/ rnam pa las su tha dad ces chad/ dpe' ru sa bon tshig
27b10(1): bdang/ me mar shi ba dngazhi zang 'dra/ des sun mthang rang bzhin bshad/ grub dang myed pa'i sems yod byin/ rnam tha dam pa'i sbyid pa la/ rib du sangs te rig kyi nus gnas dpabs pa
28a1(1): gtan kun tu khyab/ gzugs myed 'du shes myed pa'i thug/ 'byord dang myi 'byor nga rang 'byung zhugs pa/ stobs kyis tha dad te kun rab dbang// de las myi nur myi ldog go// rtag par myi 'bying myi nub pa/ 
28a2(1): chos kyi mtshan rnams rtogs par shes// sa rnams la ni bzo' 'khas thob/ de lta bu'i rgyan rgya nad te/ gsang rgya nad kyi ni yulAd 'ongs/ rnam thar rang bzhin shes bya ba/ yod pa shig pas myed pa grub/ myi de lta ba rnams
28a3(1): la gnas mtha' ru byung bar myi nus so// 'dus shing tshogs pa sum yang shig/ rgyu la sogs pa'i rkyend rnams bzhi/ myig dang kha dog phyi nang rkyen/ 'dus shing tshogs pas rnam shes skyes// 'jig rten gyi ni phyi nang chos
28a4(1): tobs suspyad pas su res kyi skye bde la tshogs pa'i don mang pothams cad kun kyang 'gal zhing ldog/ sems 'ba' zhig las 'byung ba'i rig/ sems kyis thob par yongs bral na/ rnam par rtog pa bdun myi 'gyur/ de'i 'tsha
28a5(1): ma la yang myi gnas so// de'i tshe ni dmyigs dang bral ting ngerasems kyis drang por gnos/ 'jig rten gyi ni nang yang btang / blangs so mchog gis mthong myi nus/ rten pa sbyar te spom lci bral ba shes
28a6(1): rab bsam gyis myi 'khyab bo// yid las skyes pa'i lus rnams bcu / mang pos bzang rgyan spud/ khams sum gyi ni bdag byas te/ gsang rgyan gyi ni yul du 'ongs/ sems kyi gzugs dang seMs/ 
28a7(1): kyi chos na bya ba myed dang myi mthun mo// 'jig rten gyi nang mang po kun/ bde ba rtags na tha dad myed/ de lta bu'i shes rab can// gsang bas rgyanang pa'i yul du 'ongs mying mtshan rnam par rtog pa dang / drang ba'i ye/ 
28a8(1): shes yang dag myi g.yo' ba// thub pas mngon par lta nus so// mtshan nyid kun ni gnyam zhing snyoms/ sangs rgyas kyis su song par chud/ gsang bas rgya nad pa gtsang ba'i yul 'dus shing tshogs pa sum po dang
28a9(1): nam pa bzhi'i skyer zhig na/ rang gi byi mo myi srabs/ myi bden nas rtog kun dang mthun/ ram pa'i bag chags rnam rtog pa/ de'i mdzad pa rnam pa lnga/ dpe' du ma grub ma tshugs pas/ don rnams zas/ 
28a10(1): cad 'gal ba'o// rna las kus kyi nyes zlab te/ shes rab kyis ma srus zhing dkrugs/ byin ci log dang ma log pa/ thun dang tha dang chos 'dis shig /  rang gi phyi mo btang zhing bral/ gnan gyi phyi bo chos ma rje
28b1(1): thob sa pa sa mthong bkun kazang pa byed cing zhigasas skyes/ rgyal po chen po shes rab kyis/ sems can smra ba nams la 'dug / mjam grang kyang sbyang ba bzhin/ thog ma tha ma kyi rung / yang dag gshegs kyi drugs rjes spyod
28b2(1): lta ba rnams dang 'dun pa'i rkyend// zla 'od gtsang zhing snang ba bzhin/ gang yang ma 'khor ma chub myed/ so so'i dbang po'i rang bzhin bzhin// spros pa bzhin du chos kyang bshad/ mya ngan las su 'das pa de/ myed cing zhigs
28b3(1): su zin na ni/ sangs rgyas bsod nams kyi zhig yod// ya ru 'phel ba rnam sum yod/ rnam par thar yang de bzhin no// bden pa bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul rkang / bsam pa'i gnas las thogs myed tha dang / rkyen bzhi'i kha dog myed la gnas
28b4(1): dbang po'i mthul dang rdzu 'phrul tha dad/ tshor ba'i yan lags rnams kun bya ba yod dang bya myed chos/ 'phags pa'i phyi la thug pa kun/ kun kyang rab shes rtend pas yod/ sdug cing sbal ba'i chos la rig nyon mongs shes rab kyis su zhogs
28b5(1): thug sngal bzhin du shes rab skyes gdus dang shes rab sum de bzhin nga 'gog dang las yang de dang chungs/ de lta bu'i rnams bcu gnyis/ mying mi rtog pa pas nad ces bya/ slob pa'i myini grangs bcu yod rgyad po de ni lan brdzun
28b6(1): skyes/ khyim du khyim 'ang lan de 'ongs/ re shig song nas myed par 'das/ dbu' ma'i gnas dang skye ba'i gnas// spyod pa yod dang spyod pa myed / yar 'bab pa gnas gnas la/ de nas 'dod cing mya ngan 'dra/ 
28b7(1): de lta bu'i rnams thams cad ga shes rab kun gyi le'u dang glal/ spyad pa spyod pas bzhugs pa spyod/ 'og ma bar ma bla myi mthun/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bel skyong yon tan na yang mchog tu 'phags
28b8(1): bcu cig dang ni bcu gnyis nas/ bcu drug la ni thug bapar du// thub pa spyod pa de thams cad/ khad kyis su ni sems la zhi / zad kun ni zad ma yin// sems dang lhan cig gnas ma yin/ ma 'ongs nI ma phyi nad to// ma phyi nad pas ni yod ma yin
28b9(1): sems can ma 'dus rdzogs na/ phan mun du ni skye ba myed/ bsam gtan bzhi la sems myed de/ rgyu yod pas ni gnod myi nus/ rgyu yod pas mi nam shes byir yid kyi shes kyang rnam pa ldan myi bden 'du shes rang myi chos
28b10(1): du pa ma ma byed chus ma pa na she sa// na pa po padris pa sa / grangs pani ci med byed/ smran kyi rted pas kyi chen no// gas rgyan po na cag rdza sa
29a1(1): rtag snang mngon// gsang rgyand kyi ni shes rab can/ sangs rgyas dang ni lhan cig rtag/ khor mor thub pa'i kham+ba na bgrod// cig la cig ni tha dad myed ka/ sang rgyan kyi ni thub pa'i gnas/ thub pa'i stobs kyis de ru skyes/ de lta bas na
29a2(1): s+yAd sbyangs rigs karam pa thub pa'i sems dang thun/ 'dod pa'i khams la lha drug yod// tshangs bzung ma bcu gnyis gnas// gzugs myed dang ni 'du shes myed/ thams cad kun gyi sa'i nang nga / gsang rgyan yul du skyes na ni/ de'i lha'i dbang po byed/ 
29a3(1): gsang rgyan yul sa tshol bar 'dod na// shes rab rnam pa bcu spyod cig/ mchog gi shes rab shes bzhin skyes/ 'jig rten tha mal gzhan sems dang / sdug dang 'dus dang 'gog la ma shes/ shes rab na'ang shes rab skye ba myed/ de bas yang dag
29a4(1): dben pa mthong ka sha kun la ni rgyal rigs dang / kaMm tsa zla ba'i rgyal po dung / rigs dus myi tshungs tha dad myed/ gsang rgyand yul ni btsal ba'i rigs/ dgos shing nus pa'i sems ma grel/ lug ljar gzhan gyis bkres shing
29a5(1): bshald/ sdam par 'jigs shing snga phyir nub/ yid ni lus kyi/ nang na gnas/ sgyu ma'i rigs dgas 'dra ba'i rigs// sgyu mar byas pa'i sdong po 'ang 'dra/ chu bo nang gi 'dam bu bzhin/ rgyal po'i snum dang chen
29a6(1): ba lta / lus kyi cha khang spyod cing g.yos/ yid dang yid kyi rnam pas shis/ sems dang sems kyi chos ldan pa/ dpe' du stor nang sprin dang tshungs lhan cig 'dus byas bden pa myed/ sa bon kun zhi rnam
29a7(1): pa shes pa las chags rnams kyis dkri shing ba pa// dpe 'dus ni rin po ma/ rkyen bzhin 'dog mang po gan / sems can sus la gnas mod kyi// de bo nyid pang dri ma myed/ gdon gyi zla pa'i rigs nyid de / mya ngan
29a8(1): bzhes kyang bya// gzugs ni kye dang rkyen las so// byad dang gzugs rnams su da su/ nam par rtog pa de las g.yos// rgyu gnyis las su nam rtog byung / byi logs 'tshan ma bag chags sems / bdun ni len pa dziM/ 
29a9(1): pa shes/ shes byo gni dri bzhin no// yang po rnams ni mi byen tshogs/ rnam shes lnga lus nams shing skyes/ sems dang cho sa ni na cing drun/ de gang sras kyi dun 'jug shes rab drang pos
29a10(1): mang tags/ bajig rten da pa rnams cad ni/ de lta bu'i chulas byung / 'bras bu rnam sa ni de las skyes/ yang dag 'di dngas kyi dang / chos nam gcigagis cig skyed de/ bzhung dang sems so
29b1(1): tu 'dun dang / mngon par snang bas rtags te mthong / de nyid chos kun thams cad yin// mtha' yin yang dag bden pa nyid/ myi bden pa las chags pas su chos kun thams cad myi skye'o// chos kun ngo bo rtag pas stong
29b2(1): yod ma yin zhing myed ma yin/ sgyu ma dang ni smig sgyu dang / dri za dang ni rdzas pha la bzhin// byad gzugs ma pa mang po kun / mying dang mig dang ri mo lus// de lta bu la chags pa skyes/ khyab par 'dzin pa dang bzhin grub/ dbang po khams dang/ 
29b3(1): yang 'dus tshogs/ bag chags kyis ni sa bon grub/ sems dang tha dad myi mthun myed/ rnam par shes kun de las skyes/ rgyu'i stobs la res kyis sangs/ de ni gzhan las rtend pas g.yos nang logs
29b4(1): yang dag shes rab grub/ 'dug pa'i chos ni 'dun tu mngon// de ni rdzogs pa grub par bshad// 'phags pa rnams kyi khams yin no// sangs rgyas dang ni slob ma kun/ de rig pas na mying 'phrul myi / myi 'is chos 'di rig na
29b5(1): ni/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mthong ngo // bos te smras pa'i skyed zad zi drang / tshangs pas spyang ba kun tshugs zi nang bya'o// mchog ni ma grub myed/ lta ba kun dang yongs su bral / sdug sngal kun las rnam par
29b6(1): tha da / 'jigs skrag kun ni myed par gsal da nga myed/ pa'i chos nyid skyes/ snang zhing mngon par shes nus na/ bag chags thams cad kun sregs te/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su
29b7(1): chod/ thog ma myed pa tshun chad nas// spros brjod pa thigs sungs pa/ dpag tu myed pa'i nyes mang po// thams kun ni gas lang 'i nang te/ dpe' du lugs 'gang gser dang chungs / 
29b8(1): tham la sa 'i nang bkyis/  rnas par bdad payang de bzhin te/ spang ba da na gas gsis te/ lha pa kud ni skyed pa'i 'ams/ gsod kyang dam pa'i sa du bathams/ yul di mchog gi blangs ste// 
29b9(1): gnan gyis grub par nus pa byed/ sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub kun/ gtsang zhing dag pa 'jug pa'i gnas/ ting 'dzin skyed pa 'dun tu byung // de sung de ni zas su byas// yul de ru ni skye 'dod naka yang
29b10(1): dag bden pa zhugs spyod ci// yod pa rnams kyi rkyend kyi phyir/ bzung bzhin drangs shing rgya cher shog/ mying ni phyi mo gzugs las skyes/ gzugs kyang rkyen las su ni g.yos/ rnam par rton
30a1(1): na pa mang po kun kyang rgyu'i gzugs las yo /  dbang pa'i gadrugs dang bus gos rnams/ phung ba'i chos kyis 'dus pas grub nas par rtog pa de las skyes/ mngon pa shes pas pa dang sumayang / gcos
30a2(1): dang phyigayong ma yin pa/ 'jig rten thams cad zad pa kun/ gti mug mus pa'i rgyu las skyes/ blun zhing rmongs pas gzugs byas te/ ring thung dang ni kha dog kun/ yid dang sma dang gsung gi khams ga shis dang / 
30a3(1): kha zas dro 'jam rnams/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams/ dge' dang myi dge'i rang bzhin dang / bya ba myed dang bya myed chos mya ngan 'das la thug par du/ de ni ye shes khams zhes bya/ bsam zhing rtag par
30a4(1): bo zhing 'grung / kun kyang rnam par rten las skyes/ dbe du lab ltong rjo dbas kyis/ lcags brngubs zlog cing spung dang chungs/ lenang pa'i shes dang nas shes mdzod// de yang de dang chungs par mngon// sgrub pa 'arol
30a5(1): gnyis mad dang srungs las byed so so tha dad // zhen pa'i yid kyang de bzhin te/ kun gzhi la ni blangs chags pas// nga'i las don byed yod de/ nga'i gnas ni skye bar yan/ yid kyi shes dang
30a6(1): lhan yang cig garten byas lha yang spyad cing 'phos/ lus dam dron pos reg pa skyes/ skyabs shing g.yos pas las rnams byas/ kha zas dang ni gos kyi rnams / don bzhin du ni blangs shing sa
30a7(1): khang bar bar mchod klu dang gang / rnam pa mang bros bdag dga' rtse/ sems can mang po'i lus bzung ste// de ni yid kyi dbang soms bying / rmil ma gling rtog rnams dang tshungs khams mang po thams cad kun
30a8(1): narnam rtog rnam pa mang g.yos pa/ rang sems 'ba' shig na mkha'i dang / thag pa skor cing rtsed mo byed/ gzugs myud de la bde swa byed/ rnam par rtog kyang de bzhin no// rnam par rtog la rten pa myed/ nyid du rang
30a9(1): khro 'ams la 'gro// dpe' du me long nang gzugs yungs/ rnam par shes pa gzhos pa mthong / blun po de la slad cing khrugs/ snang zhing shes rab cad ma yin// nges pa'i bdag po shes par gyis// de gsum pan
30a10(1): ga sa shes byung / de sa mas sa yang sa thas na/ de'i phying ni yang dag bde / gzusas 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'gyu kyi se nu gsalas sogs khams sum zad pa byas 'du
30b1(1): rnam pa mang po kun rgyan bzang / rgyan pa de'i nang na ni/ yul de nang gi mchog tu 'phags/ mchog tu skyid dang dga' ba son / 'og ma'i khams la thug bar du// 'bum dpag myed kyi yul gyi nang / sangs rgyas kund kyis
30b2(1): pa ta dang par sod/ kun na de yang gsang rgyan yul// legs pa'i mdzod sprul dang de bzhin// thog ma 'ang byed tha ma yang myed/ phyi mo gnas nas yang shegs pa yis// sosogs pas sum las byung bde 'das/ stong zhing myi g.yo
30b3(1): bya ba myed/ bdag la phan zhing gzhan la 'ang ban/ yon tan dang ni las kun grub/ de nas sangs rgyas ma grub myed// de nang sangs rgyas don byang dang / gsang rgyan yul du'ang dgos so// 'bum phrag myed du srul te byas/ rtag byar
30b4(1): drang po thub la gnas/ rdzu 'phrul phyang ba kun gyi rtse nad// yul sa thams cad kun kyi nang / zla ba bzhin du myi mthong myed/ sems can rnams la kun gyi nang / mthun par spruld cing phan pa byas/ sa bcus song po rgyan la sortogs
30b5(1): stong chen dang ni rdzu 'phrul phyang / 'phags rgyan dang ni chos yigagazhan/ kun kyang chos yig 'di ni mchog tu 'phags/ chos yig gzhan gris spyan myi nus nges pa'i bdag dang rgyal po rnams// kun gyis btsun gus
30b6(1): bya ba'i rigs/ 'od gzugs dang ni gzugs myed khams/ 'du shes myed la sogs pa lha'i gnas/ sangs rgyas de lA/ 'phags 'das zind/ gsang rgyan du ni gan cing gnas/ yul re'i/ 
30b7(1): ni pho brang kun pad mo bzhin la mang ldan rgyanang/ yang dag gshe gas pa thams cad kyi/ gtsang ma'i ye shes dam mtshan yin/ sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub kun/ rtag par de'i nang na 'khod/ bcom ldan pas
30b8(1): gtan khor mor bzhugs/ ting nge myi g.yo bla na myed/ rang gi bsam dka' thub la gnas/ dam pa'i kha dog mang po bas nad/ kha dog gzugs ni mu yang myed/ gzhan gyis mthong bar nus ma yin/ mchog tu skyid pa'i gsang/ 
30b9(1): rgyan yul/ bcom ldan 'das ni tshe dpag myed / bzhugs sa spyad pa spyod pa kun/ kha dog gzugs kyang kun de bzhin/ bar bang du ni lha mthong ma/ lhang tsher mang po 'dus pa'i gzugs rka li tsam ka'i kha dog dang
30b10(1): meser yang dag dang zla snang ngo // rma bya dang ni so la ku/ byi ru pad mo glog las sothogs/ bar bar lus ring zhan pa dang / gos nang gyon cing rdza mnyam mthong / bang bar nyi ma skyong 'od zhin/ pad mo chen po'i steng du/ 
31a1(1): oM ga gnas/ bang bar byang chub mang po kun/ 'brug rgyal gyi drug rgyand pa mthong / bar bang rgyal po rin chen sngon po yis// rgyan te rin cen thong cug byas/ bar bar 'khor lo rgyal chan ri mo dang / nya dang ta phyis gzugs ma/ 
31a2(1): mthong / bang bar 'od bzang kha dog dang / nam khe gzha' dang tshungs pa mthong / bang bang ri rab ri rgyal po/ lag pil g.yas par bzhag pa mthong / bang bar tshe chen chu btab na/ de tshul phyugs kyi dmyigs pa bzhin/ 
31a3(1): bar bar myi'i rgyal po byas/ thor gtsug gos ni pho brang ngos/ blon po mang pos khod skor te// lhan cig yul gyi tshis bshad mthong / bar bar byang chub sems dpa' kun/ bla na myed pa'i spyad bapyod dang / rang gi yu
31a4(1): sa'i khams dang ni/ sangs rgyas snga mas chos bshad thos/ bar bar shes rab dang ni thub pas bshad/ myur tu sbyar te gnas rten pas/ sgyu ma bzhin gyi lus thob te/ rnam pa kun la thogs pa myed/ bar bar khams rnams mngon par
31a5(1): bstan da/ blangs shing chags pa'i las rnams bcad/ mthong ba thams cad las dadzin te/ lta ba thams cad myi le nang to// dpe' ru mar gyi snying po zad dmar me shi na mya ngan 'das bar bang sbyang ba spyod pa yis
31a6(1): pha rol phyi nang nas thams cad san theg bI sbyin pa chen pos sngas/ khyab bya/ phyin te zad pa myed/ tshul khrims 'dzind cing spyod pa rnaMsamacho ga chos rnams mang po ldan / mchog tu skyid brgyan d+yash+ya
31a7(1): pa'i yul myi'i mngal nas skyes ma yin/ lus kyi gzugs ni ser ri 'dra/ 'od kyi kha dog rtag rgyas bkang/ bzhugs pa rang dbang yod pa na/ bde'i skyid dang ni 'od snang ba/ de lta bu'i myi khams na/ rgya cha la yang de cig
31a8(1): myed/ mchog tu skyed pa de nang myi/ bsams pa bzhin du rjes rang 'ong / thub pa rgyal ba rang dbang se/ thub pa zil dang po du byas/ rin cen shing ni mying yid bzhin/ de'i drung na ze rad cing gtsang / ser nam bye ru ku ma
31a9(1): ba yin te sa la bkram zhing rgyanang tu rgyadang/ rdzing gi ba na me tog bzhin/ bye zhing rgyas la la mer bzang / de ltar byi dor ldan rgyan pa// dpel dra bya ru myi drung ngo // myi dga' gtsang zhing yid ches yod/ mkhas bzo' bas/ 
31a10(1): gtan rnam par s+yang / sangs rgyas yon tan sred cing mos// gcig tu ljon zhing de la sa tshogs de nas sangs rgyas yul du ni/ pad ma las su sprul te bskyes/ mtshan mang pos ni rgya nad tu dah+ya na da / me long snar
31b1(1): zhing rdul dri myed/ de nas rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen pos/ le'u 'di bshad zin nas/ bdag gi lus 'dzub mo'i chags bu cig tsam du stan bang bar ske tse'i 'bras bu tsam dang spu'i rtse mo'i rgya
31b2(1): mtshal tsams nad bar bar sangs rgyas kyi lus san/ bar bar nyan thos kyi lus gzhan dpag tu myed pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs pas nad te/ chos bshad/ bar bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nang du zhugs nas bshad de/ chos
31b3(1): lnga dang / rnam par shes brgyad dang / ngo bo nyid sum dang ra myed pa gnyis mngon par shes te/ sgyu ma dang chungs pa'i ting nge 'dzinang thob nas// yid bzhin tu lus mnos nas/ rang dbang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis cis kyang myi/ 
31b4(1): 'jigs pa myed de/ phyir myi nur myi ldog cing / gtsang rten gnas nas/ sangs rgyas kyis zad pa'i phud pa'i don la bzhugs te/ rtag par myi 'gyur ro// bar bar byang chub sems dpa' 'grod cing 'gro ba 'khas par nus pas
31b5(1): rmi lam dang tshungs/ gzugs rnyan dang tshungs/ chu'i nang gi zla ba dang tshengs/  zhugs pa spyod pa'i myi rnams kyis sbyang ba'i las ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob se// sgyu ma bcu ni lus kyi dpe
31b6(1): mtha' yun gyi smon lam dang / drang por tshor ba la thug par ma gang ba myed do/ dam pa'i me tog pad ma'i thog tu 'dug se// sangs rgyas rdzas kyi bu mang pos lhan cig khor bar skor nas/ bar bar ni byang
31b7(1): chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi stobs bshad pas/ gzugs rnam pa mang po gnod to// yul sa kun bgrod nas/ sangs rgyas mang po chub pa g.yog byas so// byang chub sems dpa' de kun gyi lus phra zhing de
31b8(1): pa se// yod myed la myi 'dugapa dper sngags 'chang dang / dri phrog rnams ri rab ri'i rgyal po la rten cing 'dug pa dang tshungs bang bar ni nam khal 'dug na/ sa la 'gro ba'i sems can gyis mngon par myi nus so// 
31b9(1): byang chub sems dpa' de kun kyang de bzhin te/ gzugs spyod ma yin par mthong bar myi nus so// bar bar byang chub sems dpa' rang dbang gi bsam gtan pas ting nge 'dzin gyi gobs bshad de/ phyogs bcu'i sun
31b10(1): da ma khringasas da byangad samam pa ma nas dus ba ba mtshad gyis sa da nga rgya
32a1(1): sems can yod pa'i gnas thams cad du tha dad pa'i lus sanang nas/ de'i sems mnyam snyoms tes dang chungs/ chung bachungs/ nyi ma dang drungs/ zla ba dang chungs so// bar bar byang chub sems dpa' snying
32a2(1): po'i sems spyad de/ sems can skye shi'i khor lo la skor ba dang / dwa dbul po ma rabs sdug sngal mang pos gdungs pa la byams pa bshad de/ dper bum pa nag po'i gru la rten te 'dug la mtsho chen po bgrod de gru bzhin du phye zhing dpag tshad
32a3(1): cig nas/ dpag tshad rgya song dpag tu myed pa smin pa dang tshungaso// nga ma yin pa dang / skye shi rtag pa bshad de/ smar te myed cing skad cig myi 'dug pa shes par byas so// bar bang ni sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems
32a4(1): dpa' rnams kyis sems can thams cad srid pa sgom pas bslad cing / dkrugs pa mthong ba bshad de/ rnam par rtog pa'i sdug sngal gyis gdungs pas/ mtshan ma myed pa'i chos kyi nang mtshan ma blangs nas/ song ba myi bden pa la
32a5(1): chags te/ brang nus pa yod pas brang nus pa yin te/ de'i sems bcings kris nas/ skye shi'i mtshol 'byam zhing myi gan nas te/ dbul phongs shing sgre bo chang ba shes pa myed na/ dper mtsho chen po
32a6(1): nang gi rgya dang tshungs pa la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gru'i gnyen pa dang tshungs par 'dug se/ sems can rnaMm la byams sdug pa'i sems skud de/ skye shi'i sngag sngal gyi gegs las rnam pa
32a7(1): tha radad par byas te/ de dang mthun pa bzhin du lus bstan nas/ sbyin pa la sortogs pa spyod pa rnam pa mang po bshad do// theg pa chen po gsang bas rgya nad pa'i chos kyi yi ge dam pa'i lus skye ba'i le'u lhag ma'o// 
32a8(1): nye bar rgyand pa de'i tshe / kun tu bzang po kha dog mang po 'od chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grogs lhan cig/ gzugs 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' dang/ 
32a9(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang / mthu chen stobs byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phrul gyi zla ba byang chub sems dpa' dang / rdo rje mnyam byang chub sems dpa' dang / sdod cen gtam byang chub sems
32a10(1): dpa' dang / nam pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa dang / ma ni rin po che'i pho brang gi dpag tu myed pa'i lha rnams dang / gsang bas rgyanang ba'i yul gyi nang gi sangs rgyas bu mang po rnams dang / sangs rgyas
32b1(1): gzhan gyi yul nas chos nyan tu 'ongs pa rnams/ gsang bas rgyan pa'i phra dam gyi yon tan bshad pa thos nas/ chos la btsun zhing lci se/ gdon myi za bar spyadad cing rten nas/ rtag par yul de na 'dug se gnas gzhan du myi
32b2(1): skye'o// ma 'ongs pa'i sems can kun la byams par bsams te/ de thams cad la bsod nams bya bar dang nas sems can thun par rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gsolang to// smras pa
32b3(1): btsun pa bdag chag la 'jig rten thams cad kyi kha dog dang / gzugs mang po de snyed sus bgyis pa bshad par smon to// rdza mkhan gyis sa spyi bo las bum pa la sogs pa bgyis pa bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzugs
32b4(1): mang po yang de bzhin du bgyis sam/ 'ong kam de lha ma lugs/ yang rol mo lan gyi kha ce dang dang / smig dang / sku pa dang / shing la satsogs pa brdungs spyod nas/ mang po 'dus nas sgrar gyurd nas 'jig rten thams cad kyang de
32b5(1): bzhin nam/ rdzas cig las rang bzhin sum yod pa dang tshungs so/ 'jig rten gyi kha dog mang po gzugs dang mtshan nyid grub zin pa dang / ngam grub pa de grub pa de grub pa de rdzas cig gi nang du 'dug gam pa 'ung kam
32b6(1): gzung ma gnam dang / gzhan grul dbang byed gnam dang / sdod cen myi 'am cis byas sam/ 'on tam rnam par shes pa mtha' yas kyi lha dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal po rung gi gtsug cig dang / gzugs myed pa'i lhas/ 
32b7(1): byas samalha'i dbang po rnams khas rdzogs pas// thams cad kyis sems thun par nus te/ s+yas ma byas pas/ 'od kam phyogs 'di dang / phyogs gzhan gi nang gi sangs rgyas dang sa byang chub rnams 'phrul
32b8(1): zhing sprubad pa'i stobs kyis byams pas// 'jig rten thams cad kyi gzugs kyis 'di'i nang gi slad/ 'brug pa g.yos sam/ bslang 'khrugs pas thong ste/ smig rgyu'i chu dang tshungs samadaper bum pa'i gnas yon la rten pa
32b9(1): dang chungs sams 'jig rten thams cad kyi gnas na khod pa ni yon gyi rigs btags te/ yon la rtend pas cig na cig tu tshogs pas na/ yon mang po 'dus grub pas/ de lta bur 'jig rten na de snyed kyi kha dog gi gzugs
32b10(1): ma me ci zugs/ zung gas 'jug pa'i nas yod/ sa san de rangs pa chen po lha'i rgyal po dang / mthu che'i sna dang / rang bang gi gas byas pa yin zhes zeng / sa sa ni de migag ka dang / de dger byin / 
33a1(1): sngags 'chang gi rang gi gobs kyis byas/ la la ni myi bden pa la chags pas/ rgyal pa'i rang bzhin las rang gi dus bzhin sa rig pa'i sred pa'i las kyis skyed de langs so// lha dang sngags 'chang rang gi 'ardobs rgya/ 
33a2(1): byas/ 'jig rten thub pa'i phyi gzhan thams cad kun dgo shing srang ba sres te/ ngo bo nyid byed zer te/ sbru ma dang rlangs/ skyil ma dang chungs/ cha ba'i dus kyi smyig rgyu dang rungs/ dri srog gi grong byed dang chungs
33a3(1): thog ma myed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'o// ci yang len yod pa yod de// sbrul 'go gnyis yod pa dang tshungs/ ro langs te 'gro ba dang chungs/ shing gi myi la skal po'i chus g.yor zhing smyung ba dang drungs / na mkha'i nang
33a4(1): na g+ha dbyung ba dang / me snang ba'i mamangs dang chungs sa pa// de nas rdo rje snyid po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshig le 'ung lan blan pa/ 'jig den la dog gzugs meng po zas pas byas pas ma
33a5(1): skyes sogs kyil dang byin dang/ de la mchogs pas byas ma yis chog sbyin pa chen pos sdud pa dang / mchodang pa'i dpal kyi 'bras su dang / be dus bgang de mchog gi rgya/ res byas bub rdos
33a6(1): byed pa khyed pa ma yin no yong sa sbyin no// jig rkyen rgyas 'an sa ma yin/ de ni ku zla'i rnamashes te/ rgyud kyi skyes bu rnam pa shes/ thams cad skyes shing gas pa skye
33a7(1): de ban so// da pa'as pas gyum pa 'i lung chus rnams ngas sang+yas sa pas ga dang / dang ma mthong ba/ shes rab kyis su 'as ma yis / skye ga byed par myinus so// sems thub thogs dred
33b1(1): par ma yin te/ mdzod kyi ye shes pa yang de bzhin no// rnam shes sbyar dang spyod pa mthun/ sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas bu/ thub pas de ni rtags te mthong / mdzod kyi ye shes pas 'jig rten bzung / dpe' ru nor bu skud pas rgyas
33b2(1): shing rta khong lo yod dang chungs/ las kyi rlung gi bzhin 'khor zhing sgo dang/ rdza mkhas 'khor lo shing skong bzhin snod na grub na de bzhin 'apyod/ mdzod kyi ye shes dang khams gyi rnams stobs dang mthun na ts+tsha
33b3(1): grub byed byi nang 'jig rten thams cad kun/ dra ba chen pos kun khyob khyab/ dpel du skad ma mang po gzugs// nam kha la bkras bkod de bzhin rlung gi stobs kyis bzung bas su / 'khor zhing 'gro te
33b4(1): rtag myi gna' nam khA yi ni rjes dang tshungs/ btsal te mthong bar myi rung ngo // bya dang nam kha ma bral lo// mthon man du ni 'dor zhing nus/ mdzod kyi rnam shes kyang de bzhin no// bdag dang gzhan gyi lus ma bral
33b5(1): mtsho la khA rlabs g.yos dang tshungs/ nam khang gzugs mang shong da tshungs/ mdzod kyi rnam shes kyang de bzhin/ phung po'i mdzod kyi bag chags rnams/ dpe' ru chun zla ba dang / pad ma me
33b6(1): rtog rnams dang chungs / chu dang rkang cig las cig ma bral / chus su de la chags pa myed/ mdzod kyi rnam shes kyang de bzhinabag chags kyis su zhen myi nus myig la 'bras yod dang / 
33b7(1): tshungs/ myig gi mtha' ru bdag myi mthong / mdzod kyi rnam shes lus la 'dog/ mdzod kyi rnam shes sa bon sdus/ dron po shes pa khyab pa bzung / sprin gyis shes pa g.yogs pa bzhin / las spod
33b8(1): 'phel ba rgya stod do// sems can gyis mthong myi nus s+ho/ 'jig rten myi bden rnam par rtog/ glang la sashes par yong mthong / rwa yod ma yin ma rig pas/ zhang la ri bong daskyed zer ga zhig shing ni ga zhing
33b9(1): 'du / da mang byed/ midas bye na kyi mas / meng sa skyed pa skyed de/ med pa'i chos sde'i byed/ mang byed pa zhusas babyung / mang ba dang ni byed pa cho/ 
33b10(1): nga byas/ yod da bye kyi chol nyis nang / gam par nyos pa sung phyi rigs/  rdo tshig dang bral na ni/ chong pa kyi skye du nas/ dpe' du me'i 'ong lo dang / gling cog sum nam mang bzhin/ kun kyang smras / 
34a1(1): kr-i/ cung zad bathong / tshong ba'i nam bkun skyes skyes/ rgyu dang 'bral du rinang na ni/ tshod ba de nyid yod pa byed/ mying dang gsungs kyis nges kyis bcings/ bag chags su ni yod pa byed nam par rtog pa
34a2(1): thams cad kun yid dang lhan cig cig cad g.yos/ yang dag bden pa'i khams rig na/ bag chags kyi ni sems myi skye/ thog ma myed pa tshun chad nas/ myi bder dbyings shing sradaspros pa rjod pa'i bag
34a3(1): chags kyis/ sems kyi rnam pa mang po skyes/ len phod pa dang blangs so mchog/ sems can sems can rang bzhin no// bum pa gos la sogs pa gzugs/ sems dang bral na ci yang myed
34a4(1): thams cad tshor pa 'ba' zhig yod/ tshor ba dang ni bzhud kun myed/ ngo bo nyid ni tshor nus na/ rang bzhin gyis su 'di ltar 'gyur/ bag chags dgrags pas sems rnyogs 'gyur// 
34a5(1): tha dad 'gro bas mthong myi nus/ tshor ba rlung gis btab dang tshungs dpa' rlabs 'dug cing sdod pa myed/ sems ni khams kyi drung gyis skyong rnam shes par skyes 'ang de bzhin
34a6(1): rnam par rtog pa rnam mang po/ nang logs nas su chags shing blangs kas bzhin du ni rnam rtog myed/ yod do cho ga ni rtend cing skye/ mdzod kyi shes pa 'ang de bzhin te/ khams rnams kyi ni rtend pa'i
34a7(1): gnas dpe' ru lkug pas su rang gi lus la gnyis bcangs tshungs/ ba glang sA'i sa rba blangs te/ rang la spengs shing khri dang tshungs/ yang byis pa chung ngu rnams ltar/ kha ru 'dzub mo mur dang tshengs/ 
34a8(1): de ltar rang gi sems nang nas/ khams byung slad du rang gi rkyen / de ni sems kyi khams yin te/ sa rtogs pa sum po kun la khyab/ yun ring du ni bzhugs spyod pas mkhas par chud cing tha dad par nus
34a9(1): phyi nang gi ni 'jig rten kun/ sems kyi 'du shes 'ba' zhig go// de nas rdo rje snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshig 'di skad bshad zin nas/ kha rog 'dug ste gnas myed pa'i gnas
34a10(1): kyi phra dam gyi bsam gtan la 'dug nas/ chos kyi khams kyi sgo mo bgrod de/ sangs rgyas kyi khams rnams su bzhugs nas/ grangs myong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi bu yul 'dir spyad pa spyod pa'i sa la 'dug par
34b1(1): 'ong ba mthong nas/ mede bzhin thub pa las langs te/ 'od snang ba chen po btang nas/ 'od des 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs byed pa dang / 'du shes skyed pa'i lha'i pho brang kun khyab par snang nas / 'od
34b2(1): snang ba de'i nang nas/ yang dpag tu myed pa'i 'phags pa rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi yul dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bzang pos rgyand pa yod pa mthong te/ 'jig rten rnams skyid pa 'dod pa bzhin du
34b3(1): bsod nams byas te/ kun gsang rgyan gyi mying 'an mnos te/ gzungs su 'dzind par byas so// sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams cig la cig ltas te/ rtags nas tshig 'di skad ces 'dze rang to / gsang rgyan gyi
34b4(1): yul gyi yul gyis ni dpal mang po gtsang ba dang / sdig pa thams cad myed par nus so// zhugs pa spyod pa'i myi rnams kyi khong pa'i gnas ni sangs rgyas kyi yul lo// mchog gi nang na rab kyi mchog yin te spyan du myed de/ nga la
34b5(1): brdzogs pa'i phying thos kun/ mying thos na kun sems dga' skyed de/ lhan cig grogs te dong ba'i rigs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams so song khod pa'i gnas nas/ yul 'dir 'ongs so// de'i tshe gtsang 'dug lha'i khams
34b6(1): dang / 'og myin gnas dang tshangs pa'i rgyal po gdung gtsug cung can dang na gnas cig tu tshogs nas/ kun yul de'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la yod pa de dkon pa'i sems skyes te/ tshangs pa'i rgyal/ 
34b7(1): po lags yong te smras pa/ lha'i bdag po bdag chag la sogs pas/ da ltang kun 'di snyam gyi sems g.yos son nam kyi dus na lha'i rgyal po zhabs 'bring du gsang rgyan gyi yul du mchi/ 
34b8(1): ba rung // de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal pos tshig de skad thos nas/ tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i bal mang po dang 'grogs te/ myu tu dong se lam gyi phyed du byon na/ gang 'dod gnod myed pa dang / tshangs pa'i rgyal pos sngon tu tshong na/ 
34b9(1): 'di snyam gyi sems byas so// gsang rgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bzhugs pa spyong pa'i khams te/ de lta bu'i myi ma yin pas ci'i sogs kyis phyin dbang rung // 'dod pa dang gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa ni
34b10(1): lharnams dang / sung 'dug pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste// phyind pa ma yis / bdag gis da ci lta bung 'dir 'ongs te phyin nga yang / rang gis bsam te smras pa sha lha'i nang gi lngas bdag la brjid kyis mas kyis sangs
35a1(1): na ni/ myung tu 'gro dgos nus sam zhes te de snyam du bsam pa byas zin nas// srog 'phos so zhes skad phyung ba dang / de'i mdo bzhin dpag tu myed pa'i sangs rgyas lam gyi dbus zhugs te/ brjid kyi 'od lam mer sdang / 
35a2(1): pa mthong nas tshangs pa'i rgyal drung gtsug can gyis mod bzhin sangs rgyas la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la satogs pas nga ci zhig bgyis nas myu da te/ gsang bas rgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul du phyinang par nus
35a3(1): sangs rgyas kyis bka' bas yang ba/ khyod ltar ldog pa'i rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang bas rgyand pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bzhugs pa spyod pa'i khams te/ drang po thub pa'i myi 'dug pa'i gnas/ sangs
35a4(1): rgyas kyi khams kyi nang 'phags pa se// zla myed kyi gzugs yod pas song ste// byin par nus pa ma yin no// de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dung gtsug can gyis sangs rgyas kyi tshig thos nas lha phal kun dang mdo bzhin du lha'i pho brang du khor
35a5(1): / de nas gsang gdugs ldan pas 'gros te smras pa/ tshangs pa 'i rgyal po dung gtsug can brjid kyi stobs chen po yod pas kyangachen 'gro ma nus na/ yul de'i nang na mchog tu 'phags par mngon no// sgyu ma dang / 
35a6(1): tshungs pa'i ting nge 'dzinang thob pa 'ba' shig dang / zhugs pa myo ra pa'i myi 'gro ba'i khams yin no// ka zhes de bzhin du gas bas brgya nad pa'i yon tan la snyand pa brjod nas de'i sgra gcig nas cig/ 
35a7(1): ma thos pa myed do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kun 'ongs nas deng tshogs nas tshig 'di skad thos pa dang / dga' zhing gus pa shi nad tu skyed do// rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa byang chub sems dpal so so dang/ 
35a8(1): chen po la gsold pa bdag cag rnams chos la sgom pa bzhin shin tu dad na snang ba chen pos bdag cag la drang zhing bshad par smon to// rdo rje'i snying pos smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyis bshad do chog gi chos yang dag par
35a9(1): gshegs pa 'akon po nyag cig ma gtogs par/ gzhan su zhib tu bshad par nus yod yang dag par gshegs pa ni zhugs pa spyod pa'i nang na mchog tu phags par dbang ste khams yod do cho ga bsam gyis myi khyab na
35a10(1): ces dung thugs pa spyod pa phyi ma yin pa la bye sa nang la drang zhing bgad du rung / de nas gzugs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' dang / krung ma'i gnas kyi sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams yang lhan cig tu mthun par spang 'byung nye gathos sa
35b1(1): myur du bshad byu gsol// de nas rdzu 'phrul chen po byang chub sems dpa' dang 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' dang / byams pa byang chub sems dpal dang / myi 'am ci byang chub sems dpa' dang
35b2(1): gzhan grangs myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po kun yang 'di skad ces ze rang to/ shi nang tu dge'o// nges pa byung tu bshad par sponang to// 8/ de'i tshe grangs myed pa'i lha rnams kyis nam mkha'i rang ma khA'i si la snyan
35b3(1): byas nas sems mthun par skul te gsol to// de nas de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po dung gtsug can sangs rgyas kyi mthu' gnos te/ tshogs pa 'dir 'ongs nas rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po
35b4(1): tshig le'ur bshad de smras pa nga 'di mang po tshogs pa kun bzang du rgyand pa yongs myong / kun kyang btsun pa'i slob ma yin/ bzhungs pa'i shes rab sbubs pa myed/ kun kyang btsun pa'i gnas na gnas/ 
35b5(1): skom pa bzhin du yang chos gsol/ cis tsogs pa'i phyir 'd-i rab bdag gis da dung ma rig go// ke ke lu le lu'i phyir 'dri 'bya / rgyal lhung dang ni spyi 'o skyes rta'i na so ngang ba dang kho lo'i rgyal po byas
35b6(1): ba 'di bu dram shing ki rigs pa dang / bcu bcu bzung ba'i yul rgyal po 'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs myed nang/ myi dang khA la satsogs pa'i chos 'dra 'am lum kas byang chub pyod pa dang / 
35b7(1): rang sangs kyas dang ra pos dang / sa khyed la rtsu pa dang /  gas pa'i gsugs la yogs ros ni del bu'i ngor nams nade ris par dra zhing bgad par spong bangs cag dab tu byi nags
35b8(1): sems cig tu ni kun nyan nod// de nas rdo rje snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phal po rnams la sgo ba/ khyod kyis tshangs pa'i rgyal po dung katsug can dang / gtsang 'dug gi lha mang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi
35b9(1): khrurnam sems 'grus pa thos gsol ba ma thos sas/ de nas grol ba dang zla ba/ byang chub sems dpa' shes kyi zang byi/ byang chub sems dpa' ram mkha'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rter 'dzinang byang chub
35b10(1): sems dpa' sa bu chen po/ byang chub sems dpa' rang dbang rtogs pa byang chub sems dpa' ri cer gtsug/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga'i po gtsug / byang chub sems dpa' phyagar rdo rje/ byang chub sems das
36a1(1): stong myi g.yo shes rab byang chub sems dpa' / spyan na rin cen byang chub sems dpa' gzhan 'bus grangs myed yul sa nas/ cig cang du 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bu lhan cig tu yang ltas nas rdo rje'i
36a2(1): snying po btsun pas tshig le'u bshad de smras pa / 'das te song dang ma 'ongs pa/ yang dag gshegs pa'i ye shes gtsang / btsun pas sangs rgyas nyid las mnos mngon par rig pas sems myi dgos/ 
36a3(1): mang po 'di kun thos par mos btsun pas drang zhing bshad par smon de nas rdo rje snying po ting nge 'dzind kyi rgyal pos phal mang po la khyad par brtags nas tshig le 'ung lan blan pa yang dag par/ 
36a4(1): gshegs pas chos bshad pa ras su zhib bshad nus ma yin / sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub kyi brjid kyi 'phrul gyis skyabs ma rtogs / bdag da sems phyag 'tshal ba/ rang dbang gtsang gdang po brang dang
36a5(1): no rin chen po brang dang / sangs rgyas dang ni bu rnams la'o// bdag gis sems gus byas bshad pa/ yang dag gshegs/  kyi ye shes gtsang sangs rigs dus babs shing dang / 'das
36a6(1): te song ba mchog gi rgyal rgyal po de chos bgad ma yin/ gsang rgyunang yang dag gshegs pa'i// de'i rigs dus 'bab shig san// sangs rgyas shinang du grangs pagrub pa
36a7(1): rgyal ba'i yon tan no// drang po rtogs pa'i spyod yul te/ myi bden chags pa'i sems kun bral// de lta bas nang sobs kyis/ zab mo 'di bshang nus ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi ni rdzu 'phrul gyis/ 
36a8(1): sangs rgyas kyirnamasagatad cing banos / shes rab 'di ni mchog pa dam/ ting nge 'dzind kyi me tog rnams/ sangs rgyas kyang byu da nga nangar bzhugs na drang po mnos te bye zhing zang / gcig gis nang
36a9(1): thos so// sa nig to nus po// chags da sa te gad sa byas nas/ nga gi ya dag gshegs par 'jugs/ den mchogs pa'i na das/ yangs rgyas kyi bumang po rnams
36b1(1): rdo rje snying pos byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i bu 'di ba ni bshang pa thos nas// mno' the gus pas phyag 'am ba legs gsosod pa/ bdag chag la sonas pa nos sa rab tu sred cing dang pa skyes te/ gang
36b2(1): bachu sems dang chungs/ bu ba 'brang rtsi dran pa dang chungs/ datshogs pa'i nang gi sangs rgyas kyi bu mang po rnams thub pa dang shes rab zab mo la rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po yod pa/ rgyal po'i khams kun rang dbang thob pa
36b3(1): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs chen po yod pa/ rgyal po'i khams kun tu yang dag par gshegs par bshad do// chos kyi chos thos par smon to// cig tu smon pa btsun pas tshangs pa'i sgra spangs dang / in lnga'i sgra dang / 
36b4(1): yang dag par shegs pa'i kun dga' ba'i zab mo rgyang ring po'i sgras 'phags par rgyal ba'i gzhung bshad de/ mngon par rig pa thob par bgyir smon to// rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ yang dag par shegs
36b5(1): bas bshad do chog gi tshig gi bzhung ni yang dag pa'i bden pa semayong dkon mthong dka'o// dper song pa'i nang gi shing la mtshogs pa rdzas myed pa de'i grib la mthong ba dang tshungs te
36b6(1): shin tu mdzan dgan no// yang dag par shegs pas bshad do g.yod dkon pa yang de bzhin ste// na mkha'i na nga'i rlung dang / 'i rjes mthong bar nus pa dang tshungs so// thub pas bshad ngo cho ga gi
36b7(1): rnam pa mang po'i bzhung la phyogs par thong bar rung ba dka' ba yang de dang tshungs so// 'jig rten gyi chos ni shes rab yod pas dpe' byas na/ sdang zhing gsal mngon par bshang nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhal gyis bshad do/ 
36b8(1): chos shi daze' rnams sas 'das po tshig gis slebs pa dang / ngas mthong ba ma yin no// dpeng thimam gyi 'ams dang / dri brog gi grong khyerang dang chungs so//  'dir tshogs pa'i nang na/ bzhugs pa'i spyod pa rnams
36b9(1): da nga dag par bden du'i 'arnasas mngan ning rig pathobazhi dang / ram kyig zung bye de dag sa bsas kyis kyi sgrub par sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'ams 'od byas yang das pa gzhenas pa
36b10(1): rjid kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par de'i thus pa la mang thol bshad kyis/ khyed sangs rgyas kyi tha rnams kus rtag par gnang pa'i rigs so// yang dag par shegs pas bshad chog gi ri mo dang gzhus mthun tre/ sems kyi yid lazung
37a1(1): shing 'das pas dpes slebs pa ma yin no// dpeng me tog 'dab ma la bung ba mang po sdod cing len pa dang chungs te/ sngang byind pas ni de'i snying po'i snying po brangs so// phyis byin te 'ongs pas de'i lha ro
37a2(1): blangs so// de ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'is ni chos kyi snying po'i snying po thob bo// ngas ni de'i lhag ma'i ro thob te bal mang po la bshad do// de nas mod bzhin tshig le 'ung bshad pa gA'i nang na gA'i khams te shes rab sdas
37a3(1): ba kun dga' skyed/ sems dang kha yis zhal dpag ci / rnam par rtag / nus bshad ma yin pa thams cad kun ni 'dul 'bab pa 'jig rten gyi ni bregs lhod sems mying dang mthun pa'i gzugs gad+ma nang te/ sangs rgyas
37a4(1): mtshan gyis byi dor byasa'od zlum dang ni khor lo rtsabs rnam pa mang po kun 'byor nga grub // / pho brang kun gyi gnas kyang bgrod myi dang lhas su zhib tu ltas yang dag gshegs pa dus bzhi'i nang rtag par gsang
37a5(1): rgyan gnas shing bzhugs / 'jig rten khams kun thams cad du/ skye dang mya ngan 'das pa bstan / dge' bsnyen chung ngu bI ga'i tsheskye dang rnyog 'khrug myi sred de/ sems can kun gyi rim bzhin du
37a6(1): dang thun pa babad sa cag las spyod pang cig mthong kyi gas kya dag par byin // gas can ni mabyed parnams pa dugs smin pa dus pags/ sgri banyis pas byi da / 
37a7(1): sa ma // dpe na pa nga rgya ban// zugs na kyis su chu gas byug/ de ltadum mdo zugs/ 'jig rten du khya ba na/ yang gshegs
37a8(1): na dun pa/ cam sas mdag kyigs par rjod nang bsogs/ byi 'ab cis drug pa dang / bur bshing rnarigs byal thams cad la dra smra pa'adas/ de rje la sonas mi chen pas
37b1(1): gtsang rgyand kyi ni bA dam yul/ gtsang zhing dang ga'i dpal gyis rgyanang / rnam thar nga shes shing mthong ba'i phyi/ mchog tu 'phags pa gnas pa/  rang dbang chen po rnam pa bcun ting 'dzinang chos la sobs
37b2(1): kyis zas/ sangs rgyas bzhin du rgyan cing rgya dang / yi dmas skyes pa dam pa'i lus sa 'bu'i ni spyod pa spyad/ nga sbyin pa la sogs pa rol byin /  sdang babang mang po tud tu byu/ 
37b3(1): lus shi nang tu gtsang dang te/ rnam par rtog pa shin tu spangs tshor dang rig pa'ang yod ma yin/ rang dang yid kyi dbang po myed/ shes rab dbang po rtag dga' skyid/ sbyin las sardzogs pa yon
37b4(1): lan rnams/ gtsang ma'i lus ni gang kang rgyas/ sangs rgyal ba'i gnas rten thob// gsang bas rgyanang pa'i gsang ba'i yul/ yul 'di nang na mchog phra dam/ nyi mas snang bar spyad pa myed
37b5(1): bangs rgyas dang ni byang chub kyi// 'od bskam pas su khyab par dang / da de shid tu 'dzid cing gas/ nyis rgya yongoms su 'a / rten dang mtshas kyi dus kyang byed// de dpanas smos
37b6(1): nga byed// gas brgyan mchog gi rgyal ba'i gnas/ ga'i rnams ni dkon par dgus/  blan byed pa su ba'i// macig 'das su ci ches nga // sa tha thams cad mngon pa sa/ sun
37b7(1): byor // kun zho rnam pa nas 'cha lapas/ rang bzhin sum dang rjod byed/ de lus spyad gcang dbabs/ 'das te 'di'i phul du skyes theg pa chen po gsang pas byad pa'i mi ge le'u lus te/ 
38a1(1): zang sa nas skyes pa'i lena'o// de'i tshe rdo rje'i zhing po byang chub sem sa dpa' chen pas/ yang tshangs pa'i rgyal po dung gtsug can la gnas se smras pa// gA'i bdang sogs par
38a2(1): gyis shig/ sems can gyi lus ni rdzas chus// rang bzhin byas te/ bya ba yod pa'i gzugs mang pos// 'khor mor lhan cig 'pho zhing g.yo'o// rnam pa mang po'i kha dog kun rdul phra mo'i phung
38a3(1): bo ni/ myi gtsang ba rnams spyad pa ste/ zhu ba dang khrag 'dres pa las red de/ grangs myed pa'i las kyis rtag par bkris pa bkab pa ni/ dbyi drug gi sdong po yal gshi nad tu rgyas pa dang tshungs
38a4(1): so// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis skyed cing 'phel bas/ bar bar ni zla ba dgu' lhag/ bang bar ni zla ba bcu lhag se/ las kyi stobs kyis mngags shing 'das nas/ skye ba skul te// 
38a5(1): rgyu skyod cing sbyang bas/ btsa' ba'i sgo mo nas mgo phyi nad ci log tu byungase/ 'brug pa'i mya ngan gyis gdungs nas/ grangs myed pa'i sdug sngal gyis nyon mongs so// lha'i bdag po sems can de
38a6(1): dgal la ni myi'i nang/ la la ni byol song dang / yi dgas dang / gnod sbyin dang / lA ma yin dang / lha ma yin la satshogs pa lasalangs te 'dir skyes so// la la gzungs sngags kyi mung
38a7(1): 'dug gi drang srong dang / de'i gnyen gshes kyang yin no// la la ni bsam gtan spyod pa las bsam gtan thub pa log sor te/ de lta bu la satshogs pa'i gnas las 'di'i nang du skyes so skyes zin nas
38a8(1): dbang po rnams cher skyes nas/ yid bzhin du te snye nang se// spun gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rkyend kyis/ las kyi rnams byas nas/ yang las de'i rgyus lam rnams kyi rgyud la 'khod lo skong nas/ ya la shes rab
38a9(1): yod pa ni dge' ba'i gshes gnyen dang phrad do// chos thos nas pasams shes shing tshor ba thob te/ yig 'bru dang nam par rtog pa la ma chags shing / nas pa las gra ngang ba sum gyi sgo mor zhugs nas ga yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'drung
38a10(1): mthong ste// nang gi zla ma'i gtsang dang ba/ nang gi bla ma'i yang bla ma'i gcad dang ba nas 'ongs te/ 'di gas pargyan gyi sangs rgyas kyi yul du 'dug go// 'bum grangs skyed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi nang chu spros pa bzhin du
38b1(1): te/ snang bdas pa de sa bu byaskyes bya 'i/ ga'i pags bu'i rnam lam sangs su rnas par 'a dudu patho ste/ sbyid skyes bu zhes byas/ phying bu'i nasas zhes byung de/ sangs rgyas kyi bu rnam
38b2(1): yang thos zhan sa tu 'ang ba slorjod to// lha'i das pa mngal gyi mdzod kyi lus ni/ song sa smras myi bden pa ste/ za ba nyid pas skyes pa ma yin/ mchis pa'i snying lo las las skyes pa yang ma tsham
38b3(1): de ci'i phying zhe sa/ ma rig pa'i srid pa'i las ri chu'i mtshan ma las med do// la sa'i sagom mngon par khong du tsun par nus so/ kun zad de ldag ma byed do// mying dang yi ge'i 'bru dang / ram par te
38b4(1): ba yang byed de/ myi de lta bu'i gcatsang kund kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul du skyes so// gA'i dbang po grub pa rnams/ ni ting nge 'dzin du la gnas sa sems la dmyigs pa yod na re ni gzugs dang / 
38b5(1): sgras smras shing dkrugs pas le nad pa dang / chags pa skyed de/ sra zhing khrang bar ma nus nas/ de lta bu'i mying ni dgyes shing g.yo ba'i lam zhes bya se/ ting nge 'dzind kyi dobs kyis
38b6(1): 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs dang / gzugs myed pa'i dang /  'du shes byed pa la thug pa'i sems can gyi gnas su skye'o// de lta bu'i myi ni ting nge 'dzin gyis bcings zhes bya'o// ya la zhig ting
38b7(1): de 'dzin du 'dug nas/ sems dge' bar thul nas len to// mchog dang bral bar nus na/ len pa gnyis dang bral zi nad na sems myi skye ste// de'i mying yang dag pa'i bden pa'i bzhugs pa spyod pa zhes
38b8(1): bya'o// la la zhig gsang bas rgyanang pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul du skye bar 'dod na/ rtag par yang dag par bden pa'i ting nge 'dzind 'di la 'dug shig/ theg pa chen po gsang bas rgya nang pa'i yi ge'i le'u/ 
38b9(1): bzhi ste/ rang gis byas pa mngon par snand pa'i le'u'o// / de'i tshe rdo rje snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang tshangs pa'i rgyal po dung gtsug can la sgo
38b10(1): nye smras pa/ lha'i bdag po sems la rnam brgyad yod do// byar bar du ni dgu yang yod do// ma rig pa dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi rgyu byas nas 'jig rten na kun sems kyi yang sems kyi chos
39a1(1): de dang / spa po rnams dang / skyenas mabaduzhi yas pa dang / maris pas sogs pas sdu cing bdad papa srung ba/ de'i ba ba'i bya ma'i sems ni sra ni za bas byag mas ga'i ngas pa 'a de
39a2(1): rgyu rkyen ni rnam pa bcu gnyis yod de/ dbang po khams kyis skye'o// mchog skye bar nus na skad cig tu zhigs shing myed do// tshangs pa'i khams las 'du shes myed pa'ang ma yin pa la thug pa kun rgyu rkyen las langs so// yang dag pa
39a3(1): gshegs pa gtan cing ni rgyu rkyen du rnams dang bral lo// lha'i dbang po phyi nang gi 'jig rten g.yo ba dang / myi gzho' ba'i chos kun bum pa la sogs pa dang tshungs te/ zhig cing myed pas rang bzhin byas so/ gA'i bdag pa
39a4(1): rnam par shes pas rnams ni za zhing shib pas 'bo zhing 'byung bzhin tu mya / dang sangs rgyas kyi khams ni 'jig rten gyi drang srong dang / rlung nga tu rnams kyis shes shing / mthong bar nus pa'i baspyod yul ma yin no// drang srong
39a5(1): myung 'dug kun ni srid pas bkris te/ sems kyi mtshan ma tha dad pad+ma mngon par rig par ma nus so// lha'i bdag po myi la la zhigagis yid bsgrims te ga be da'i chos la mchod de / glus mchod nas
39a6(1): mye la mchod de/ bar bar ni zla cig/ bar bar ni zla bzhi/ tshang bar de lta bur lo cig nas/ lo song du thug tu zi nad kyang tshangs pa'i khams su skye se// tha mar lhang ldog cig khor lo// lha'i bdag po khyod myi shes sam/ 
39a7(1): de gsum spyad pa'i 'bras bu thob pa ni/ dpeng shing chu skyes dang tshungs te/ rang bzhin yiswa myi khrang ngo // lha'i bdag po gsang bas rgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul ni / yang dag par gshegs pa rnams kyi rnam las thad
39a8(1): pa'i gnas yin te/ shes rab dang thub par thob bo// la la zhig rnam pa las tha dad pa la dang na/ dge' bar s+yad spang ba'i rigs so// lha'i bdag po gsang bas rgyand pa'i nang gi myi la ni gnyen shes dang skye shi'i nad myed
39a9(1): do// de'i sems ni las ni las rnams kyis bag chags kyis myi zhe nang myi chags so// me tog pad ma chu nas byung ba dang tshungaso nam kha la rdul myed pa dang tshungs/ nyi zla mthon por 'phags la dang se/ srin gyis
39a10(1): sgribs pa myed pa dang tshungs ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis khor mor sdus shing blangs nas/ gtsang ma'i tshul khrims 'bab pa la ni 'khru/ ye shes kyi sgom la ni thungs te yang dag pa'i bden pa thob nas
39b1(1): sems can gyi rnams dang / lnga phung gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa las tha dad te/ chos gzhan kun myed do// myig gi kha dog yod pas dkye nad kyi phyir rnam par shes pa yi// dpe' shing gi rgyu las me 'bang ba dang tshungs
39b2(1): lha'i bdag po 'ams thams cad ni myi bden pa'i rnam par shes pa las gyur / lcags dang khab long gi rdo bzhin du 'gul 'pho ba dang 'tshungs/ cig tu na sprigs rgyu ba dang / dri 'brog gi grong khyer dang / sha ba chu skom pa dang
39b3(1): chungs/ blun pos smra ma blangs na/ de'i nang nas rdzas la sogs pa spyad myed pa tha dad du 'gro ba'i sems kyang 'gyung zhing tha dad pa 'ba' zhig yin no// lha'i bdag po dri 'brog gi grong khyer kyi nang sa myi 'ang pos ban dun 'gro zhi brgyu ba dang
39b4(1): ci yang byed pa dang tshungs te/ mthong na bden pa me yin no// sems can gyi de lus 'gro 'dug kyang de rang tshungs/ rmi lam ni mthong ba dang chungs te/ srad na yod pa ma yin no// 'jig rten gyi mis phung po la sogs pa'i chos
39b5(1): mthong te/ tshor ba'i sems kyis snang bar brtags na/ byi myo nas song ba myi g.yo ba'o// lha'i bdag po la sogs pa rdul phra mo de/ phung po sems las bral na ci yang mthong ba myed do// 'jig rten gyi
39b6(1): rjes rnams las bzung bdeg tu rung ba la sogs pa'i chen po'i rigs las 'dus te/ ma grungang pa myed do// dper drung nad kyis btab pa brdungs te/ slang thugs pa'i bying rdzas rnam pa mang po mthodzan
39b7(1): cig tu na ro langs pa dang tshungs/ ci yang bya nus pa myed do// 'jig rten gyi tshogs rnams kun kyang de dang tshungs so// khyed sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis khrus pas zhib tu rtags pa'i rigs so// gA'i bdan
39b8(1): po 'jig rten thams cad kyis g.yo'i skyed pa'i rdzas ni/ dper chu'i dbu' ba dang chungs te lhan cig phungs pa las gzugs su gyurd to// bum pa dang gos la bgyogs pa'i 'du shes ni spyi rgyu dang chungs so/ skyong snu
39b9(1): rnams mnos pa ni na pa'i chu'i nang gi dbu ba dang drangs byam pa ni gang su skyes pa dang chungs ste/ nang nasra bskyed do// rnam pa shes pa ni myig 'phrul gyi dang bzhin te/ spong ba sdum dang sungs te/ snang bangs mo
39b10(1): 'bras kyi nang gi ga pa'i chos ni// rmims gyi khams dang brun te phrad pa'i sems las srung / cig tun phyig 'phrul gyi don dang / dri 'brog ga grong byed dang chungs te/ blud po smras pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bu
40a1(1): rtsagam masas su mthong tsam phun pa sems sa gyi ma pa rgya du ma dang/ mag pa sa bcom pa na gyi chu ci sdom pa tho phyin kyi/ 
40b1(1): shes pa dag sa ni/ ma da ca ma rgyam ma la rgya ma/ thun pa sems ca kyis byin na/ masanapas yang ban na sa kyis sdungasas te/ tsha di dang nga byung nis rgyas sha canatsha sku nasamamams ma
40b2(1): spong badzin du tsha sa pa gas pa des 'dri dang thong drum pasas ba sems dpa min pa'i skas pa// gabang bas byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi srab ni marob tu 'de ni ga pani / sums
40b3(1): na yin/  rnam pa nyas pas pa dab pa yin// gsang pa chos kyiyin/ shes ba dang du sgrub sang yi/ bdugs pa spyod pa rnams kyi ti nga pa'i sa yin de/  bo da par chu
40b4(1): bas myi zhig myi rengs so// chus ni rla par myi nus / rlung gis ni skam bde myi nus te bum pa la sogs pas dang chu snga/ 'grus pa'i mthu sa grub la mad bzhin slang chags zhing zhib pa dang tshungs so// 
40b5(1): 'dra ba'i rgyu dang myi 'dra ba'i rgyu rnams kyis grub cing tshugs pa dang tshungs so// 'dra ba'i rgyu dang myi 'dra ba'i rgyu rnams kyis grub cing tshugs pa myi tshungs so// de ci'i phyir zhen/ phyi mo dang yan lag gi rnams kyu dad pa'i chos yin no// 
40b6(1): bya bo dang rgyu rnams so so tha dad pa'i phyir ro// gsang bas rgyand pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul ni rnam par shes pa las zlog pa yin te/ rnam par rtog pa'i sems las 'das pas myi bden pa'i sems rnams 'gro ba'i
40b7(1): mas payin no// gsang bas rgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul ni yang dag pa shegs pa'i gnas yi te/ thog ma 'ang myed tha ma'ang byed/ drus bla moms skyes pa yang ma yin/ gnyid las skyes pa'ang ma
40b8(1): cho shing nga tud ga dbang 'gro lnga skyes pa mong sa yin mngo pa'i sreng pasas skyes pa yang ma mig dad srung pa skyed po'i 'i shes myol zhing 'angs pa yin te/ 'ad pa'i lams dang / gzungs myod padang / 
41a1(1): de byed pa ni gcungs nigs byung / sangs rgyud pa'isangs rgyas kyi lus pamang thub pa ni snang ba'i 'bas pa pan/ rgyas ma ba nyi saras nas dzad pa maca / 
41a2(1): byal mags pa'i phyi ma sacos skyed kyi lal gadrinas ma ba pa so sa kyi nus mo shi gags pa kyin kyi dag pa gshegs pa ga pa cu lung 'i tshang da/ 
41a3(1): yin no// nges pa rnams pa dang 'ji gro ba thams cad pa ga rten gyilas dang / sams yi pa la smad pa las dang / mas ma yin pa'i don pagang de drus pa rnams pade skyid par zab par bya'o// de nas tshig se lu ma
41a4(1): byin gi ma ca ma ni dang ga sems ma shi/ byems pasarnams sa rdog gnyis me thong pa dang / rlangs mi rlom sems tong sgog nyis yong bas/ sems kyi rdzas dmas nga gyi
41a5(1): mthong / sarabs de ba spang bajugs pas / rang gigis 'angam nus padamamang chog kyi rnams mang 'o// ku kyang rang gi sems kyis byasabub pas gos gtus rdzu /  ku kyang ni ngo'i rtsi ni
41a6(1): drang srong shes rab chung zhing gnang ga snang zhing mngon par shes kyi nus/ yang dag bden pa'i don btang te/ rnam par rtog pa 'i lam du 'gro sems la ngo bo nyid yod de/ me long nang gi gzugs rnyed par
41a7(1): dang tshungs/ chu nang zla ba byung dang tshungs ying tog can gyis spu'i khong lo mthong / spu'i khor lo nor bu se mo do// de kun ci yang myed pa na/ ling tog nad kyi myig las byung / de lta bu du mngon bar bas nang/ bum pa gos
41a8(1): kun rang gis shes/ sems can yang ni de bzhin no// song ba'i myi bden chags pa'i mye// 'khong mor bzung dang kla myi shes// sems cad dang ni bum la sogs/ lus gzugs rnam pa mang po ni/ phyi dang na logs myi mthun
41a9(1): yang / thams cad kun ni sems las g.yos/ gsang rgyan dam pa thub 'di/ gnas gzhan na ni yod ma yin/ la las spyod pa nus yod na/ sa rnams las su 'byung 'das te/ la la 'dod pa'i rang dbang dang / gzugs
41a10(1): kyi khams kyi lha rnams dang / 'du shes myed pa'i pho brang dang / 'og myin lha'i gnas su skye/ song pa'i rnam shes ci yang myed/ 'du shes yod myed me yin pa/ de lta bu'i sa rnams na yang / bkres kyis rim par skams
41b1(1): 'dod gsal// mtha' yun ma yin de la gnas te/ mod bzhin 'ongs te gsang rgyadang skyes/ sangs bu mang khong ba bskong / rang dbrang du ni rol cing the nang / khyod kyis thub par de srung rigs/ ci'i phyi ru gnyen shes chags// 
41b2(1): dang zla ba 'acu / dbang po rnams ni lad kyis grub ga dus rang la'i mangs nas byung / dpe' du srin bu bzhin du 'gus / de las med skyes pa dang / sems kyi mngon par shes sa zug/ ras su sems can la rtags pa/ 
41b3(1): skyes so chog tu'ang de bzhin no// pha dang ma'i grangs kyang myed/ bu dang chung ma'ang de bzhin no// 'jig rten thams cad zad bar du/ ma 'khor ma 'khyab granas myed do// dpel du bud myed masho pa bzhin/ rmi lam glo bung bu ban+d+ha
41b4(1): bzhin no// blangs te bad kar dga' zhing skyid/ sod bzhin slad du skyed pa mtho // snying rje byi dga' bdag myi theg/ blo bu ni nyal las sad// bu de theg sa skyes pa dang / tha mar byed pa yong ma mthong
41b5(1): gcig tu rmil sa ri lung dang / dbye dang khyad dang grong khyim dang / byi ba la seng po kun gang ste/ las kyi chos nas mang byed pa// lan tshun cig gis na gcig mthong na/ 'jig rten ci yang myong ba yang / 
41b6(1): ba las su sang dang tshungs/  thams cad kun ni yod ma yin// / 'dod pa mang po yod pa'i phyi/ skyi las bud byed kha dog mthong / 'dangs dang bud byed rab tu babang / gos dang chen pa kun shes dang / rmyi las tu ni shin
41b7(1): tu dga'// bsad pa dang ni mthong ba byed// 'jig rten thams cad kun kyi don// kun kyang de dang tshungs pa mngon// rgyal po gral dang ngamag gi khros// pha ma la tshogs gnyen bshes rnams/ ma 'das 'gro ba kun sbrus
41b8(1): bas// ngo bo nyid kun bde pa srid// khyod kyis 'di ltar thub pas// pa'i byer du 'grus phyi spyad/ grangs myed pa dang nyan pos dang // rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub rnams// song zhing dper bam gdas khod de
41b9(1): ri 'chal khong mor stod myi g.yol ka la la 'o ma'i mtsho skyil dang / 'bal ya'i gnas su 'khod ring ba dang ni byin da dang / 'ga' phye dang ni min da la/ ke la dang ni ba li kli gangs ri la ni thug par gnas
42a1(1): lalas dag la ba'i sdong po dang / ba ri la ta ma dang / ku bi la'i shing drung khod phyed ni pa li'i seng na 'khod/ 'jam bu'i 'bras bu'i ngo bro dang // myi 'chi ba'i kha zas za/ rdzu 'phrul rnams ni mchog cing 'jal/ 'khor mor/ 
42a2(1): rtog pa 'di sprod do// 'das te song dang ma 'ongs rkus// rtag par me tog pad mar 'dug/ dkyil mo 'khrung du lus myi g.yo'o/ drang po thub pas khor mor rtags dbang po rnams ni dge' btul bsdus/ khams mang po la yong myi
42a3(1): gyis// dpe' du ba lang lcags kyos sbyar/ 'dod dang bral zhing ting nge 'dzin / 'jig rten 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni/ thub pa thams cad kund kyi nang / sangs rgyas thub pa dag dri ma myed/ rkam dang srid kun gsal te kye/ gzugs
42a4(1): myed thub pa gnas kun kyang / 'du shes myed pa'i bsam gtan dang / nyi zla dang ni pad mo mthong / chu dang me dang na mkha'i mtshan/ rnam par rtog pa de bral na/ de sems myi g.yo myi 'khrul lo// de nas ting nge 'dzin gnas su grangs myed
42a5(1): sangs rgyas mang po mthong / cig char lhan cig phyag rkyang te/ chus su de'i spyi bor blugs/ de ltar sangs rgyas su ru bzhugs/ thams cad kun da ni sdang zhing tshong// kha dog mang po cog gtsang lus/ myong ba bzhin du khyad
