42a6(1): bang gnang / rang dbang rnams la stobs kyis tha dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi gizungs sngags dang / de la sogs kyi yon tan gyis/ kun kyang / ma grub ma 'byor nga myed/ gzugs rnams kun ni bral shigs so// rdul phran/ 
42a7(1): ga bzhin du thug par rtag/ rang gi ngo bo ci yang myed/ dpe' du sag dang ri bong nga dang chungs// rnam pa myed cing rngam pa myed/ phung po la phung po yod kyang de bzhin/ myig 'phrul rgyu mas byas dang chungs// thams cad kun kyang de bzhin te/ 
42a8(1): de'i nang na las 'bras byed/ las byed pa'i myi yang myed/ 'jig rten byed pa nus pa'ang myed/ yod myed bya ru lus zin na/ byed nus pas su byed pa sdang/ ri lha'i mying ni byed nus myitshig 'dis su ni nyes 'khrul grub / bshang pa/ 
42a9(1): gtsang dag ma yin te/ ji ltar yod ces byang zinang na/ chu dang sa'i 'od lo dang / sems can dang ni 'jig rten kun/ rims kyis rnam par byed par bkram/ phyogs pa'i rnams ni kun tha dang / phan tshun res kyis song zhing 'ongs/ 
42a10(1): su 'is dbang po rnams kun byas pa/ de la sartogs pa kun nam rtog/ tshig nas cig tu 'gyung myi mthun 'o ma zho dang mar bzhin te/ de lta bu'i skye 'dug shi / las dang las ma yin pa su 'di la myi bden chags pa skye/ 
42b1(1): thub rtag par 'di la brtags/ rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer 'dra/ sems can thog ma myed nas su smos pa myed pa'i bag chags kyis/ rnam par rtog pa skyes shing g.yos/ nyes pa rnam pa mang po kun dbang po rnams ni rgyu ma
42b2(1): bzhin/ khams rnams kun ni rmi lam 'dra/ byed phod pa dang byed dang las/ thub pas su ni rnam myi rtag/ shes rab chung zhing zhand pas ni/ myi bden ngan rnams skye ba mthong / yod par 'dzind dang byed nus pas/ 'jig rten
42b3(1): thams cad kun byas so// bang bar nor bu ma ni dang / seng rdul dang ni ser rdul rdo/ bya dang ri dgas gzugs tha dad / tsher ma'i rtse mo phra zhing rdo/ de rnams su yIsma shes zer/ byed pa myed par mngon par shes 'jig rten rgyal ba'i
42b4(1): nyid ma yin/ rdul phran rnams kyis rkyen gyis byas/ rgyu myed pa 'ang de bzhin no// rang gis yod par nus pa'o// sems khrugs myi bden chags pas ni/ de'i mtshan nyid myi shes pas/ las ni las ma yin du 'dzind
42b5(1): de lta bur ni rnam par rtog/ 'o ma'i nang du 'dug zhugs bzhin/ de bzhin du ni thun par gyur da/ chos kyi rnam grangs kun de bzhin rnam rtog rtag par cig char langs/ chos kyi ngo bo skye ma yin/ dengs shing
42b6(1): shig pa 'ang yin/ sred pas rig pa 'ang myi nus so// mang po Ta/ dad rnam par rtog/ thub pas zhib tu rtags pa'i rigs/ 'jigarten rtsegasasangs 'ab zhig go// las dang las ma yin be ru/ 'di la
42b7(1): las myed pa sems shig/ phyogs pa rnams ni nges song 'ong / dpe' dra nyi ma zla ba bzhin// nam khar 'dug cing rten pa myed/ rlung gi phyogs su pho zhing 'gyur/ las kyi ngo bo rab prasasangs/ gas brgya nad pas ni mthong / 
42b8(1): bar nus spyad pa spyod pa'i zhugs myi/ de yis bcing du myi zug go/ dpe' du mes su shing sregs bzhin / skad cig me rdul thal bar byas/ shes rab mes su las shing sregs/ de lta bu ru mngon par shes/ 
42b9(1): dpe' du yang me mun gsal bzhin/ cig bsams pas su zad lhag myed/ las rnams kyi ni myi ldan mun/ skal pa mang po'i bag chags 'dus/ thub pa'i shes rab mang me rtags/ skad cig tu kun gsal myed// theg pa
42b10(1): chen po gsang bas rgyand pa'i le'u lnga ste// / rnam par rtog pa zhugs pa spyod pa'i le'u'o// / de'i tshe rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phal mang po la sgo ba
43a1(1): des pa rnams dper mi zhig stong bden pa'i bar 'dug nas/ 'jim pa dang gyo mo dang rA dang shing la sogs pas khyim byas pa dang / tshungs te zin nas rtags te bltas na/ rdzas cig gi nang khyim thob pa myed do// yang
43a2(1): cig tu sor mor mang po lhan cig tu bcangs na khu chung ngu 'gyur ro// sor mo dang bral khu tshur btsal na yod pa myed do// dmag mang po dang / shing rta dang ka khang dang yul dang ri dang tshal dang / bum pa dang gos la satshogs pas dzas
43a3(1): thams cad kun 'dus shing las byung ba yin te/ shes rab can gyis rtags na kun rmi lam gyi don dang tshungs so// tha dad pa'i 'gro ba rnams kyi lus kyi khyim yang de dang tshungs te kham mang 'asdus thegs pa'o// dper na ri mthon pa/ 
43a4(1): g.yang za zhing snying la myi bde ba dang / khyim rul pa dang tshungs so// myi skye myi shi ba'i ni bdag kyang ma yin/ gzhan yang ma yin no/  dri ba'i grong khyer dang tshungs so// gris ma dang tshungs sprin dang tshungs/ smrig rgyu dang tshungs/ ri mo'i gzugs dang tshungs te/ 
43a5(1): sa nad cing ltar rung mod kyi/ ngo bo nyid rtag par gtsang dang ste// lta ba thams cad/ dang / yongs su bral nas rnam par rtog pa myed do// dmus long dang / grum po cig gis cig bsangs la 'gro ba dang 'tshungs te/ gdon myi
43a6(1): za ba'i ngo bo nyid byed pas rdul phra mo sa thug gi bar du bye ba shig kyang stong ba'i myi yod du zad kyi/ bden pa'i rdzas yod myed do// thug pa rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i sems zhes bya'o// gzugs dang dgra' la sasogs pa'i chos la
43a7(1): tshor ba'i sebs ma skyed de tshor ba'i sems dang bral zi nang na/ sems btang zhing zhi nas/ bde bar rnam pa la tha dad te/ lta ba mang po myi lend to// rtag pa shin tu zab pa'i bsam gtan dang / thub pa bsam pa sbyang ba spyod pa la gnas so// 
43a8(1): sngags 'chang la sogs pa'i bud byed bzang mo yon 'bul tu yongs kyang / rmi lam gyi gdon rtag pa dang tshungs te/ zhen cing chags pa myed do// / lus 'di na 'dug mod kyi/ drang srong dang mur 'dug sngags 'dzinang pa'i mying dang / tshangs pa
43a9(1): lha'i kun gyis spyi bor mthong bar myi nus so// de lta bu'i mying ni ring po myi thogs par/ ba ni rin po che'i pho brang gi nang du skyes te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi phyis ro lad cing yon tan mang po dang ldan no// bzhugs pa spyod pa'i chos 'di ni sems
43a10(1): chen po spyad pa'i khams yin gyis// de bas sbyangab tu rgya chen po'i sems skyed pa'i rigs so// sems chen po'i myi ni myur te/ 'od snang ba'i phod du skyes nas/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang ka gti mug rnams dang bral te/ gsang bas rgyan
43b1(1): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul du phyi nang to// yul 'di ni yangs shing rgya che la phra dam stong zhing myi g.yo' bas/ rga shi dang rgud pa'i mya ngan ni nad myed de/ mtshan ma rnams yongs su sayang se nas/ rnam par shes pa'i yul ma yin te/ myi bden pa chags pa'i
43b2(1): myis thob par myi nus so// nges pa'i rnams yul 'di gtsang dang se/ zhugs pa spyod pa'i 'dug pa'i gnas so// la la dkor gus par sems na 'khrugs par spongs la 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug can de nga dang nga'i gnas bral bI
43b3(1): rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags la sogs pa mya ngan khrugs pas kun tu blangs so// khams blangs nas tshong pa gnyis skyes te/ bud myed bzang mo dga' bar rung ba la 'dod pa mang ba yod pas thong na chags pa skyes nas 'dod// 
43b4(1): pa'i sems kyis slad bkrugs te 'gro yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / zan za yang rung / nyal yang rung / cig tu de la sems te/ gzhan sems par myed par bud myed de'i gzugs rtag par sems la snang ste/ de'i khams byas nas rdzas kyi rnyog
43b5(1): dkrug dang tshungs so// de lta bas na khams la skam chags pa'i myi rigs so// nges pa'i rnams dper myi zhig phyugs dang / sha ba dang lug rgod dang du yod pa'i ri dgas mthong na/ stag dang ri bong lar myed par shes pa skyes
43b6(1): de la byugs la sogs pa rwa yod pa ma mthong bu zin nga na/ sag dang ri bong la sogs ba la myed par mthong gdon myi za bar skye'o// 'jig rten gi ba ma mthong ba yang de dang chungs te/ myi bden pa thob pa yod pas na rnam par rtog pa
43b7(1): g.yos so// phyis de'i ngo bo bcas na rnyed pa du myi rung // mod bzhin smras pa/ chos so cho ga gdon myi za ba yin no// rnam par rtog pa'i sems dang ma bral bar ni rtag pang de lta bu'i myi gnyam myi stobs pa'i tshor ba skye'o// des pa'i shes rab kyis zhib tu
43b8(1): dad pa bzhin tu la la ni myi'i nang du skyes te/ 'khor lo'i rgyal po byed cing rjid kyi mthu' chen po yod pas na mkha phan tshun du 'gro'o// la la ni nyi zla'i pho brad dang / gnas ngos bzhi'i lha rgyal po dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha dang / gzung ma'i lha dang / gnas
43b9(1): bden lnga dang / rang dbang lha'i dbang po'i ma ni'i mdzod kyi pho brang du skye'o// sa la ni gzugs kyi khams kyi tshangs pa'i lus la satshogs pa'i skar skye'o// thub pa spyad pa spyod pa'i tshangs pA rmA nas khrug pa myed pa'i tshangs pa myed/ dgel ba mtho ga dgel
43b10(1): 'byung ba/ 'og sbyin gnas dang / song pa'i gnas dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang / ci yang myed pa'i gnas dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin gyi gnas su skyes te// der 'dug nas 'dod chags khyad kyis gsal te/ de ras
44a1(1): gsang dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul tu skyes nas rtag par thub pa dam pa bgrod de/ yang dag pa'i rnams las tha dad par phyind te/ de nas rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang tshig le'ur bcad de/ 
44a2(1): smras par/ bum pa chag pa'i rgyas/ gyo mor gyu da dang tshungs/ skad cig tha dad de/ khor mor rtag myed yin/ sa bon rgyus su myu gu skyesamyu gu skyes sa bon zhig/ dpe' du rdza mkhan gyis/ 'jim pas bum byas tshungs/ 
44a3(1): 'jim bsha ba yin/ bum pa dang gzugs dang tshungs// gzhan dang snyan cig spyang // 'azugs kun 'jim pas byas// mes sregs mchos bzhin// 'o bdun gzugs su skyes// mnga' smug la song skyes/ 
44a4(1): ba la lkog ma skyes// myi gtsang gnas yas su// srin bu spang mar skyes// 'jig rten nang na ni/ 'bras bu yod rgyu 'dra// rgyu yang myi 'dra la// kun kyang rgyu zhigs rgyus// 'bras bu yod pa skyes// rdul phran rnams kyi rgyus/ 
44a5(1): nyid ni zhig kyi 'gyur/ myi bden bya myi rigs// de ltar rnam parartog/ bya ru nus pa myed/ nang na rgyal ba'i nga // nga'i yid kyang myed/ khams dang dbang po rnams// 'dus tshogs kyis rgyu byas// 
44a6(1): rnam par shes pa skyes// shes rab can gyi thabs/ sa rnams khas par shes/ mya ngan khrug la sogs/ bdud rnams thams cang shig/ 'jig rten skam sred yod/ bad kan sgrub ci phrang dang
44a7(1): chungs// snas sred gsal 'i nang na/ bcings pa kun grol lo// sbrul gyis dug byas ltung / zhe sdang dug de bzhin/ skye ga'i lam gyi nang / mya ngan gnod pa mang / des pa rnams 'dod na// de 'a gsas bar/ 
44a8(1): khyos// so so sems 'grus skyes/ spyad spyod bzhugs pa spyod// / theg pa chen po gsang pas rgyand pa'i yi ge le'u drug ste// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa sgreng bcugs pa'i le'u'o// de'i tshe rdo
44a9(1): rje snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yang phal mang po la sgo ba/ nges pa'i rnams nga dran pa nas sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste/ stobs byin nas thub pa dam pa mthong myong ste// phyogs bcu'i yul sang de
44a10(1): lus dang / 'jig rten gyi grub myong pa'i myi dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'a'od pa'i gnas snang bar mthong nas/ de sred kyi gnas kyi dang sa gsang bas rgyad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi lus sa mchon
44b1(1): tu bde skyid de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu grangs kyang rdul phra mo bzhin te pad ma me tog gi snying po la gnas nyes/ ngas de'i tshe sems cig tu yang ltas nas/ mdo bzhin thub pas nas byung na/ bdag gi lus dang / 
44b2(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsang bas rgyand pa'i yul na 'khor pa mthong ngo // de nas yang rnam par tha dad pa'i mdzodapa/ pho brang gi nang ma 'dug pa mthong ngo // de'i tshe chung dpag pa ni sor mo'i tshigs su cig tsam ste/ kha dog dang
44b3(1): gzugs snang dag ni a tar san mo tog dang chungs/ yang cig tu na na ma kha'i nang gi gtsang dag pa'i zla ba gang ba dang tshungs so// ras de mthong nas mod bzhin bsams te smras pa/ 'di su'i phyir 'di lta bu'i don bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i don yong ngo // snyam du bsam/ 
44b4(1): ba byas pa'i tshe/ bdag gi lus de'i lus kyi nang na 'dug pa mthong ste/ de'i nang nas 'jig rten thams cad khyab par mthong ngo // de nas me tog pad mo'i snying po'i nang gi grangs myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis yang 'di lta
44b5(1): bu mthong nas/ kun 'di snyam gyi sems skyes so// 'di ni yod dkon te bsaDaM gyis myi khyab bo// de nas lha'i nang gi yang lhas don bya'o chog zin nas/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis lhar smras nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sags
44b6(1): pa kun kyang sngon gyi bzhin no// ngas de'i tshe de lta bu'i yod dkon pa'i rdo rna mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyar zhing sa nad pa rnaMs mang po ni sangs rgyas kyi khams yin te/ bsam gyis myi khyab bo// nges pa'i rjes
44b7(1): yang dag par shegs pa/ gna' byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i tshe thog ma rab tu dga' ba'i sa nas/ chos kyi srin gyi sa la thug gi bar du/ bzhud sngags kyi tshig gi bzhung zad pa myed pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin
44b8(1): la sogs pa dang / yid la skyes pa'i lus dang / rang dbang rnam brgyad dang / mthun pa bzhin du 'byung zhing do yod nas rtse nad pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob ste// mying 'od snang ba zhes bya ba// de lta bu la sogs pa dang / kun 'byor grub zin
44b9(1): na yang sbyar te/ gsang dag pa dang / drang pong chod grub te/ gsang bas rgyand pa'i yul du 'dug nas/ yid dang khrod pa bzhin du spyar sprul te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs dang / mtshan ma rnam pa
44b10(1): mang pos 'jig rten thams cad dang 'khor bar gnas te/ dam pa'i chos kyi khor lo skong nas/ sems rnams kyi gti mug gi mun pa myur ba te bas leng nas/ dgel ba'i chos sbyong zhing 'askyod par bya'o// bang bar byang chub seMs
45a1(1): dpal la las sangs rgyas kyi lus kyi mtshan mthong / shi ri pa tsa la sogs pa mchog tshang bar rgyan nas/ rang bzhin gyi 'od snang ba ni me h+ya nad pa dang tshungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / me tog pad mo gas dag
45a2(1): pa'i dang tshungs pa'i pho brang na 'khod do// rtag pa'i thub pa dam pa bgrod cing bde skyid pa byas so// bar bar ni sdong chen gyi myi 'am ci / rgyal po rgya stong 'bum rnam pa mang po spya da cing sprul pa sa nang te/ zla ba'i 'od snang ba dang rdungs
45a3(1): khas ul ka kun tu rgya nang pa mthong ngo // bar bar ni grangs myed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bu shes rab khas shing mthod pa mtshan mang pos rgyand pa spyi bo rin po che'i thod gtsug gis rgya dang / sus la se mo de thogs te/ gnas
45a4(1): bden lha logs pa'i yang lha rnams kyi pho brang du 'bod pa mthong ngo // bar bar ni kun tu bzang po brjid kyi stobs chen po yod pas/ shes rab po mchog dang thogs pa myed pa'i yid myur thob pa/ lus kyi mtshan 'od snang ste/ 
45a5(1): malapa zhig bskrun pa'i zla myed zla ba dag pa gang ba dang tshungs pazlamagasang bas rgyand pa'i drang po thub pa'i mtsho la 'dug mod kyi/ kha dog gi gzugs mang po bstanang pas 'khor bar ma khyab pa myed de/ mdzangs
45a6(1): yang bzhugs pa spyod pa'i 'khan po yod pa la/ sangs rgyas kyi bu mang po rnams kyis khong bar sko rang te/ bsam gtan stong pa myi g.yol ba la gnas pa ni gnyid kyis log pa dang tshungs par mthong nas rmongs shing bying
45a7(1): sme ba dang / la la sartogs pa'i nyes pa dang bral te ga grangs myed pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi zha 'bring byas myong ngo// yang bde bar ni 'dren pa'i khan po chen po byas te/ lnga las babs te skyes nas khyim nas byung te/ nyon mongs pa
45a8(1): spyad nas sems cig la drang po gnos nas mya ngan las 'das par byind de/ nam kha'i nang na 'gro ba dang / smod pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis sbyang ba bas da te/ 'dzam bu'i gling nas/ 
45a9(1): 'og byir gyi gnas kyi sgra dang / myi la sogs pas gus par myi lta ba myed par mthong ngo // nges pa'i rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni/ sangs rgyas nyag cig gis mkhyen te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni rang gi
45b1(1): bla ma ste zla byed pa'o// shag kya thub pa ni myi'i nang na seng ge ngang chungs/ rdzi thob zin pa ni byed sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kun kyis kyang thob bo// de lta bas na nges pa la sogs pa gsang zhing yid ches paskyed pa'i rigs so// yid ches
45b2(1): pa ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo se/ yang dag par grol lo// myi des pang ni khor lo'i 'phrul gyi rgyal po dang / rgyal phran chung ngu byas/ bang bar ni tshangs pa'i lha la sogs pa'i pho brang tu skyes te lha'i bdag po byas so// sangs rgyas kyi bu
45b3(1): de rnams kyis yang sbyar da te kha gyon 'grus pas me tog mang po'i snying po gsang dang dI sangs kyi yul du byang chub sems dpa'i rnams dang / me tog pad mo la 'khrul te/ skyes nas theg pa cig gi lam tu zhugs te/ 'dod chags la sogs
45b4(1): ba'i bag chags dang bral nas 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bdud btul phab bo// yang thon 'grus ni sems las sngar gzhan myed de sangs rgyas la gus shing lci bas yul sa kun tu yang dang po/ nges pa rnams la sogs pa sangs rgyas bye
45b5(1): par 'dod na/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs rus dag 'byord par byos shig/ da rigs dus dag zin ma yang dag par lung bas nang nas bla na myed pa'i tshor ba grub yang dag ste/ spyad pa spyod pa thams cad kun la phan thogs
45b6(1): nas/ dpeng sa chen pos sems can thams cad kyi gnas bya ba dang tshungs so// cig tu na sma khas pas sman mang du spyar te/ yul dang kharang kun khor bar sems kyis ra mda' byas shing sos dang tshungs so// 
45b7(1): sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin te/ snyam snyoms par bas nad slab ste/ sems la phan par rtog pa myed do// sems can la la zhig gis lus las bcad gtubs su zind kyang sems la g.yo ba myed do// nges pa'i rnams phyi nang gi/ 
45b8(1): khams ni sems kyis spyad pa ste// kun kyang rnam par shes pa 'ba' shig gis smad cing 'khrugs te// de'i nang na myed/ nga'i sems kyang myed pa mthong ngo // gnod pa nus pa dang gnod pa dang gnod pa'i yo byad thams cad kun ni yid
45b9(1): kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yin te/ kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la rten pas de lta bur rnam par rtog go// dper na myi la la zhig gis nor bu nyi ma la bzhag pa dang / gnubs pa'i rgyus myed phyung dang tshungs so/ me de ro
45b10(1): dang gtsubs pas skyes pa ma yin/ myis byas pa'ang ma yin no// sems dang yid rang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'ang de dang tshungs te/ dbang po'i khams kyis yid byas nas 'dus tshogs nas de lta bu'i ngo bo skyes te
46a1(1): smrig rgyu dang rmi lam dang / sgyu mas slad dkrugs te blangs pa dang myi 'tshungs so// rus sbal gyi spra dang / ri bong gi rA dang yang myi mthun no// / gnas lugs kyi me dang tshungs se// chu las skyes sam/ glog las skyes sam// sprin les
46a2(1): skyes sam/ de gang las skyes pa rtogs par shes nus pa byed do// rdza mkhan gyi bum pa la sogs pa byas pa dang tshungs so// 'dod pa la sogs pa'i sems kyi chos sems dang lhan cig skyes pa 'ang de bzhin no// nges pa'i rnams sems kyi
46a3(1): mtshan nyid ni bsam gyis myi khyab na/ gsang bas rgyand pa'i nang gi myis khas par shes shing mthong nus so// nges pa'i rnams sems can thams cad la kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa phyi mo nas yod do// gang rgyas shing gtsang dag nas 'jig rten nas byung te/ 
46a4(1): 'das nas mya ngan las 'das dang mthun no// dpe' zla ba snang ba dang tshungs te yulalo chog tu byung na/ 'jig rten gyi myis skyes pa dang bri ba yod par mthong // zla ba'i ngo bo nyid ni skye zhing 'grib pa 'ang myi 'ong ngo // rnam par shes
46a5(1): ba'i mdzod kyang de bzhin no// sems can thams cad kyi nang khyab par sand kyang ngo bo nyid rtag par gtsang zhing rgyas te/ myi skye myi bri na// shes rab myed pa'i myi dben pa'i chags pa skye'o// la la zhig 'di la drang
46a6(1): bong mngon par shes nus na/ zag pa myed pa thob ste/ gnas zlog pa dang tha dad pa'i chos 'di ni thob pa shin du mkhas te/ zla ba srin gyi nang na 'dug pa dang tshungs ngo bo nyid khor mor snang ngo // rnam
46a7(1): ts+tsha bar shes pa'i mdzod kyang de bzhin te 'gyur ba'i rnams kyang shes pa'i khams kyi bag chags kyi nang na rtag par gsang dag se// chu bo'i nang na shing yod pa chu 'bab pas khyer zhing 'khor ba dang / chu dang shing gnyis kyang rang bzhin gyi gzugs tha dad
46a8(1): do// rnam par shes pa'i mdzod kyang de bzhin te/ rnam par shes pa rnams kyis bag chags kyang rtag par lhan cig mod kyi sa 'dres pa'o// nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yang khong mdo zhend pa dang / gtsang ma'i chos thams cad
46a9(1): kyi rten byas so// 'phrul gyi myi rnams kyi chos kyi skyed pa bstand te/ ting nge 'dzind kyi khams la 'dug go// myi dang lha la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul phyogs pa kun gyi rgyu byas te/ rtag par theg pa rnams kyi sa bon gi ngo bo nyid byas
46a10(1): lal zhig gis rig cing tshor bar nus na/ sangs rgyas kyi lam grub bo// nges pa'i rnams sems can thams cad la yon tan ldan par yod do// rdzid kyi stobs rang dbang pog tsha ba'i bgegs kyi nang du skye ba'ang yod do// kur zhi'i rdo
46b1(1): bar shes pa'i long por de'i nang na 'dug cor gnas nyon byas na// den sems can thog pa myed pa'i dus kyi 'ams kyi las rnams kyi bag chags yin te// rang gis skye zhing 'phel nus so// rnam par shes pa bdun po gzhan yang skye zhing 'pheg
46b2(1): bar nus so// tha dad du 'gro ba rnams myed do// mchog la chags te nang logs kyi nga nus so// des pa'i rnams yid lus kyi nang na 'dug pa'i rlung myung pos spyod pa dang tshungs te/ las kyi rlung gis bus shing spyod na dbang po rnams la chung
46b3(1): par yod de/ rnam par shes pa bdun dus cig na dpa' dang tshungs par langs na/ myung 'dug gis 'phags pa'i ngo bo nyid du bzung ste// rdul phra mo dang / rang dbang dang dus la sogs pa kun gtsang dag pa'i kun zhi rnam par shes par 'dzind to// 
46b4(1): nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi las kyi stobs kyis dbang du byas te/ sred pas rgyu byas pas 'byor grub bo// 'jig rten de snyed gyi rnam pa myi bden par 'dzind par myi byed pa ral chags pas de'i rnam par
46b5(1): shes pa'i mtshan chung zhing phra bas rnam par shes pa dga' ste/ yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong bas sems slad de/ ma rig nas dbang po'i khams/ kyi yid sred pa chags pa skyes so// de nas rdo rje snying po byang chub sems
46b6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen thos / yang tshig le thung bcad de smras pa/ khyed la sogs pa sangs rgyas bu/ ci phyir myi mthong myi thos pa'i rnam shes mdzod ni myi nyid gtsang dag/ kun kyi lus ni gnas shing de/ 
46b7(1): ma la sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / sangs rgyas rgyan 'khor rgyal ldan pa// bde bar gzugs rnams mang po byas// 'jig rten thams cad kun gyis mthong // dpe' du song gtsang zla ba bzhin// skar ma mang pos 'khor bar
46b8(1): sgo dang // kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa kun// de lta bu'i lus nang 'dug/ dpe' du 'dod khams lha dbang tshungs/ 'khor bcas rin chen po brang ro yang // mtsho la sogs pa'i lha rnams ni chu'i nang
46b9(1): na rang dbang yod// shes pa'i mdzod ni 'dzind rten gnas// de yang de dang tshungs par mngon// sa bzhin du ni rdzas med skyes// sems de las ni byung ba mang // dpe' ru nyi ma rgyal po bzhin/ 
46b10(1): cher lhag rin cen pho brang bteg/ ri rab rgyal po khor bar skong // namakha'i mtha' 'og khyab par sdang / lha dang 'jig rten myi rnams 'jig rten kun// mthong na gus par phyag kyang 'tshal/ shes mdzod sangs
47a1(1): rgyas sa'i nang // de'i gzugs kyang de dang tshungs// sa bcu spyod pa nam mang spyod/  theg chen gyi lam mngon par bas nad// sems can thams cad sbyin pa byin// rtag par yang dag shegs la sod/ 
47a2(1): byang chub sems dpa'i lus la gnas// de stabs na byang chubs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub rnams// kun kyang kun gzhi'i rnam shes bying // sung sgoring dang phyis lung sgo// rgya che kun gzhi'i rnam par shes// des su dra
47a3(1): bong d+hor grub// gsang rgyan gyi ni thub pa rnams// dam pa'i thub pa dang yang thung // kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la// snang mngon rtag cing mthong yang nus// sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// nyan thos dang ni lam tha dang / 
47a4(1): gzhung mthong ni myi byed// rtog ga chog min ma shes 'di'o// nas pashes khams nam mang po/  thams cad kun ni sems las gyu dang / bu mgos mchogs pa'i rdzas mang po// de'i ngo bo nyid ni go// kun kyang
47a5(1): kun gzhi'i rnami shes gnas// sems can smad cing 'khrugs mthong bas/ bag chags rnam pa kun gyis su// grang ngo cho ga ni len nus sgyur// de'i ngo nyid ni go// sgyu ma smyig rgyu spu khong lo// skyes
47a6(1): rang ma skyes ma yin la/ stong ma yin dang yod ma yin// de dag bdag dang mtshungs ma yin// dpe' du ring thung la sogs pa/ cig dang bral ba kun myed do// shes rab can gyis rgyu ma rtags/ 
47a7(1): de kun sgyu ma'i chos 'ba' zhig/ rdzas cig yod kyang ma myong ngo // sgyu ma dang ni lhan cig g.yos// sgyu ma smigs rgyu spu 'khor lo// 'dus shing tshor las mthong bar rung // cig dang bral na dus tshogs myed// 'das
47a8(1): dang sa 'ongs yod ma yin// sgyu ma'i don dang spru lakhor lo// gnas gnas kyi ni rdzas gzugs rnams// de dag kun ni tha dad 'gyung // ngo bo myed cing mying yang myed// 'jig rten nang gi slang 'khrugs kyi// de dag sems la
47a9(1): rang myi dbang / myi 'din sgyu ma'i khas yod chad/ sgyu ma'i rdzas rnams mang po grub// gyo mo la sogs sgyu ma'i mkhan// rdzas kyi rnam pa mang po byas// g.yo zhing 'khor dang song zhing 'ongs// mthong ba
47a10(1): de kun bden ma yin// lcags kyi khab long rgyu ba bzhir// phyogs so chog tu 'gyur zhing po'o// rnam shes mdzod kyang de bzhin te// rnam par rtog pa bzhin du grung// 'jig rten thams cad zad par du// mthon
47b1(1): ma khyab gnas kyang byed// nyi ma ma ni rin cen rnams// bsam pa dang ni rnam rtog myed// de'i shes pa gnas kun khyab// mthong na 'bab cing 'khor zhes zer// myi skye zhing ni myi 'chi'o// phyi mo 'bab 'khor gnas ma yin// 
47b2(1): thub pas 'grus par zhib tu rtogs// skye ni'i dbe du rmil pa bzhin// de la 'dug pa'i gnas sbyang ngan// bying ni rnam par tha dad ces bshang // de nyid sangs rgyas thams cad yin// bla ma myed pa'i don sonod pa'o// chos thams cad la zhib tu/ 
47b3(1): rtags// me long snang dang chungs zhes rjod// cig tu mang me snang dang chungs// gser gsad pa'i rdo ngang tshungs// tshad cing myed pa yongs sasangs te// drang po'i lam ni mtshon ma'o// dam pa'i thub pa spyod spyod pa// rnam
47b4(1): tha dad pa'i mtshan mar phyi nang // 'dres pas zhen pa kun yod bral// gnas las sbyar te mngon par bas nad// theg pa chen po gsang bas rgyand pa'i chos kyi yi ge bdun te// rang gi rnam shes kyi khams kyi le'u'o// 
47b5(1): de'i tshe rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// phyog sa bcur khyab par rtags nas nor bu'i gtsug gi nang nas 'od snang dab chen po btang ste// 'od des yul thams cad dang gsang bas/ 
47b6(1): rgyangang pa'i nang gi byang chub sems dpa' mang po thams cad khyab par snanganas/ 'od zer de zind pa dang / de'i mod bzhin bde na mthong byang chub sems dpa' la skos te/ nges pa'i bdag
47b7(1): bopo gangs kyi ri la ri dgas ngan pa cig yod pa/ mying gnod pa zhes bya ste/ sgyu ma rgya stong du sbyar te/ ri dgas gzhan blangs te zad de zos so// she mo bu mong pa mthong na/ mod bzhin bu'i sgra skad du byas ste/ snying rje'i pa
47b8(1): ngos bos so// sha 'o mthong na mdo bzhin de dang 'dra ba ba yod par bsanang nas/ gam tu nye bong song ste/ de 'dod cing 'jigs pa myed par byas nas/ bsad de zos so// glang dang rta la sogs pa 'gro ba rnam pa mang mthong na// 
47b9(1): de kun gzugs dang mthun par byas so// des pa'i bdag po mur 'dug thams cad kun bzhi'i rnam par shes pa la dang mthong ba'ang de bzhin te/ ri dgas ngan pa de gzugs rnam pa mang po sgyur ba dang tshungs so// nga la rags pa'i myis nga'i
47b10(1): mtshan ma bzung ba yang so so tha dad de/ shinang tu chung ngu rdul phra mo yan chad la chags pa yang de bzhin no// nges pa'i bdag po de lta bu'i ngal chags pa rnams ge la 'dug ces byas na/ gzhan myi 'dug gi rang gi rnam par shes
48a1(1): ba'ab zhig la 'dug go// ngar 'dzind pa'i min dre nga dang yid kyi dbang po'i khams dus tshogs te/ yid la sa tshogs pas rnam par shes pa yod par skyes so// phyi mo nas nga yod pa myed de/ gos de dang me tog
48a2(1): 'dus tshogs pa las gsung gi dad pa yod pa dang tshungs so// ma 'dus ma tshogs pa'i ni gsung thob par rung ba myed do// de lta bas na rnam par shes pa'i sems dang sems kyi chos 'ba' zhig yong pa mngon te/ gud nar myed do// 
48a3(1): gnong pa'i nang gi shing thon dang chungs/ me mang gyi khyim bu dang chungs/ mi skri thu ka na'i rtsa dang chungs so// thub par rung bani rgyu rkyen spyad pas sems las chos skye te/ de'i nas na yang myed do// skye ba yang myed do// pa das kyi zlusas
48a4(1): cig brani phyi mo ras spong ba myi g.yong ba ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / bzhugs pa 'aspyod pa'i phyis nang logs rig pa'i rgyal khams yin no// mung 'dug rnams la ma'os pas rang 'thong ba rnam pom nyes pa'i
48a5(1): zhig la skye bar ma rig go/ chos kyi yeshes rig pa phyed pas nan tan gyis rnam par rtags te/ yod phyed la chags gcig pu dang / mang po dang / dngad pa'i gnas rjod pa ni/ de dgas ngan pa des mang du smras shing bam su
48a6(1): ba sa sa/  na te/ sems dmas zlog yin 'a du rdzu sangs rgyas dang / byang dus sems dpa' dang/ dashe pa'i rnams pa te zhing snyed du myi mu ste/ yang kyis dring ging
48a7(1): nas phyogs pa'i dus myed de/ 'phags pa'i lam gol bas bdag gi khye gdod to// theg pa sum gyi nang na theg pa cig gis chos kyang ma thob bo// blangs pas bcings te yang dag pa'i bden pa ma mthong bas gsang bas rgyanang pa'i yul du rol ba
48a8(1): yang ma thas/ myong ba dbas pa'ang ma thob po/ nges pa'i bdag po bzhugs pa myong ba'i myi rnams kun gyis rnam par shes pa 'di la mthong ba dag bdagaso yod cig/ khyod dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang de bzhin pa'i
48a9(1): rigs so ga pa gagos 'grus par kyang ba nas/ yang gyi gzhanas yang bsha pa/ de sbyar thegs bas rgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dul du byed par byos shig// theg pa med po gas pas rgyadang pa'i mi ga se chung
48a10(1): ma 'ornam pa sa da 'i bu ma sa pa'i rgyasade'imis mang zhi'i byung sa pangs das thug ma pa mi bya bgi 'ad bas 'dog ba ma tsha tu ma tho
48b1(1): gsol pa// rgyal pos rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul snying po ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa gsol zhing 'dri ba'i rigs so// 'jig rten thams cad na chos mang po yod chog rnam par rtog pa rnams dang / mying snyan dang bral te mying dang mthun pa
48b2(1): dang / myi dang myi mthun pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ga na 'dug pa sangs rgyas kyi bu 'di rnams sems cig tu thos par smon to// de nas kha dog mang po mchog tu 'phags pa'i rgyal pos de'i don bzhin du/ mying dang 'du shes la so/ 
48b3(1): pa khams 'jig rten thams cad rten kun kyi chos rnams rtog pa 'ba' zhig gam// rnam par rtog pa dang bral bas yod/ mying du btags pa de dag kun/ mying de dag la gnas shing 'dug/ rdo rje'i rang dbang yod pa ni/ bdag la drang zhing
48b4(1): bshad par smon/ de nas rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ tshig le'ur lan blan pa/ 'jig rten chos ni rnam mang po// thams cad kun ni mying 'ab zhig bu yod// gzugs las btsugs
48b5(1): shing rtags par zad// mying dang bral na don gzhan myed// phung po bzhin ni mying 'ab zhig/ de lta bas na mying zhes bshad// mying 'ba' 'dab ma zhes bya ba dang tshungs// mying yod do
48b6(1): myed pa yin/ sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas bu/ mying bshad na ni gzugs la 'jug/ gzugs dang bral na mying yang yod do/ de lta bu'i rnam rtog myi bya'o// de lta bas na gzugs la
48b7(1): nyend myi rnams mang po rnam par rtog/ dpel du cing to dang yang tshungs// de kun bden pa yod pa myed// tha dad 'gro bas rnam par rtags// kun kyang gzugs la myi 'dug myed// de lta bas na/ 
48b8(1): 'jig rten chos// gzugs dang bral na kun myed do// bum pa gos dang shing rnams dang // myeng dang tshig gis rnam par rtags// gzugs dang kha dog rjong rung kyang // de'i mtshan nyid yod pa myed// 'jig
48b9(1): rten kha dog mang po'i chos// gzugs las gzhan 'dang myed do// gzugs las rtags nas mying rtags te// snying de la ni bden don myed// rgyal pos 'jig rten chos rtags rigs// mying dang bral na
48b10(1): ci mang byed// rnam par rtog pa'i sems spyad pas// blang nyid chags pa de las skyes// rnam par rtog pa bral na ni// blangs shing chags pa de myi skye// skye ba myed nas gnas sbyad te// zad pa myed
49a1(1): chos rig go// de lta bas na rgyal chen sogs// rtag par 'du shes don rtags na// rnam shes sems 'ab zhig yin te// de dang bral na ci yang myed/ gzugs nyid skye zhing 'phel// gzugs
49a2(1): dang lus ni gyes shing zhig/ de la sosogs pa'i mying mang po kun// kyang kha dog gzugs lab shig/ gzugs dang mying dang rnam par rtags// mtshan nyid phyi mo tha dang myed// 'jig rten tha ma la don bzhin na/ 
49a3(1): sbreng zhing btsugs pa myi mthun no// mying snad pa ni btang bral te// 'das 'ongs nga rung ma 'ongs pa// de kun las su thob pa myed// shel las rig pa rig nus na// shes pa'i chos ni ci yang myed// shes pa kun ni myong 'bashig/ 
49a4(1): 'jig rten chos ni kun de bzhin/ mying gis su ni chos rnams rtags// chos la mying du rjod pa myed/ chos rnams ngo po de bzhin te/ rnam par tog la myi 'dug go// chos bshad pa ni mying gis lan// gzugs la de
49a5(1): mabyung byed ga// thubs byed dan gyis byed// rab ra/ brdzu no// tham pa rtogs byed pa'od// sus ses mi ming ma nang ni gso// shings mes su spongs
49a6(1): bzhin// thang ni snga ru skye ba byed/ dpe' du me 'ung byed dang tshungs mying de mying gis byed byed pa'o// byung ba'in du ni myi mthun yong/ khur khyed gzugs ni tha dang byed/ mying ni lung rdzas ci byed bzhis
49a7(1): rnam par phye ste mying bur myed// mying rnams mang po spyad pas su// rnam rtog so so myi mthun no// sdong du mthong na mying zhes zer// mying mthong sdong du zer dang tshungs// myi dad sdong rngu nyis rnams rtags// 
49a8(1): myed rtags 'ab zhig yod du zad// chen po nam ni 'dus tshogs nang // rnam par rtog pas gzugs su byas// chen po rnams dang bral na ni// gzugs kyi ngo bo ci yang myed// gos dang bum pa thob
49a9(1): nas shid// bum mos myed pa rang yang de bzhin no// bying dadang seni bum drangs na// dub pa su rnyed kyi dang // bram pa bum pa'i nyid kyi lug/ myong ni byings 'dugags kyi// nyim tshoms pa
49a10(1): sunas rtog skyes// mying dngag pa'ang yod ma yin// de lta bu'i thub pa la 'dug ste/ sems ni myig so myi 'gul lo// dpe' du steng dang rdos sran kya phyi gonas su chu gzugs byed/ bre dang ldan cig dus
49b1(1): tshogs las// chu bzhin du ni 'bab cing 'khor// nam shes mdzod kyang de bzhin te// ngo bo 'ab khong chos ma yin// rnam shes rnams dang mthun pas na// chos dang mthun pa 'a ba zhig 'khor // lcags dang rmus/ 
49b2(1): te khab long rgyu// khor khor yug khong zhing pho// gnyis ka la yang sems pa myed// tshul la sems chol yod pa'ang // kun gzhi dang ni rnam shes bdun// de yang de dang tshungs par mngon dpa/ bag chags
49b3(1): thag pas srid pa ni// myi byed pa ru yod pa bzhin/ sems can lus kun zab par khyab// ga yang za ba'i la la 'khor bar bgrod// dpe' ru lcags dang khab long bzhin// cig la cig gis shes pa bzhin/ 
49b4(1): ba bar ye sa'i lam dang bral// sa rnams gzhan du 'dug pa thob// rdzu 'phrul gyi dang dbang sobs// sprum bzhin gyi dpa' bar 'gro// gzugs sngags la ni phub pa ru/ kun kyang ma grub mchog
49b5(1): myed// sangs rgyas bden pa'i yon tan song // de spyang yod du/ gsol ba byas// bar bar grangs myed lus rnams dang // lus cig lag pa grangs myed dang // sbyin ma 'go bo kha la lce
49b6(1): cig nas cig tu grangs myed kun// song se phyogs bcu'i yul du phyin yang dag gshegs kun yon gsold pa/ bar bar myed tog dam mang dang // rin cen gos dang so mo ngo // de dag
49b7(1): bregs pa che mthong bab// ri rab lus su sogs pa bzhin// yang dag gshegs dang yon tu gsol// bar bar byang chub sems dpa' rnams// gyen 'dug la rtag par ldan cig 'grogs// bdud kyi dgra mang
49b8(1): thams cad kun/ rang rabang tu ni bab cing 'dug/ rang gi rig pa'i ting 'dzin thob// gten pa'i gnas ni smyung zhugs nas// chos rnams lnga ni spyang zhi ba sdod// maHrnam shes rgyang dang nga myed pa// zung de skad cig sngo
49b9(1): babyed// sems ci skyog mnogaso yod to// bang bar bya ni lus cung sa nang // de dbag pa ni rdus bran tsam// bar bar du ni lus can bgand// mu myed cing ni dpas kyi rigs/ kha dog gzugs kyi can rna rnam
49b10(1): nam mang po// yang dag gshegs la yon tu gsol// bar bar dag ni lus nang tu// 'jig rten mang po'i khams kun 'jug/ bar bar 'jig rtes khams kum// ske tse'i 'bras bu'i nang du bcug/ mtsho chen glang rjes
50a1(1): bzhin du byas/ glang rjes mchosang de bzhin no// de'i nang gi sems can rnams/ sus dang sems la gnod pa myed/ songs spyo thams cad zad bar gyis// gtam ning snyoms pan 'dogs byed/ 
50a2(1): tizla dang ni sa dang chungs// chu dang mye dang rlung da 'tshungs/ cig tu rin ce gling dngadrungs// sdi tu smra bzang dam pa dang yang 'chungs/ chos rnams la ni skye'i phyed// myi 'jan cing ni myi rtog go// cig dang tha dang gas
50a3(1): 'ongs// byung ba lta bu kun byed do// myi bdes pa'i mying mang btags// de ni ngo bo byab 'dzin yin/ chos rnams kun ni sgyu ma bzhin// rmi lam dri 'phrog grong khyer dang // sgyu ma dang ni chu nang rA/ 
50a4(1): klu cen sprin dang glog rnams pa ni// de'i rang du myi bder blangs// de ri ngo 'o khyab 'dzin yin// mying ni rnam pa mang pos su// chos kyi rnam pa pa dang bshang // de kun ci yang yod pa myed// den ngobo khyab 'di na ma
50a5(1): 'jig rten chos klu zlums cad tu ni/ mying dang gzugs las ma bral te/ de kun mying tsam 'bod pa'o// mying dang bral na don gzhan myed/ de lta bu'i ngo bo khyab 'dzin pa// ngas su 'jig rten phyi ru bshang/ 
50a6(1): kr-I byig dang kha dog chags rkyen byas// 'dus shi tshogs pa sum spyod de/ sgra ning rdungs rten bang bar g.yos// myu gus zon sa las skyes// pho brang dang ni bum gos rnams// rkyen mang sus sum yos byed/ 
50a7(1): sems can gang gi tshogs rnams bzhin// de kun gzhan gyi dbang gi rten// chos ni zag pa myed pa yin// de'i don ni btang myi rigs// rig pa'i ye shes na skyes pa ni/ ngo bo de mying yang bla den// chos rnams
50a8(1): mtshan mtha dad do// de'i ngo bo bshad yin te/ chos kun myi snang myi mngon no// rmis su rdzas rnams mang srung de// sgyu ma'i gzugs mang byas dang tshungs// kha drog gzugs ni myi thur yang // rje za
50a9(1): kun ni myi 'gyur myed/ 'jig rten dor ni kun de bzhin// rnam pa kun ni bden ma yin// myi bden sems kyis chags pa'i// khyab par 'dzin pa lhag ma myed/ dpe' rum ni rin po
50a10(1): kha dog bzhin du gzugs 'byung ngo // 'jig rten yang ni de bzhin te/ rnam par rtog pa bzhin du yod// nyid spyad ga la'ang 'dug pa myed// de ni ngo bo khyig 'dzin yin// dpe' ru dri 'phrog grong khyer bzhin/ 
50b1(1): mkhar ma yin na khang ltar 'dra/ rgyu myed pa'ang ma yin no// de lta bu du tho bar nus// 'jig rten rdzas rnams mang po pa// kun kyang de dang tshungs par mngon// nyi zla dang ni ri'i rnams// khang khyim dang
50b2(1): ni dud srin tshogs// mtshan gzugs so so tha dad kyang // 'dres shing khrugs pa yod ma myong // bdag dang gzhan dang phyi ma dang / mtshan nyid ngo bo nyid ma grub// rnam par rtog go mchog kun kyang // 
50b3(1): rang gi ngo bo kun khyab par 'dzin // rdzas rnams rgyu las skyes ma yin// rgyu myed pa 'ang ma yin no// yod pa dang ni yod ma yin// de kun sems kyis chags pas su// mying gzugs la 'dug pas g.yogs
50b4(1): gnyis mi rnam par rtog las skyes// drang po ye shes yang dag myi g.yol ba// sems ni gzugs bzhin mngon par byung // gzugs ni yid las gnas pas su// yid dang sems ni skyes te// dpe' ru dpa' rlabs ba
50b5(1): bag chags la ni thog tha myed// khams kun la ni de bzhin no// med sems ni bag chags rgyud las skyes// khams kyis sems smad 'khrugs par byas// kun gzhi rnam shes la rten// bas son
50b6(1): rnam pa thams rbad kun// sems ni khams rnams bzhin du 'byung / de ni 'jig rten yin zhes bshad// nges pa bdun dang kun bzhi ni/ cig nas cig tu thos kyis skyed// de lta bu'i rngam shes rgyang / 6
50b7(1): myi 'chang rtsa cing ni myi rtag go// 'jig rten thams cad zad par ni// yod pa bde bar bkram pa 'dra// 'dzin pa yod pas sems can rnams/ nga la sogs pa gsum dus tshogs// nges pa rnam mang g.yos shing
50b8(1): skyes/ khams rnams la ni mngon par byed// la la myi bden 'dzin na re// byed pa kun ni las kyi rgyu// tshangs lha las su sotshogs par skye/ phyi dang nang gi 'jig rten kun// 'jig rten gyis ni byas ma
50b9(1): yin// las dang rdul phran bzhin du byas// kun gzhi'i rnam shes 'ab zhig yin// sbyar te sman na khams 'dra'o// shes mdzod rkyend kyis byas ma yin// mdzod kyis kyang ni rkyen ma byas// shes pa rnams
50b10(1): ni 'bab 'khor yang / sum dus tshogs pa byed pa'i// kun gzhi'i ngo bo rtag par 'dug/ rnam shes rnams dang lhan cig go// 'khod nang ni shel sgo bzhin/ cig tu zla dang skar ma bzhin// des su ni bas
51a1(1): chags skyes// gsar tugasar tu rang skyes 'phel// shes pa gzhan yang skyes shing 'phel// shes pa gzhan yang de bzhin te/ de ltar rtag tu 'khor lo skor// tshor ba dang ni sems dong bzhin// dpe' ru
51a2(1): mes su shing sregs bzhin// pags kyis pags kyis 'gyur zhing po// shing de sa ni sregs zin nas// de nas yang ni shing gzhan sregs// kun gzhi rnam shes gnas pa'i// zag myed sems kyang de bzhin no// 
51a3(1): zag yod rnams ni bags kyis bsalang // 'khor zhing skar ba'i chos yod zhing // de ni chos kyi skying bas nang nas// ting nge 'dzind kyi khams yin no// 'phags pa mang po'i lam 'di yin// phyogs bcu'i yul las khyab
51a4(1): par byind// seng ni seng rdo'i nang na 'dug dang tshungs// gser mthong chu ni nus pa myed shes rab can na 'du 'khas pas// gser yang dag pa mngon parasnang // rnam shes mdzod kyang de bzhin no// bag chags
51a5(1): kyis bkris glag bAs// ting nge 'dzind gyis gsade bsil bzhin// thub pas rtag tu snang ba mthong / dpe' du ma grub zho dang tshungs/ mar mthong ba du yod myi rung // de bas shes rab can gyis su
51a6(1): no srubs pas na mar rnyed do// rnam shes mdzod kyang de bzhin no// shes rab can gyis bkris bkab pa// gsang rgyan gyi ni thub rnams kyis// grub par rtags na gdon thub nus// gsang bas rgyan pa snang cer song
51a7(1): dam pa'i shes rab 'phags pa nga rgyal// sangs rgyas bus su grub spyad spangs// yul 'di'i ni nang du skye/ gzugs dang gzugs myed pa'i khams// spong ba'i 'du shes 'du shes ma yin pa yang ma yin// de la rtag par 'grus
51a8(1): spyad na/ 'ongs te gnas ni 'di du skye// de na sangs rgyas bu rnams ni/ rjod 'ong dpe' du nyi zla bzhin/ mthun pa'i tshig ni dngas shing bshad/ yang dgashegs pa rig pa'i chos / mthong ba bzhin bya
51a9(1): rtend cing smyungang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/ sbyin pa krugs te bral 'di mnos/ gsang rgyan yul na 'dug mod kyi/ dzas dang 'thun pa de bzhir spro/ dbu khar 'dug gi smyan cing smra
51a10(1): las las mthong ning ches kyang pos// denas da rje'i snying pos byang chub som ma dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yang ngas mang pos sgo/ des pa'i rnams kun gzhi'i dam pa shes pa'i thig pa byed ba duni dngasas
51b1(1): spros pa rjod pa'i bag chags rnams kyis las bzung bzung bas khor zhing skor ba myi chad de/ mtsho rlung gi rgyus g.yos pa dang 'tshungs so// rnam par shes pa'i dpa' rnams kyang bor mor skye// khor mor shi// myi 'chad
51b2(1): myi rtag na/ sems can rnams rang gis myi chod myi shes te/ rang gi rnam par shes pa bzhin du nyams mang po 'byung ngo // rang gis mngon par rig na/ mes shing sregs pa dang tshungs te/ mod bzhin bzhi ste/ myed
51b3(1): nas zag pa skyed pa'i gral du chud de/ mying 'phag pa'i myi zhes bya'o// nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa ni khams mang po 'dra ste/ 'jig rten thams cad yog nas zhes pa'i yid kyis dmyigs te/ ra dang nga'i gnas la chags pa yin
51b4(1): gi/ rnam par shes pa dang khams ni so so tha dad par mngon no// nges pa'i rnams sems kyi las rtsegs bsdus pa ni yid kyang de bzhin no// yid kyi rnam par shes pas chos rnam pa mang po kun mngon par rig go// rnam par shes pa lngas ni 'dun
51b5(1): tu byung ba'i khams la rnam par rtog te/ ling tog can gyis spa'i 'khor lo mthongad pa dang 'tshungs so// 'dra ba'i kha dog gi nang na/ kha dog ma yin pa la dog tu 'dzind to// nges pa'i rnam sa ni rin po che dang chungs shed
51b6(1): mtshan nyid gtsang dag pa la la zhig gis nyi zla'i 'od la bzhag na/ de dang mthun ba bzhin du so so'i rdzas kyi char 'bab bo// kun gzhi'i rnam parashes pa 'ang de dang tshungs te/ yang dag par gshegs pa rnams
51b7(1): kyi gtsang dag pa'i mdzod yin na/ ngag chags dang tshogs te sbyar te mang po'i gzugs 'dras/ 'jig rten dang thun no// zad pa myed par mthun na yon tan mang po thams cad kyi char 'bab se/ 'o ma las sbyar ngan/ 
51b8(1): zho dang dang bar red pa dang tshungs/ kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa la yang de dang 'dra sa sbyar na/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi kha dog dang tshungs so// myig ling tog can dang tshungs te/ ling tog gi nad kyis su'i 'khor lo 'dra ba
51b9(1): mthong ngo // sems can thams cad kyang de dang tshungs te/ bag chags kyi ling tog rnam par shes pa'i myig mdzod la 'dug nas kha dog 'dra ba'i rnams skyes so// mthong ba'i kha dog de kun ni dper spyig rgyu dang tshungs so// 
51b10(1): yod myed yongs spangs pa'ang kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sbyar da cing gnad to// nges pa'i rnams myig kha dog la gnas pa ni kha dog 'dra ba'i rnam par shes pa yod de sgyu ma bzhin du skyes nas myig gi nang na 'dug se// de mtshan
52a1(1): ma g.yor zhing 'gyur ba ni tsha ba'i dus kyi smig skya ba dang tshungs so// nges pa'i rnams kha dog mang po thams cad ni kun kyang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dang / kha dog gi bag chags su phrad nas sbyar da te de'i gzugs 'dra'o// mtshan nyid gzhan yod pa
52a2(1): ma yin te/ glen pa myi bden pas rnam par rtog pa dang chungs so// nges pa rnams sems can thams cad 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'greng ba dang / slong ba dang / gnyid kyis log pa dang / sgo zhing rgyug pa kun kyang kun gzhi'i rnam par
52a3(1): zhes pa ma yin pa myed do / dper nyi ma rgyas pa'i bar snang gi 'od sa la bab pa dang chungs te/ ma 'dros ngan pa langs pa dang / chu 'bab pa dang 'dra ba la/ ri dgas skom pas srad 'khrugs so// de phyogs su rgyugs so// kun gzhi rnam par shes 'ang / 
52a4(1): de dang tshungs su ga/ ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan ma de gzugs ma yin no// gzugs 'ja byung bas rnam par rtog pa'i myis myi bden pa blangs shing chags pa skyed nas / dpe' khab long gi thus lcags g.yo'o zhing phar byas pa dang tshungs so// sems
52a5(1): tshungs te// sems dang tshor pa byed mod kyi// chu bzhin du 'bab pa 'gul ning myi 'dug go// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'ang de dang chungs so// rnam par rtog pa byed mod kyi/ lus la rtend cing 'khor zhing 'gro'o/ @
52a6(1): glang gnyis zhig goms kyis 'gran cing thabs pa dang tshungs te/ cig smras na spang myi spobs so// kun gzhi nam par shes pa 'ang de dang chungs dar mngon so// zhen pa'i skal ba chod nas skal gyi 'bab myi 'khor ro// dpe' me tog par
52a7(1): ma dang chungs chen 'dab ma 'ardzab dang bral la gsal zhing dag la gtsang dang se// rdul dang dri ma rnams dang bral ba lha rnams dang myi rnams kyis mthong na rin che zhing gus so// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'ang de dang tshungs so// bag chags kyi rdzas nas byung
52a8(1): 9// snang dag pa thob na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / myi chen po kun gyis lci bar bya'o// rin po che dam pa 'jig rten na dkon pa dang chu swa te/ myi glen pa ma rabs la 'dug na ni/ rtag par skos shing spad do// shes rab can gyis thob na ni
52a9(1): rgyal thol bul te/ rin po che'i bod gtsug kyi rgyun tu byas nas rgyal pos thogs so// kun gzhi nam par shes pa'ang de dang chungs te// yang dag par shegs pa rnams kyi gtsang dag pa'i sabon gyi ngo bo nyid yin na/ tha dad par gro ba'i thabar
52b1(1): ni khor mor 'dres pas zhen da/ byang chub sems dpa' rig na ni/ bag chags kyi rnams kyi mchod de sangs rgyas grub par phyi nad nas/ rtag par rin cher 'dzind to// shel bzang po chu'i nang na 'dug pa la/ nya lcibs kyis
52b2(1): g.yogs pa dang tshungs so// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa 'ang de bzhin te/ skye shi'i mtshol 'dug cing nad pa'i bag chags rnams kyis bkab pas mthong ngo // nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa blang ngo cho ga blang
52b3(1): nus pa yod de/ rnam gnyis cig gis cig skyed pa ni sbrul 'gro gnyis yod pa dang chungs/ gang dad pa dang lhan cig 'dong ngo // 'di yang de bzhin te kha dog dang lhan cig pas 'jig rten gyi myis blangs te gzugs su byas nas/ nga dang po
52b4(1): gnas su 'dzin to// yod dang myed pas ni 'jig rten dang dbang byed nus so// nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pas sprul te/ sems pa rnam pa mang mod kyi/ ngo bo nyid shinang tu zab ste// shes rab myed pa'i myis
52b5(1): tshor zhing rig par myi nus so// dpe' sgyu ma'i 'khan pos sgyu ma'i ngi dgas byas pa dang tshungs te/ la la ni 'gro la la ni rgyag ste de sems can 'ang na yang dag par bden pa yod myed do// kun gzhi'i rnam
52b6(1): par shes pa 'ang de dang tshungs te/ 'jig rten gyi sem can gyi sgyu ma rnam pa mang po byas na bden pa'i don myed na/ glen pa tha dad du 'gro bas ma rig se// myi bden pa'i blangs shing chags pa skyes nas/ 
52b7(1): rdul phra mo snyed kyi rgyal ba'i rang bzhin dang rang dbang gi skyes bu dang yod myed la sogs pa mthong ngo // nges pa'i rnams yid kyi rnam par rtog pa nas sam/ 'jig rten thams cad rnam par rtags pas mthong ba yin te/ ri mo'o
52b8(1): nang gi gzugs dang tshungs sprin gyi nang gi mtshan ma dang chungs/ ling tog dang rmi lam mthong ba'i rjes dang tshungs/ in ta ka'i bzhung dang tshungs/ dri 'phrog gi grong khyer dang tshungs/ lung ba'i brag cha dang tshungs / smrig
52b9(1): rgyu'i chu dang chungs// chu'i nang gi shing gi gzugs rnyan dang chungs/ rdzid kyi nang gi zla ba'i gzugs rnyan dang tshungs/ rnam par rtog pa'i myis kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la de lta bur myi bden pa la spangs so// la la zhig 'di sa
52b10(1): bu la drang por zhib tu rtog phod pa yod na/ 'jig rten gyi rnams kun rang gi sems kyis rnam par rtags pas mthong ba yin par rig te/ mod bzhin kun sbyar te myed do// nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste// 
53a1(1): yid la sa tshogs pas chos kyis bag chags kyi gnas yin te/ rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyis bkrugs rnyogs so// rnam par rtog pa dang bral na mod bzhin zag pa myed pa grub ste/ zag pa myed pa ni rtag pa ste/ dpe' nam khA dang tshungs so// byang
53a2(1): chub sems dpa' rnams// yon la sordzogs pa chas kyis bag chags kyi gnas yan te// rnam par rtag pa'i sems kyis bkrugs snyags sa/ rnam par rtag pa dang bral na mad bzhin zag pa myed pa grub sa// zag pa myed po na sag pa ta/ dpa' namakha'
53a3(1): dang tshungs kyi// kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa las ting nge 'dzind thob na/ 'dod zag pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan thub pa dang // rnam pa las tha dad pa dang / thabs kyi stobs dang / rang dbang gi rdzu 'phrul dang / de lta las sartogs pa'i yon tan gyi chos rnams dang
53a4(1): mtha' yun gyi smon lam bcu dang / yi de las skyes pa'i lus skyes so// 'dugaba'i gnas bsgyur da nas/ shes pa'i khams la rtag par 'dug te/ ram kha'i ngo bo nyid dang tshungs te/ myi zhigs myi zad do// nges pa'i rnam pa yang dag par shegs pas/ 
53a5(1): ga ten bams car thos pa gyun/ nang bri bskyed do// rtse/ rnalas 'das pa na ni sa shing byed pas sbyin no// sems pas dri skyes pa pa yin par byed/ thogs lu'i dus byasangs nyid tu tu
53a6(1): mthun se/ sangs rgyas kyi rnams 'jig rten du 'byung yang rung ma 'byung yang rung / chos so chog thams cad chos kyi ngo bo nyid la gnas pas myi rtag myi chad do// rnam pa las tha rad tu zind na/ sems can gyi khams zad
53a7(1): de zhigs na/ yang dag par shegs pa'i ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid thams cad 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyis mkhyend pa'i chos gnyis snyoms par myi rung ngo // cig tu na mya ngan las 'das pa'i ngang tshungs te/ sems
53a8(1): can zad nas su stug sngal dang bral lhag ma yod pa'i dang / lhag ma myed pa dang / btud phab la sordzogs pa'i don kun myi bden par bshad pa yin no// de lta bas na bzhugs pa spyod pa'i rnams rnam par tha dad par rig nas/ de'i las rtag par
53a9(1): 'dug par mngon no// phung po mang yod pa dang bral la/ bag chags kyi rnams myed de/ dper na lcags tsha ba chu grang mor bor ba dang tshungs te/ tsha ba'i chu lugs mod kyi lcags nyams te/ 'di yang de mtshangs so// nges pa'i
53a10(1): gnams kun gzhin ma par shes pa'i mchong ni/ smos pa rjong pa'i spos zhing lci bas btags te/ chos lnga dang tho ba nyid sum gyi dba'adrabs kyis cig gis cig mdu skyes pas lams yod do chog de'i gzugs g.yol zhing skas bas
53b1(1): don myed pa'i gnas kyi nang nas don 'dra bar byung ngo // des pa'i rnams kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni phung po rnams kyi tshul stug po rnams kyi nang na 'gro ste/ yid kyis sngar drangs so// yid kyi rnam par shes pas mngon par rig nas/ gzugs
53b2(1): la sogs pa khams rnams kyi rnam par shes pa lnga dbang po la gnas pas khams mngon par bas nad te/ khams blangs so chog gi kun kyang kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa yin pa myed do// nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa/ 
53b3(1): ni tshe srog blon po dang / reg pa 'dus tshogs pa la 'dug ste/ yid kyang de la 'dug go// rnam par shes pa yang yid la 'dug go// gzhan rnam par shes pa lnga yang rang gi dbang po la gnas so// nges pa'i rnams sems dang yid dang / 
53b4(1): yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni phung po rnams dang 'dug ste// las kyis khrid pas 'bab cing 'khor ba myi chad do// las kyis rnams yod do chog ri sred pa'i rgyu las g.yos so// las spyad pas lus gnos te/ lus kyis yang yA
53b5(1): kyis nas lus 'di yang btang zind pa dang / yang lus gzhan len te/ srin bu skam zhing rkyang ste 'gro ba dang tshungs so// semasadang sems kyi chos kyi lam gyi rgyud rnams las skyes pa'i seng du yang
53b6(1): tshal stug po'i phung po glegs so// nges pa'i rnams che dang dron po dang rnam par shes pa'i lus las btang na/ lus la tshor ba dang / shes pa myed do// rdo shing dang chungs so// nges pa'i rnas
53b7(1): rnam par shes pa'i mdzod ni sems yin te/ nga dang myi dang yid la chags pas khams kyi rnams blangs nas rnam par shes pa zhes bshad do// nges pa'i rnams sems kyis lus 'dzind nus te/ yid kyis las rgyud rnams la chags
53b8(1): bsayid kyi rnam par shes pas chub par rig ste rnam par rtog pa lnga byung ngo // nges pa'i rnams rnam par shes pa'i mdzod kyis/ rgyu byas pas rnam par shes pa gzhan gyi nang du skyes so// yid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang
53b9(1): byung ste bar chad myed par g.yo'o// rnam par shes pa lnga yang yang skyed pa'i rkyen las sdad de/ skyes nas dus cig tu rang gi dbang po yang skye ba byas so// nges pa'i rnams lus ni ro langs dang tshungs/ smig rgyu ba dang tshungs te/ spad pa
53b10(1): rnams kyi su rkyen bzhin tu mun te/ rdzun zhing phyi bden pa yang ma yin te// yang dag pa bden pa yang ma yin te// sred pa bkris pas ngo ba nyid long bar myed pa'o// des pa'i rnams yid la sogs pa'i rnam pa bzhes pa rnam pa ni/ 
54a1(1): sems dang lhan cig tu skyes so// rnam par shes pa lnga yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang lhan cig skyes so// de lta bus khor mor sa chen po cag car gyur to// nges pa'i rnams kun gzhi rnam par shes pa sred pas sordzogs
54a2(1): pas/ skye zhing 'phel ba thob te/ rang skyes shing 'phel zi nang nas/ shes pa gzhan yang spel nas khor lo bzhin du byi chad do// rnam pang shes pa rnams spyad pas na khams mang po skye ba thob bo// las rnams kyi nang du rnam par shes
54a3(1): pa yang skye zhing 'phel te/ khor mod nges kyis 'jig rten gyi rgyu byas pa'i chu bo 'bab pa'i bzhung dang tshungs te snga phyi myi nang do// sa bon drang myu gu dang tshungs so// cig gis cig bsags nas skyes te/ so so tha dad pa'i ni bye brag bye bar sdang ngo // nam/ 
54a4(1): par shes pa spyod pa'ang de bzhin te/ gsum dus tshogs pa'i steng du yang dus tshogs pas tha dad pa skyes te/ chad cing gcod pa myed do// phyi nang gi chos mang po ni 'di'i rgyu las g.yos na/ tha dad kyis 'gro ba thams cad kyis rang gi sems ma rig go// 
54a5(1): khyed sangs rgyas kyi bu rnams kyis grub pa zhib tu brtags pa'i rigs so de nas gzugs mang po mchog tu 'phags pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa yang rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la tshig 'di
54a6(1): zhes byas so// rdo rje'i snying po ting nge 'dzin da ni ci yang 'jigs pa myedathob pas/ gsang bas khas pa 'jug khas te/ chos so chog ni chang nus so// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas bu/ ting nge 'dzind ni drang
54a7(1): bor bsams/ chos so chog ni mtshan mang rtags// phrad mchog se bskrun zla byed/ chos su smon pa shes rab can/ bdag chag la ni drongs shig shod/ btsun pa rtag tu bde' bar bzhugs/ ma ni zla ba'i mdzod pho brang / seng
54a8(1): ge yi ni khri la bzhugs/ byang chub mang pos khor bar skor/ spyod spyod mang po rnams kyi phyir/ gsang rgyan thub chos bshad par smon da/ 'di ni zla ba'i rgyal 'tshan sangs rgyas yin/ mang po'i phyi ru phye zhing s+yad/ pha bi mang ba/ 
54a9(1): 'dir 'ongs so// skye ba myed par bzhad par smon / de nas bcom ldan 'das zla ba'i rgyal tshan gyis grangs myed pa lus kyi/ kha dog dang gzugs kyi lha rnams kyi pho brang na 'khor ba dang / grangs myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yod pa
54a10(1): dang / lha rnams la matogs pa'i sa khor bar skodong te/ yon gsolang nas gsang pas rgyanang pa'i nang gi 'jigs pa myed pas/ bzhugs pas spyod pa bsud pa bde ba'i mtshan ma'i mtshan ma bshad do// byang chub sems par
54b1(1): de rnams de skad bshad pa thos nas/ nang logs rig pa'i ye shes mthub tha thob nas/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sems ni drang po'i gral gyi dga' ba bas myi dga' ste// bden pa'i dbyings la myi 'dug nas thub pa'i nang na res kyis zhib tu btags nas
54b2(1): so so sems la bsams te smras pa/ de la sus yang dag pa'i mtshan ma rig te/ zhugs pa saspyad pa'i bro bo mthong 'dzin ji lta bur na/ myi mthong bar rung zhes sems las sgom pa bzhin du gus pa skyes nas/ 'gros te yod do// sangs
54b3(1): rgyas kyi bu de rnams kyis yang bsams pa// gang ni thub pa yin/ ji lta bur na thub pa yin/ ga la'i gnas mthub/ su ni de thub pa'i rkyen sdod pa yin/ de snyam du bsams zin nas ting nge 'dzind kyi mthu spyad pas/ gsang bas rgyan pa'i yul gyi
54b4(1): das cing sus rgya po/ tho bdan gyis mas byed pa'i ngas rgyas kyi bus nab chogs pa 'anga'ongs sa/ sems ce tu sa nayod rdo rje na chung po byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa chen thos byeg pa pan blang bdas te/ 
54b5(1): phal mang po na ma mthong nas mod bzhin tshor ba dran par skyes te// chos 'chad par ches nas mdangs phyungs ste/ 'dzum chung cig/ mul nas dran zhing gnyen pa'i sgras le'u bshad de smras pa/ khyed la sogs
54b6(1): pa sangs rgyas bu// kun kyang sems cig mnyand pa'i rigs/ thub pa'i sems ni bsam pa dag la/ rnam par rtog pa'i rigs ma yin// thub pa la thub pa'i rkyen yang de bzhin no// 'dod pa rnams kyi
54b7(1): myi dge 'bralab/ tshor ba la ni rtog pa yod// spyod pa myi g.yo dge' skyid skyes/ de ni bsam rten dang po bzhugs zhes bya/ de ltar khad kyis go rims bzhin/ bzhi dang rgyad dang bcu la zhugs/ mur 'dug gang la chags pa ni/ rtag par
54b8(1): thub pa de rnams baspyod/ nyan thos thams cad mang po dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang de bzhin no// 'jig rten gyi ni chos kyi rnams/ rang gi gzugs ni mngon rig dang / phung po rnams ni 'ang song bzhin/ de ning nang myed do// bsam pa myed cing bya
54b9(1): g.yo'i myed/ skul ba yis su ro badrang bzhin/ 'dus tshogs sum po 'ba' shig yod/ phyi mo nas na bya nus byed/ mur 'dug thub pa baspyod pa'i myi/ stong pa'i ngo bo mthong ba g.yos/ myi des chos kyi mtshan ma spang / chos kun thams cad 'dzin/ 
54b10(1): cing zhigs// la las sum pa spyod nus yod/ yang dgashegs kyi pra dam thub/ phung po la ning myed khams/ mthong ba thams cad myed par gsal/ rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig yod/ chos kyi mtshan ma sun myed do// mtshanams
55a1(1): mtshan ma nus pa myed/ khams myed cing ni phung po'ang myed/ phye shig se rdul phran thug/ de kun ci'ang 'dug pa myed/ sa chu la sogs rdzas mang po/ kun kyang rnam par rtog las skyes/ de'i ngo bo myi shes pas// de lta
55a2(1): bu'i mtshan ma blangs// kha dog bzang dgakha dog ngan// kho dog 'dra ba de bzhin no// dpe' ru na mkha'i sprin dang 'ang // de la sa tshogs pa mtshon dang tshungs// bsams na rus pa 'brel pa bzhin// 'jig rten thams cad
55a3(1): khyab gang dang // gnas la byang par 'du shes rtog/ chen po rnams la rtags na ni// lus la kha dog yod myed pa// thub pas rtag tu rtogs bong soms// sems cig gi ni rkyen na ni// rkyen gyis gsang zhing dag pa bshad// de la
55a4(1): rnam par rtog pa na// de nyid kyis su rkyen grub bo// thub pa ma yin thub pa yin/ myi bden pa la thub par 'dzin// thub pa thub pa'i nang na 'dug/ 'jig rten rig na kun shes mdzod// chos dang chos kyi mtshan ma rnams
55a5(1): thams cad kun ni gsal te rtse// rgyal bu'i thub pa thob pas su// rgyub parnams kyi bkad la las// thub pa spyod pa'i phyirnams kyi myi bden shes rab shes chos shig// myil shes rab cu zad skyes// tu
55a6(1): chos dbang du lnga ba blangs// bdag na de ni bden tshig grub// bzol na pas su chos rnams bshad// chos rnams kyi ni mtshan mcha gas// bdag zhig cing ni gzhan yang zhig/ mtshan ma
55a7(1): mtshan ma nus myed pas// myi bden tha dad mthong ba skyes// dbang po'i ngo bos tshabs la nus// kha sbyar lan tshas pad kan 'jul// tsha ba'i rdzas kyis grang mo sbyar// lan chas rlung nad dub par nus// lus ngan bar
55a8(1): kan cha yod pas// stongs pas 'dang bu'i nad kyang skyes// bar bang rlung gi rgyu 'ba' shig/ bang bar gsum 'dus tshogs las g.yos// so so'i nang thabs tha dad pas// sman pa khas pas spyad par bshad // Sha dra dang ni
55a9(1): drug cha'o// yu sha dang ni zas gzhan mtshogs// sems can lus kyi nang tib bo// 'dang bu nang kun gsal nus so// chos kyi ngo bo nyid dang ni// tshan gzhan song zin na ni// sman gyis nad so nus myed na// nad
55a10(1): ba'i sos pa byi rigs so// ji ltar 'jig rten myi yis su// sman btang rten spos blong // thub pas su ni 'jig rten rtags/ kun gzhi'i nang shes 'ba' zhig go// 'gyur zhing tha dad 'bab par mthong // dpe'
55b1(1): ru skya ba'i ri dgas bzhin// mtshan mas mtshan ma nus pa myed// phung po dang ni phung po la// yan lag tha dad pa dang ni/ yan lag dang ni yod pa myed// 'jig rten nang nas byed pas su// 'jig rten bya ba nus pa myed// phyogs nu gyes
55b2(1): pa'i rdus phran gyis// de'i sungs pa'ang ma yin no// dang po'i mchog phra zhib ma yin// khad kyis rim pas che ba the bong tsam// the bo gnyis dang the bo gsum// chos rnams khad kyis spus tshogs pas// khye'u 'da' so so ba
55b3(1): dad do// de'i bu'i don thun myed// dus dang 'phags pa'i ngo bo dang // chos sum gyis su byas pa ma yin// rgyu rkyen bya yin+da ma yin// rang gis su ni yod pa thob// de ni las kyi bag chags rgyus// nang logs sems la 'khrugs
55b4(1): ging rnyogs// sems kyi gnas dang myig gi dbang // myi bden nam mnganam par rtags// yid dang yid kyi rnam shes dang // kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'is// 'jig rten kun tu khyab par gnang // sgyu ma bzhin gyi rdzas yang byas// bum la sogs
55b5(1): pa'i khams kyi rnams// kun kyang sems kyi gzhi byas so// bum pa yin na bus 'dra snang // de lta bas na song zhes bshad// 'jig rten byad gzugs yod do chog/ lha'i pho brang rnams la sa gyogs// kun gzhi'i rnam shes tha dad
55b6(1): zlogs/ spyad da cing mthong bar dung ba'i// sems can lus yod do chog/ mgo nas rga lag thub pa ru// cig chang skyes dang khad kyis rims kun gzhi rnam shes ma yin myed// bag chags kyis su sems la rnyogs// Tha Tha
55b7(1): glen pas su ni rig myi nus// de'i ngo bo yod ma yin/ song ba yang ni ma yin no// dpe' du myis su rdzas bzhag gis// bus pa la sogs pa rdegs bzhin// rdzas kyi ngo bo stong yin na// ci'ang tshogs pa nus pa myed
55b8(1): dpe' du ri rab dpag pa ni// da thong ngan pa ma yin no// dregs shing le lo song chags pa// ngan pa 'di ni de las 'das// spyong pa'i ngo bo song zhing bshad// myed pa'i gnas ni bshad myi rigs// myed nas bshad du zin na ni
55b9(1): bil dang nga yang ni badrAn ces bya// sems cad thams cad zad pang gi/ rnam pa mang po mthong ba skyes/ gong pa'i ni bzung bshad pas/ song bathob pa bden du 'dzin/ mthong nams mchod par ma nus smra
55b10(1): mthong ba de ni sil myi nus/ nad pa sman pas bong dang chungs// dpe' ru mes su shing sregs bzhin// shing zad na ni s+ye myi 'dug/ shing sregs zin pa mthong na ni// song ba yang ni shi ba'i rigs/ shes rab kyo ris skyes/ 
55b11(1): mthong bkun ni zhi bar rung // mya ngan 'khrug sregs nas// thas cad kun ni gca zhing dag/ thub pa'i ye shes 'di spyad pas/ gsang bas rgyand pa rnam par thadad/ ri bong gi ni ras gdungs te/ rin chen nin
56a1(1): pa yong ma mthong // rdo ba'i ni bu mo'i bus// mda' thobs rdzas la blangs ma myong // zab mo thab tu byed pa la// ri bong du bzhu chol mthos// su zhig pho brang dgongs pa 'dra/ rdo'i bu mo'i bu byed 'jug/ chos
56a2(1): so chog gi ngo bo song // chos dang nyid ni rtag par thun// thog ma mngal gyi mdzod kyi tshe// gzugs skyes thal byung myed cing zhig/ stod dang bral na gzugs myed do// gzugs dang bral na stong pa myed// zla ba dang ni 'od snang
56a3(1): bzhin// gdod pa rtag par tha myi dang // chos rnams kun kyang de dang tshungs// song dang ngo ba nyid du gcig/ sbyard cing zlog kyang tha dad myed// byas so chos ni kun grub rung // lus 'di nyid ni sho ro bzhin// byi mo/ 
56a4(1): nas ni ngo ba myed/ khod modo srengs pa'i thag pas bcings/ khams kyis su bkris shing spyod// sangs rgyas kyis su song bzhung bshad/ mthong ba rnams ni gcod 'don na// khyed rnams shes rab yod pa'i myi/ sems
56a5(1): ci du ni dram pa'i sas be du stsa pa'i 'an pos sa/ sngags kyichos kyi gathos pad de// med bzhin tan ci yang bya/  kyig dang sred la gnas bas s+ho/ yid drang sa kun de ni/ 
56a6(1): song dang myed la chags myi rigs/ 2/ na be du rje'i bu ma'i bu/ ri da dang su khor lo// phyi mo nas su do 'i myong // mying bdan ba'i mying spyan btags// song ge'i don dang dred kyi pa/ 
56a7(1): de kun la yang myed na// dzi'i byi ru rnam brtags te/ ri bong rwa 'ba' zhigar myed zer// smra rjod la ni bzo'i 'khas pas// dran zhing bshad ni myi nus so so// snga ma snying pa'i shes rab myis/ ri bong ra myed 'ba' zhig
56a8(1): bshad// smad pas myi bden rnam par rtog/ lkugs pa dang ni 'on pa bzhin// myi de mngon pa'i shes rab myed// rang gi rig pa'i chos myi nus// gzhan gyi tshig dbang bzhin du 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa bya ci dgos/ 
56a9(1): gnam par rtog dang bral ba ni// gsang bas rgyanang pa'i yul du skye// sems gcig drang po tshul ba'i nang // phyog bcu yul kun khyab par snang // dpe' ru lha'i pho brang bzhin// nyi zla dang ni skad ma rnams// ri rab la ni gnas shing
56a10(1): nyid/ gdung ba cus su dbung zhi yang / nam shes dun yang de bzhin te/ kun gzhi rnam pa shes la te/ bas cham su tu byung nas su/ ga gang 'ad 'a'ang ba ya bci 'bar / dpe' rgyas chen rten pas su
56b1(1): rdzas nams mang po g.yos skyes bzhin// yid srel thams cad zad pa dang // nor bu rin cen thug pa du// shes pa'i mdzod kyang de bzhin te/ rnam par rtog pa kun gyi gnas/ dpe' du rma bya dang ni chungs// spu gro
56b2(1): kyi kha dog mang / zo ma tshogs cis sred dang / 'phang zhing gang de dga' zhing the dang// thub pas kun gzhi nam bzhi rtags/ sa bon rang gi chos kyi rnams/ cig la cig rten 'dug pa ni/ dpe' du myung 'bab bzhin// nyin chen du ni
56b3(1): mcho cher 'du chu 'bab pa ni bad pa myed// mtsho yang rnam par myi rtog go// shes pa'i mdzod kyang de bzhin te// shin tu zad cing mu 'gram myed// rnam par shes rnams bag chags ni// nyin chen song zhing rtag par 'dul// sa la ring
56b4(1): chen nam mang dang // rdzas gzhan rnam pa mang po bzhin// sems can rnams las sasangs shing byin// de bzhin du ni long spyod sbyang // shes pa'i mdzod kyang de bzhin te/ 5/ rnam rtog gzhan dang ldan cig tu/ skye zhing shi ba skyes 'phel
56b5(1): to// gnas sbyar las su drang tshor grug gtsang dang spyad pa spyong labs/ bas// / sa bcu las ni 'byung zhing 'das// yang dag gshegs kyis don bzhugs// stobs bcu kun ni mchog cing chang
56b6(1): drang po yang dag mtha' nyid 'dug/ rtag par myi zhig myi dngas so/ sa dang tshungs te nam rtog myed // mthun par phrul pa'ang ba myed// dpyid ka'i me tog mang g.yos bzhin/ myi dang be'u
56b7(1): kun zhi zhing sred// rnam shes chags dri nad de bzhin te/ thub pa slab pa mang du led// de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bu rnams ni// shes rab myed cing yang dag bral// bzhud las khas par myi shes na// myi bden gdodan myi za bar skyes
56b8(1): chos byed chad pa'i tshig dang bral / sems can rnams ni khyag cing 'jugs// chos rnams pa dang kyi 'jungs bdag/ tha dad par ni tshig ga gsos// dbe du sgyu ma'i ma'ad tha 'azhi// sngardzas kyi chos sa/ 
56b9(1): spyo mkhas pas/ me tog 'bras bu nam mang byung // de ltang sangs rgyas byang chub kyi// khas pa'o thabs kyi zhes rab kyis// 'jig rteran gyi chungs pa dang 'dug/ tha dang gyi chungs bden par 'dugs// spang ba'i sgo mgon
56b10(1): saka mas nyi gas pa yang byed/ 'ad bye ba ba'i ma nams// gsang kya dang mngon pa sad/ ngasabla na brgyad go// su gnyis sas kyi skye bani bsumanasan shesas// 
57a1(1): can gis su 'bab 'khor spyod// rnam shes rgyad dang khams kun gnas// lhan cig g.yos te ngan 'dus tshogs// yid kyi thag pas su ni sgyu dang // snga phyi lus dang phyi ma'i lus// sangs rgyas skyes bu 'di bshad do// 'jig rten rgyu
57a2(1): zhing 'bab cing khong / lus de thams cad zad par ni/ skye ba 'dud de chad pa myed// de nas rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ khams rnams kyi don bshad zin nas/ da ni rin po che gtsang dag gi pho brang gi nang nas/ jis kyang
57a3(1): 'jigs pa myed pa thob zin da nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dun tu spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo// yang sangs myed pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po yod pa/ yul sa gzhan nas tshogs pa 'di 'ongs pa rnams kyis sgra thun
57a4(1): bar sdod pa/ shin tu dge'o// shin tu dge'o// mang po mang nang na yang grangs myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / lha rnams kyi bu mo yod pa kun san las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'greng ste/ cig gis cig la ltas nas tshig le'u sa
57a5(1): bshad de smras pa/ thub pa'i nang gi thams cad la/ de la 'ba' zhigatho bo byas/ da ni byang chub sems rnams la// phra dam gyi ni skyes bu bshad/ mur 'dug dang ni yongs su spangs/ mur 'dug dang ni ngacag
57a6(1): mas/ de garjod 'a yongs su smras/ de bas na ci bzhin/ 'ams bya yang ma'i skyes bu / thams rnamasarkyen chogs yin/ rgyu 'i du gyi / ril
57a7(1): nang ni/ bya rjes yod par mngon par snang / cig tu shing dang bral ba lam/ myi cher pa ru dung tshungs/ na mkha'i nang na bya rjes snang / shing dang bral zhing me yod pa/ bdag dang 'jig rten thams cad kyi/ de lta bu'i don mi mthong
57a8(1): ma myong / bya bud sgro gshog spyad pas su/ nam kha'i nang na rjes myed do// de bas skyes bu bshad pa yang bya'i rjes dang 'tshungs shing 'dra/ de ltar lta ba rnams kun la/ 'khor zhing ldog pa'i don yod rung / khams kyis skyes bus ba
57a9(1): pa ni/ rnag par skyen 'bab cing mthong / skyed sdug 'bras bu rnams kun mnos/ las byas thams cad 'ad pa myed// zhing bas su ni las byas bzhin/ 'bras bu mthob ma myong / 'bras bu de sprin grub pas na/ phyi ma'i 'bras bu yong
57a10(1): skyes so// lus ni yang ni de dang rmongs/ lus 'dug pas su dge la yod kyang / sngar skyes dang ni phyir skye gnas// khor mod lnga myi skyed par gnos pa sa las rtag tu dpal yon spang/ yong ngas sangs rgyas rgyu yang byas/ rnam par
57b1(1): dang phyi nad rnams kyis drang po dang ni tshor bgrub/ lha ru skye ba'i dang dbang 'bras/ bzhugs pa spyod pa yang dag don yang mthong // lnga dang bral ba'i skyes bu ni/ thams cad zad par yod pa myed/ yod pa'i skyes bu 'bar 'khor te/ skye zhing shi ba'i
57b2(1): nang na 'dug/ ma ki gting myed dmyal ba na/ ya ru lha rnams gnas la thug/ las des 'bras bu skye yang dag/ byas so chog ni song myi bong / phyi nang gi ni 'jig rten la/ mthu'i ris kyis skye zhing g.yol/ 'di'i chos ni pha bi 'dra/ 
57b3(1): la bi yang ni 'di las skyes lam gyi skyes bu bral mod kyi/ 'khor lo skor ba thob pa yod/ rdo'i bu mo'i bu yis su/ cho ga 'gro 'dug nus pa dang / ri bong du yod phra zhing rdo// bye ma'i nang nas mar byung nus der tshungs/ de nas tshogs pa'i byang
57b4(1): chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang lha'i bu mo rnams kyis tshig 'di bshad zin nas/ kun gyis ldan tu yon gsol nas/ yon dang mthun pa ni rdo rje'i snying po btsun pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams te/ yon gsolang zin/ 
57b5(1): nas yang lhan cig tu sems bathun par tshig 'dung bshad de sprul pa// chos gyi dbyis ldan sems pa myed/ rgya'i dpe' yis su kun bzadang rgyudang / gzhan gyi phyig gas thub par nus/ rang gi legs sus mngon par / 
57b6(1): ga ga de lta bas na tho grub me byung te bye zhing bcang pa'i tshogs pa 'diyi na myir pas sems ca kun kyang thos par 'dos de nas rdo rje'i snying po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po saci
57b7(1): me khrus lan dran pa / chos 'di ga nya mas pasam pa dga'/ rnam par rtog pa sleb myi nus// zhugs pa'i mi gcang dag gzung / dpe'i rgyu las bye zhing 'chi/ gsang rgyad kyi ni thub spyod gnas/ de'i nang ni ngas drangs bshang / phyongs com
57b8(1): pa lnga myi rnams / kun kyang sems cig gtam pa'i rigs/ de nas rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chon pos/ tshig 'di bshad zin nas/ yang 'od chen gyi 'am ci'i rgyal po la tshig le'u de bshad de na smras pa/ stong chen gyi 'am ci/ 
57b9(1): khyod kyims nyid shes pa dogs chos kyi rnams ni ci ltang 'dug/ rob song bar dri yang byed/ de ltang mthong zhing thos pa ni / gathub pa la ni na byanas myed/ can las 'brug cig chos dang chungs 'bru gnang yang ni zhes pa'i rigs/ chog
57b10(1): kun kyang na ni bzhin te// byi gos na ni bape ye shes pa/ dbe du na lasrungs pas// 'chub ma'i rdzogs pas rgyang sa dang rungs/ mom byi ba digasu/ ri tuzhi pa ma nag tu / chos kyi 'ang ma yin/ yongs
58a1(1): ma yin no// rnam par shes pa'i mdzod kyis sbyar nga/ mdzod ni stong pas mtshan ma byas/ de nas song chen myi 'am ci'i rgyal pos tshig le'us dris pa/ ji ltar sems kyis dpa'i rang / khams kyi skyes bu yod ces bya/ ji ltar khas
58a2(1): nang du skyes/ sra dang sher dang dro dang g.yo'o// de nas rdo rje'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// tshig de thos nas/ tshig le'us lan bla na pa/ shin tu dge'o stong chen rgyal/ khyod kyis da ltar 'di 'dri byas/ spyad
58a3(1): ba spyod par bya ba ni/ de sems can yang dag bden par song / ngas su da ni khyod la bshad/ khyim gyi khan po nyan mkhas pa/ khyod gna' lding ba'i khang bu dang / shes gnyen dang ni lhan cig tu/ sil snyan spyod de nam kha 'babs/ 'ongs te
58a4(1): sangs rgyas thad tu phyi nang/ khyod kyi lag gi snyand pa'i khyim/ bye hu rgyas su rgya nad byas te/ sbrengs na sgra snyan chen po 'byung / mang po'i sems ni dga' ba g.yos/ grangs myed pa'i nyan thos rnams/ sangs rgyas gan du rtog cing nyan/ phyi ma
58a5(1): 'i sems ni 'dzin ma nus// so so'i bdag phyogs gang yang byas/ de'i tshig lha'i thod tshugs dri ma chen pos su/ 'od srung la satshogs sgo smras pa / khyod la sosogs pa 'dod bral myi/ ji'i phyi ru gang cing chen
58a6(1): de nas 'od srung chen pos su lha'i thor gtsug dra ma de la smrasabyang chub la ni mthu chen yod/ dpe' du drung chub drag dang tshungasanyan thos thob pa'i shes rab myed/ ri nag g.yo' zhing 'gul ba bzhin
58a7(1): 'khrug pa'i rnam rtog bral mod kyi/ 'on kyang bag chags 'jim pas zhon du/ des su bag chags rnams btang na/ sems dag pas su sangs rgyas grub/ khyod kyi phra zhib khams la ni/ sems kyis thog myed tha dad bsu
58a8(1): jog rten bzod pa nam mang dang / snang zhing mngon pa gdon gyi za sa'i mtshan ma thams cad dang / sangs rgyas gsang dag chos la 'khas/ khyod ni pho bra du 'dug/ gnyen gshes kyis su 'thong bar sgo nga // gcad
58a9(1): zhing dag la bzang pos rgya na/ dpe' du zla ba gang rgyas bzhin/ bzhugs par spyad pa spyod pa ni/ rang dbang mang po yod pa'i nang / ngal khams kyi skyes bu 'dri/ ji ltar sems las g.yos zhes zeng / khyod dang sangs
58a10(1): rgyas bu rnams kun/ zad par sems cig nyand pa'i rigs/ khams de kun gyi nang na ni/ sems bying skyes su zhes bya/ khams kun thams cad ro'i rgyu skyes/ de'i 'on ni ngas bshad do// gsheng zhing dran pa chulas skyes
58b1(1): tsha ba'i drod ni me las skyes// 'gul zhing g.yol ba las rnams myed/ de ni drung gi khams rgyas g.yos// gzugs kyi nI mas nas su/ sa dang nem khA yod pa ni// khams dang bka chags rnams kyis su/ shes pa skyes te spyad cing
58b2(1): tshogs// mying dang kha dog la sogs pa/ mtshan gzugs so so myi mthun no// de ni skye ba'i sgo yangs byas// lta ba rnams kyis rtag par bsams// de na ma ni rin cen mdzod// rang dbang gi pho brang gi nang nas// gzugs 'dzin byang
58b3(1): chub sems dpa' dang / grangs myed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' cig car stand las langs te/ mgo' bos btugs nas phyag 'tshal te/ yon dam pa rnams khyer nas rdo rje'i snying po btsun pa la gsol gyi seng du// rin po che'i dra brkyang ste/ 
58b4(1): de'i gang g.yog par g.yogs nas/ 8/ skad thun par spyod pa/ shin tu dge'o shin tu dge'o// spyod pa'i le'u bshad do// btsun pa chos kyi byin la gnas/ sangs rgyas sa du 'jug la 'khas// byang chub sems dpa' mang po la/ yang dag
58b5(1): gshegs 'bas phye son de mkhas / di'i tshe song cen myi 'am rtsi'i rgyal po dang / lha rnams yang dam par bzang ba'i yo byad rnam pa mang po khyer te yon tu gsol lo// yon gsol zin nas tshig le'us sod pa
58b6(1): shi tu dge'o rdo rje'i snying / cis kyang 'jigs pa myed thor zo/ yang dgashegs kyi phrad ma chos/ bdag chag rnams la byes shong / da 'di ma ni pho zang gi/ gtsang zhing dang la dge' shis mchog
58b7(1): de nas 'phags pa rtogs pa rang dbang byang chub sems dpal/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa'/ mthu' chen thob byang chub sems dpa'// / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'// rin cen gtsug byang chub sems dang
58b8(1): lha'i thod gtsug byang chub sems dpa'// mdo 'dzin byang chub sems dpa'// don thams cad grub pa byang chub sems dpa'// de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / gzhan grangs myed pa'i bzhugs
58b9(1): par spyad pa spyod pa kun sangs rgyas kyi bu ste/ brjid kyi legs pa chen tha yod pas/ bzhugs pa spyod pa'i sems bye zhing gnod pa kun san ldas te/ cigs cig ltas rtags nas// rdo rje snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems
58b10(1): dpa' chen po la/ tshigs su bcad de smras pa// cig tu smonang pa rdo rje btsun// chos kyi myig ni mngon par gnad kabatsun pa sa'i mtshan ma'i mkhas// thams cad kun ni rdzogs par mkhas// yang dag
59a1(1): gshegs kyis rtag par dgongs// sangs rgyas bus su btsun zhing gus// da 'di thub chen mang po rnams// sems cig thun skal gsol pa// bzhugs pa rang dpyang yod pas su// gsang bas rgya nang
59a2(1): gnang par smod// 'jig rten thams cad zad bar kun// yod par ma myong thob par gyis// chos 'di nang gi gtsang dag ste// smra zhing bshad pa yongs sangs so// sprul ba'i byang chub sangs rgyas rnams// chos
59a3(1): yig 'di ni nga rung ma phye ma bshad do// 'phags pa rnams kyi chos skyid pasanang / yang dag zag myed khams kyang bas nang // yang dag zag myed khams kyang mthong // rang gis tshong pa'i ye shes spasbyang // gtsang zhing dag se/ 
59a4(1): mchog zla myed// ting nge la'i nad dang gzungs kyi sngags kun kyang chog cing chang ba'o// rang dbang gi ni rnam tha rang kun// yid las skyes pa'i lus rnam bcu/ sangs rgyas yul la rgyan cing gtsang // grangs ni bsam gyis myi khya'o/ 
59a5(1): sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub rnams/ lus dpag pa ni rdul blan pa'i na/ spu'i thog mar thub pa bzhin// rgya che'i nang na cig pu paH/ gsang rgya nang pa'i yul sa'i// sa rnams nang na mchog tu
59a6(1): 'phags ka de lta bu'i bzhugs skyong ba/ 'ongs te 'di ru skyes pa'o// ni kun dza'i rgya pa ni// sangs rgyas bus su bshad pa smond// de nas rdo rje snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
59a7(1): chen po mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang // dpe' byad bzang po rgya cus// de'i lus rgyan tu rgya nad te/ bshad cing sta nad par chad nas/ gyes shing bral ba dang / sangs rgyas snga ma la rnam par rtog pa myed de
59a8(1): chos kyi myig seg ge'i rgyal po dang chungs/ mang po tshogs pa la khyad par ltas nas/ de dag gi shes rab kyis nyand cing gnod par nus drung par rig se/ de ma thag tu tshangs pa'i sgra dang / ki ling ka'i sgra dang / lce che zhing ring ba'i
59a9(1): mtshan dang / gsal zhing snyan pa'i sgra dang / sgra des gdon myi za bar mang po dga' bar rung ba/ brlang zhing myi snyan pa myed mnyel zhing dul ba/ snyand pa dang ke mal ma'i sgra dang / o da'i sgra dang / si li ta'i sgra dang / la sba ba'i sgra dang
59a10(1): bar tsa ma'i sgra dang / byi lam byi tam to lo la sosogs pa'i sgra kun chog 'tshal te/ dpag tu myed pa'i legs pa'i don lhan cig mthun pa'i nyan pa/ de dag gi sems sred cing chags pa ma byas pas sgra skad kyi mtshan ma la
59b1(1): rig cing tha da la mkhas par nus pas/ lha dang myi dang dri 'phrog la sogs pa thams cad myi dga' myi mos pa myed do// rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kha nas bshad pa'i tshig myed de/ dang po'i smon lam gyi sogs
59b2(1): spyad pas/ de'i lus kyi smin ma dang / sbal ba dang / spyi bo dang / sna dang / phrag pa dang / pus mo kun nas sbya dad cing sprul pa dang / tshungs par rang de lta bur sgra byang te/ phal mang po rnams la mos kyi myig drangs shing bshad pa ni/ 
59b3(1): dper dad pa'i rgyal po la dang mo khyu 'bab mar 'brang ba dang tshungs te/ bye gling gi steng na 'dug nas/ dkar zhing gtsang ba bzang pos rgyand pa dang tshungs so// rdo rje'i snying po con 'grus chen po rang dbang gi gtsang dag pa'i pho brang na gnas pa la sangs
59b4(1): rgyas kyi bu rnams mang pos lhan cig tu 'khor bar skord nas/ rgya nad cing gtsang ba yang de bzhin te/ nam kha'i nang gi zla ba snang ba'i 'od kyis skar ma mang po/ sgribs pa dang tshungs so// rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' yang de dang
59b5(1): chungs te/ seng ge'i dri la 'dug na/ sbyang ba spyod pa rnams thams/ cad sgribs shing mchod/ zla ba dang 'od dang chungs te tha dad pa myed do// sangs rgyas dang / rdo rje'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' yang de dang / 
59b6(1): chungs mnyam te/ tha dad pa myed do// de nas bden mthong byang chub sems dpa' chen pos/ sasbyang ba spyod pa'i sa la khyong ba'i phal mngapo'i nang nas pho bos byas nas san las langs nas/ thal mo sbyar nas
59b7(1): zhes gus par byang chub sems dpal gzhan la ltas te/ tshig le'u 'di bshang de smras pa/ kyi hud theg pa chen po'i chos/ phra zhing dam pa bsam myi khyab/ yang dag gshegs pa'i khas yin gyis/ sangs rgyas bu
59b8(1): rnams spyi bos phyag 'tshal rigs// bsam myed dri ma'i chos dang bral/ dkon cog shin tu phrag par dka'// yul sa thams cad kun gyi nang // sangs rgyas rnams ni zhib tu rtags// theg chen yang dag bden pa'i bzhud
