77a7(1): bshes gnyen la se nad pa la rtson pa'i byang chub sems dpal de nyid/ dge' ba'i gshes gnyen gyi gam du 'gro zhing gnyen pa'i phyir snyan bkur byed la ci ltar rjes su bstand pa bzhin du sgrub cing / bdag gi yang dag pa'i nan tan rjes su dran pas theg pa chen
77a8(1): thos dang pa'o// de la byas pa ban pa'i ris su dran pa'i dad pa ni gang dge' ba'i gshes gnyen la snyen pa la thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid de las man ngag dang yon tan rjes su thob nas byas pa bzo pa de rjes su dran pa sa theg pa chen po la dad pa
77a9(1): de la bla ma'i 'dod pa sgrub pa'i rjes su dran pa'i dad pa ni/ gang dge' ba'i shes gnyen la se dad pa'i la tshon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de nyid man ngag des skye bo mang po la phan par bya ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dad pa'o// gzhan yang dad pa bzhis
77a10(1): bzhi gang zhes/ ldan pa'i bsam pa sgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang / bral ba'i bsam pa sbubs pa'i rjes su dran pa'i dad pa dang / kyi bral ba'i bsam pa sgrib pa rjes su dran pa'i ngang pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa'i bsam pa rjes su dran pa'i/ 
77b1(1): na ma bsgru pa'i su ga pa byams pa rnasapas cad pa kya ma'imapa pa' ma mas 'di ba na kyi masas pas she na gyu ba zhes sudran
77b2(1): sa pachen pa las pa/  la pa nga ba cus kyang nus sa 'das bsun da/ 
77b3(1): chog de la kyi bras pa'i sam bsgrub pa rjes su dran pa'i dang pa ni sang mas bsgom pa sa son pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la bde tha kyi bral pa'i babs pa drub pa ces su dra pas theg pa chen po la nga / re na
77b4(1): nas nyon mthos pa skyed pa'i bsam bslab pa del du dran pa'i dad pa ni gang btang snyom pa sgom pa la thon pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can nams la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i byed pa'i bsam pa spu ba rjes su dran pas theg pa chen po la dang brjod
77b5(1): rigs kyi bu de ltang byang dub sems dbus theg pa chen po la dad pa'i rnas dang rab tu dbye ba chad byed pa 'di lta bu dag gis theg pa chen pos dang pa'i rnas ba rab tu dbye ba'i chad myed par shes par bya'o// skal ba bye ba khrag khrig
77b6(1): busang de'i mtha' bde pa shes par myi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang rung sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir theg pa chen pos dang parab tu dbye ba rig par bya'o// // ca
77b7(1): rab tu dbye ba'i le'u zhes bya ste sum pa'o// / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs can gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po'i slad du/ theg pa chen po la ngang pa'i phan yon du 'chal bar bgyi ba gang lags// 
77b8(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa lad pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po'i phyir/ theg pa chen po la dad pa'i phan yon ni tshad myed de rje'i phyogs tsam zhig bas nad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
77b9(1): dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'phel bar byed pas rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
77b10(1): skalang pa mnyam pa dang / skal pa myi mnyam par sems skyed pa nag las// byang chub sems skyed pa srung ba'i phyir kun srung ba'o// rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni bdag gi don dang / gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs
78a1(1): pa dang mthun pa'i phyir don che ba'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni chos kyi dbyings zab mo pas nang ba ni rnam ga thams cad la thos pa bathun pa'i phyi dbab bo// / rigs kyi bu
78a2(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon pa shes pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa dang mthun pa'i phyir mthu' che b.ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dang
78a3(1): pa nI sems can chad myed pa yongs su smind par byed pa dang mthun pa'i phyir gzi rdzing che ba'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
78a4(1): thams cad sgrub pa dang / mthun pa'i phyir ming du 'gro ba'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni/ bdun gyi las dang mu segs can thams cad kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa myi skul ba'i phyir myi g.yog pa yos
78a5(1): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni mang du thos pa la rten nas/ sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa dang mthun pa'i phyir nus pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa chen
78a6(1): napo la dad pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i nan tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang mthun pa'i phyir sgrub par byed/ pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la
78a7(1): tad gan gams rgyan chen pothob pa dang / spem dang gi nga mid kyims 'dus pa dang dun rdo myong rnaMm su ris kyi byong du mas dpa' dmas kyi sa pa
78a8(1): pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su skong ba dang mthun pa'i phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su skang ba dang mthun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems
78a9(1): can thams cad dang bar chun lus dang ngag gi gnod pa myed pa yang dag par 'dzind tu zhug pa dang / mthun pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spang ba dang mthun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpal rnams kyi/ 
78a10(1): theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can log par zhugs pa dang / 'khor ba'i sdug sngal dang / dka' ba spyod pa thams cad dang du blang ba dang mthun pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa yongs su skad pa dang thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang
78a11(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni skalang pa mtha' yas par chos gang po rnam par yongs myi skyo ba dang mthun pa'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su spang ba dang mthun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
78b1(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa cher po sa dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi don sgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin pa mngon par sgrub pa dang // mun pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi pha ros tu byid pa yongs su spang ba' dang mthun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
78b2(1): dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i yeshes bla ra myed pa la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang mthun pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byings pa yongs su spang bar nga thud pa'o// rigs
78b3(1): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni/ sems can gyi tshogs mtha' yas pa theg pa sum gyis nges par 'byung ba'i yang dag par brtand pa dang mthun pa'i phyir tshogs yongs su sdud pa dang mthun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
78b4(1): sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni/ bsod nams kyi tshad myed pa skyed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing rmad du byung ba'i bsod nams yongs su bzung ba dang mthun pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim 'gro bya ba chen po dang
78b5(1): bathun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal dang / dgen pa'i shes gnyen yongs su bzung ba dang mthun pa'i phyir shi nang tu yongs su bzung ba dang thun sde
78b6(1): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dang ba ni sems can dbag tu skyed pa la ldan pa dang bral ba dang / kun ras nyon mongs pa myed pa'i bsam pa bsgrubs pa dang mthun pa'i phyir snying rtse bas don pa ni
78b7(1): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i khrulang pa'i nyes byas kun tu 'amyong ba thams cad la 'dzem pa nye bar gnas pa dang mthun pa'i phyir shin tu sbed pa'o// rigs kyi bu
78b8(1): kya chum sems dpa rnams kyi theg pa cher pos dad pa ni sems can log par zhugs par ma/ 'anang ba'i sbug sngal dang / dag ba spyong ba thams cad la spying lug pa myed pa dang mthun pa'i phyir rten parjod/ rigs kyi bu byas
78b9(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni nyin mtshan du dge' ba'i phyogs chen po mngon par byon par bya bas yongs myi skyo ba dang mthun pa'i phyir sbyong ba legs par goms par bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub
78b10(1): sa ga pa rnams kyi theg pa chen pos dang ba'i/ rig pa gnas 'byung ba 'dun pa'i phying segs par byang ba'o// rnams kyi sa byang chub sems pa 'a rnams kyi sa pa chen po la dad pa ni/ tshus thams sa
79a1(1): bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba dang mthun pa'i phyir thun pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni gnod pa dang / ma dad pa dang / sdang ba dang / the tsom dang / rnyog pa'i dri ma dang bral/ 
79a2(1): ba'i phyir rin po che lta bung lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po sa dad pa ni rgya che ba dang / kha na ma thob byed pa dang / dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' bas lus dang sems tshim par byed pa'i phyir zla ba lta bur lta'o// 
79a3(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis theg pa chen po la dad pa ni rnam pa thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la khyab pa'i phyir nam khA lta bur lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis theg pa chen po la dad pa ri bsod nams
79a4(1): dang ye shes tshad byed pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir rin po che sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i gru lta bur blta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i gnas yin pas kyi chen po lta bur lha na
79a5(1): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni ngan song dang ngan 'gro thams cad las 'da' ba'i phyir zam pa lta bur lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / sems can
79a6(1): mas cad kyi dge ba'i za ba'i mthog skyed pa'i cha 'byed pa'i bying sabon lta bu rten/ byang chub sems dpas rnams kyi mig pa chen po sa dang pani/ nyon mos nyes pa dang nye ba'i rgan 'angon pa'i dkri'i mamon mamams cad kyis gnod par
79a7(1): myi 'gyur bar srung ba'i phyir go cha lta bur lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge' ba'i rtsa bo rin po che phun sum tshogs pa thams cad tshogs shing sdud de rnam pa dgas
79a8(1): par byed pa'i phyir gter chen po lta bu bska'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni de las gzhan du dad pa thams cad pi lad kyis gnon pa'i dbang brnyed pa'i phyir rgyal po lta bur lha'o// byang chub sems
79a9(1): dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni yun ring po nas rjes su 'brang ba'i ngan song dang gnod sems dang / sdig pa myi dge' ba'i las dang / nyon mongs pa drug gi gnyen por gyudad pa'i phyir sman nad myed byed lta bur lta'o// byang
79a10(1): chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni/ dga' ba'i rtsa ba gcod pa la dad pa'i tshon cha'i gnyen por gyurd pa'i ya'i phyir rdo lta bur lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dad pa ni smre sngags 'don pa
79b1(1): dru sngal da / bras kyis gos pathams cad gnos pa dang bathun pa'i phying kye 'bab pa lta bur lta'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po la dang pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa ma
79b2(1): cang gzhes par byed pa dang mthun para'i byi po legs pa lta bung lta'o// rigs kyi bu tas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi che / rgyal po'i lab 'di nyid du bung myed phreng ba'i tha chang phyag da
79b3(1): byed pa ngan 'gro ba zhig byung ste/ des khyim bdag che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig gi khyim du sangs rgyas la gathogs pa/ dge'i slong gi dge' 'dun spyan 'dren ces thos nas/ de dkris pa dang skom pas gnyer pas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la pa
79b4(1): der song ba dang / des khyong kyi byams sangs rgyas la thogs pa/ dge' slong gi dger 'dus rab tu zhi ba'i baspyod lam du gnas pa dang bshos 'dren pa mthong ngo // bud myed des 'apyod lam phun sum rtogs pa de dang / tshogs kyis spong ba mdzes pa da
79b5(1): dang mthong nas nakye ma'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasargyas 'od srung rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam dang / zham ring ba mdzes pas mdzes so zhes dad pa'i sems cig du skyed nas de mchi ba'i dus so/ 
79b6(1): de rgyu de nyid kyis sum bcu phra sum gyi lha'i nad du skye ba nas/ rgyu de nyid kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyurd pa'i bar du'o// rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang
79b7(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi tshe/ rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid du zas 'dod ces bya ba'i bram ze cig byung ngo // zas 'dod des sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge' 'dun dkon chog la rang bzhin gyis ma dang na snyen bkur
79b8(1): lcags zhig byed// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir gshegs pa dang / bram ze de yang don zhig gtung zhing rgyal po'i khab nas drun
79b9(1): de byung ba dang bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa de la sa bon du mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang des zugs mdzes pa la dmyigs te kye sa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs de bzhin gshegs pa da
79b10(1): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ mtshan dang dpe' byad bzang po rnams kyis kyi legs par rgya dang to zhes dad pa'i sems skyed nas de mchi ba'i dus byas so// dra/ de chu nges rab 'tshe ma'i lha'i mang du skye ga
80a1(1): / nas rgyu de nyid kyis rims kyis/ blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nges par gyur da pa'i bar du'o// rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te/ 'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi
80a2(1): che rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid du gzhan mu segs can lnga rgya zhig byung ste/ de dag gis skabs btsal ba'i bsam pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
80a3(1): 'od srung khong rgya phrag du mas sko rad te 'dun gyis byas nas chos stond cing bzhugs so// de na mu stegs can lnga rgya tsam po de dag kyis/ kye ma'o yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung ni snyan pa gsung ba'o// zhes dad pa'i sems cig/ 
80a4(1): skyed nas de dag rmi ba'i dus byas so// de dag rgyu des dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skyes pa nas/ rgyu de nyid kyis rim gyis nga'i 'and pa la rab tu byung ste/ zag pa zad pa rjes su thob pa'i bar du'o// rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes te/ gang gi phyir de
80a5(1): bzhin gshegs pas 'od zer gang gis sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams/ sems can dmyal ba nas byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'od zer dkye bas des sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i sems can rnams la reg nas/ sems
80a6(1): can dmyal pa'i gnod pa'i sdug snga la thams cad rgyun chad de 'de ba dang ldan par thum/  nas/ de dag ni sngam gyi gang gis dag cag gi sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pa'i sdug sngal thams cad tshun chad nas
80a7(1): de ba dang ldan par byu brjod sum mthu sum pa dang / de bzhi gshegs pas rkyen gyis rlabs nas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ngo // mthong nas kye mchogang gis ba ni chan gi sems can dmyal ba'i smyan/ 6na
80a8(1): rnam thams cad rgyun can nas/ bde ba dang ldan par gyung pa de'i mthu' 'di ni che ba'i snyam se dad pa'i sems cas spyod nas de dan 'otsho ba'i dus byas te 'ama'athos nas rgyu de nyid kyis chungs par de das 'ang stsa'o pa nas rings
80a9(1): pa skyed de/  mab kyi klus/ ya ngas sa rgyas kyi zis pa yos su rgyang sa so//  pa pa dzin pal thar myod pa yang da pang jos pa
80a10(1): sa sa ma sa 'a sa su ngas ni sa ya byung /  gas pa yi pa chen pa dang pa sa kyi chu ba'i 'im chis
80b1(1): cig na na ma rnam mas par byas/ kha cig ni kun nas nyan mangs par gyu nga pa'i bus yas par gyu coM log nas kyang 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rjes su thob po//  theg pa men po sa dad pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg can
80b2(1): chen pos dang rgyun du byung zhing chu bo ltar 'bab pa'i lan yon lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bska lad pa bye ga zhag khrig 'bum du yang rjod par sle ba ma yin no// de skad ces bka' bas lang gas// byang chub sems dang zhwa dang pa thabs chen gyis bcom sngam sA
80b3(1): la 'di skad ces pa polang to// sa nan das kyis las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mos pas yod pa lazhugs pa rnams sa theg pa chen po lnga dad pa'i batshan nyid pu sum rtogs pa bas dad pa dang / skyeb thun su marmonapa pa das pa dang rab tu skye
80b4(1): kun sum tshogs pa gnad pa dang /  phan yon phun sum rogs pa bgand pa ni po mchang to// bcom ldan 'das rjes su dpag pa dang rjes su 'jug pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa rad pa mchis na
80b5(1): dag kyang brjod par 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na las dang po pa'i byang chubasems dpa' lnga song byang chub sems dpa'i chos mngon par rtogs pa rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa chen po skyes so// 'khor der 'dus pa lnga
80b6(1): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas gang sa la das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sa mom pa sngo tu btang te/ sbyong bar bgyid pa ni ring por myi thogs par de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas dang / btung ba dang / bzhon pa dang / na bka' dang / byan da
80b7(1): snod spyad dang / mchog chas dang / yo byad dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / klu dang / gang dang / rol mo'i dbyangs skra dang / mar mye dang / bud myed dang / skyes pa dang / kun spyod pa'i yo byad thob par 'gyur ro// de ras byang chub sems
80b8(1): dpa' dade/ ba snod yongs su tshol bas byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs can la 'di skad ces ga smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi zhal zas dang / rgyan dang / snod spyad dang / mchog chas dang / yo byad gang yin// spos dang / phreng ba dang
80b9(1): byug pa dang / glu dang gang dang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra dang / mar me dang / gdug spos dang / skyes pa/ dang / kun spyad pa'i yo byad gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' dad pa thabs can gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i bsam
81a1(1): rna gas nanas kya rjod pa / dIb mams can nam pangs pa ma shes pa dang / thos ma man 'i ba'i gshegs pa rnams kyin tshamasgrib pathams cad rnam par dag bzhin tshas chub rnams dmas
81a2(1): dag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rgyan no// sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mang tu thos pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi snong yang drang mchog chas dang yo byed do// sgrib pa thams cad nas pa lcibs ma gtan nang rnam par thadad pa dang ti Te/ 
81a3(1): 'dzin dang snyoms par zhugs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spom dang / byug pa'o// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi rdzogs par longs baspyod pa 'brel pa'i gtam rnam par gdon myi che ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi glu dang ga
81a4(1): dang / ros pa'i sgra byungs pa/ sgrib sathams cad rnam pa dag pa'i gzungs kyi rnams ni de bzhi gshegs pa rnams kyi mar bye'o// sgrib pa thams cad na' byang dag pa'i tid nge 'dzid kyi sgo dang / rnam par dag pa'i sgornams ni de bzhin gsheshes pa rna/ 
81a5(1): rdzob dang / don dam par yang dag par thob par 'gyur na/ gang dag 'di na de bzhin nyid du spyod par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rna mas kyi yo byad bcu po 'di dag ni thob par 'gyur ba'i steng du de dag gis
81a6(1): gnal myed khang la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa'i gzhal myed khang de'ang thob par 'gyur ro// smras pa// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs pa'i gzhal myed khang ci 'dra// byang chub sems dpa' drad pa thabs can gyis smras/ 
81a7(1): ba/ rigs kyi bu rin po che sna bdun mchog tu 'bar bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad myed pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i 'od zer chen po shin tu 'byung ba// gnas gzhan dag shi nang tu rnam par phye ba chang myed rnam par gzhug pa/ 'khor kyi byams
81a8(1): mangs su ma chad pa khams sum po nas yang dag gang 'das pa'i spyod yus kyi mtshan nyid 'jig rten las 'das pa'i de'i bla ma'i dge' ba'i za ba las byung ba/  dbang sbyang ba'i rnam par rig par shi nang tu nas phung dag pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhin gshegs
81b1(1): ba'i gnas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu myed pa gnas pa lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang lham yin dang / nam kha lding dang / myi lam ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / myi dang phyi ma yin pa dpag tu myed pa rnam par rgyu ba'i chos kyi de'i dga' ba dang bde
81b2(1): ba ched pos brtan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad mdzad pa nye bar gnas pa// nyon mangs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs khri gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bdud thams cad yongs su sangs pa/ thams cad kyi dgang ba las lhag pa de bzhing gshes
81b3(1): bzhi byin kyis rlabs kyis bkod pa/ dran pa dang blo gros dang / rtogs pa chen pos nges par 'gro ba/ zhi nas dang lhag mthong chen po'i theg pa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang // smonang ba myed pa nas 'jug pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs
81b4(1): tshan myed pas rgyan pa pad ma chen po'i rgyal po la rten pa'i gzhal myed khang chen po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs te/ rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la smos pa sngon tu bdang ste/ sbyor bar byed pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
81b5(1): gzhal byed kha ba de lta bu'i yang thob par 'gyur na/ gang dag de bzhin nyid du spyod par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas sad pa/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi
81b6(1): bu ci ldang byed kyis bshad pa bzhi te/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dil mom pa ston tu btang nas sbyong bar byed pa de dag ni ring por byi thogs par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi po byad 'di dag dang / de bzhin nyid / can
81b7(1): sa la gnas par gyudad to// ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ni byang chub sems dpal dag ni lhag par ting nge 'dzind kyi mchog dam pa'i chos la gong nas gong du phar te/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzind la gnas par gyur to// 
81b8(1): bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' bas lang pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ 'jig rten rnyog pa can gyi dus na sems can gang la la zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan mchog dam pa zhig gi mtshan shad pa
81b9(1): thos rab kyi sngang myi skrag cing the tsom myi byed na/ gang zag de ni nyon mongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yong bar rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan mchog mashad pa thos nas sa rjes su ying rang bar byed du/ 
81b10(1): sang pa ni ldan song gi kha mtha'a' mas ngan pa byas pa yang byang bar 'gyur ro// skye ba'i gnas thams cad du yang ngang song sum du myi skye zhing myi 'dzem brgyad kyi sar skye bar myi 'gyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bad
82a1(1): thas mang ba'i min/ me dang blan ba ke'u rgyal mams pa/ dge slong mi dge sa dun chen po dang / byams pa la bsogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / dge 'a slong brgya brag kyi dang bcusus la sartog pa ma dbar po rnams
82a2(1): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' nas/ spyi bos blangs nas rjes su spyod do// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzind kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i mdo las/ gsang ba'i man tan zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
82a3(1): gnyis pa'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzis kyi rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i mdo'o/ bam po bcu ste/ rdzogs s+ho/ rgyag bskad du/ a rgyu ma ga A na pra sa/ 
82a4(1): da pra b+ha ba na/ na ma ma ha yA ma su tra/ bod skad du// 'phags pa theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu smos pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams 'angs bug 'am la tsho// 'di skang bangan hU~M/ 
82a5(1): thos pa'i dus cig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge' 'dun chen po thams cad kun
82a6(1): dung byanas bsam pa/ nyams pad shes sa namangs batham pas kyis sa skye smral b.ri na mus pa/ mas bzhi ci ma gsabs pa sachen pa'i ye ka bas
82a7(1): tu myed par lus dang gnas thob pa'i dbang thob pa/ bdud kyi gnas tshad myed pa dang bar du gcod pa thams cad shin tu rab tu rtogs pa/ sems can thams cad kyi don thams cad thob par bya ba'i thabs sgrub pa shes pa/ nges par 'byung ba thams cad
82a8(1): zhes pa'i gobs chen po thob pa/ mu stegs can gyi smra ba thams cad zlog pa la khas pa// rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos/ skye 'ophal po che de bar bsdu ba la 'khas pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa chen po sgoms pas rnal 'byor nga chen gyi/ 
82a9(1): rnam pa thabs cang thob pa/ nam kha lta bu 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mgos pa shasag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' dad pa thogs myed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dri ma myed dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang 'artsi
82a10(1): dang / byang du ba mas dpa da pa datu zu pa dang / bya chub sebs dang 'dra bad gangs dang / byang chub sems dpa da pa mnyams dang / byang chub sems dpa da pa phyin po dang / byang dub sem sa sa da pa sa ma
82b1(1): dang / byang chub sems dpa' dad pa la yid gnyis myi za ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhal myed khang de yang thob par 'gyur na/ gang dag 'di la de bzhin nyid du sbyong bar byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa
82b2(1): kun dgal thos 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa dang / klog pa dang / yi gang 'dri ba dang / 'dond pa dang / nyan pa dang / kha tor bgying pa dang / gzhan drug la yang rgya cher
82b3(1): stond pa phang/ tshul bzhin sems dpa' dang / skom pa'i rnam par skyong ba de dag bsod nams ci tsam skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas rtsald pa/ kun dag lo gang la la dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa dang / klos pa dang / 
82b4(1): yi ger 'dri ba dang / nyan pa dang / 'don pa dang / kha tor byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya med yang dag par rab tu sond pa dang / tshul bzhin sems pa dang / sgom ba'i rnam par spyod pa de dag ni bsod na pas gang la/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod
82b5(1): nams kyi rnam pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams 'jig rten las 'das la rnam pa thams cad kyis dper yang myi bzod pa de lta bu'i sod nams skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga'o// 
82b6(1): 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams tshad myed pa gang yin pa de yang rgyu dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i sdug sngal gyi bden pa dang / kun 'byung gi bden par smras pa'i phyir 'dod pa nyid yongs su grub pa ma yin te/ de ni rgyu zad de 'bras bu phyung bar myi rtag pa'o// kun na/ 
82b7(1): bo nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yin pa de yang / rgya che ba ma yin zhing don chung la zad par 'gyur ro// de la rgya che ba ma yin pa ni theg pa dman pa la gnas shing dmyigs te yid la byed pa'i
82b8(1): bying do// dor chung ba ni bdag nyid rjes su 'dzinang par nye bar gnas pa'i 'gyur ba ni/ phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su zad par 'gyur ba'i phyir/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' rnams
82b9(1): gyi theg pa chen po la dad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams de ni yongs su grub pa/ rgyu zad pa ma yin pa rgya che ba ma yin pa zad par myi 'gyur ba'o// / de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po yang las
83a1(1): ni 'byung ba'i bsor nams de la ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsod nams kyis dper yang myi bzod do// kun dga' thos gas yang ba bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mying ci lag ma 'i 'do lta chung
83a2(1): bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bas rtsalang ba/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di theg pa chen po la dang pa rab tu sgom pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ theg pa chen po la rang ba 'jug pa zhes bya bar yang nuH na then
83a3(1): pa chen po la dad pa rnam par bye ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig/ theg pa chen po la dad pa nges par 'byung ba zhes bya b.rayang zungs shig/ de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs theb pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa zhes
83a4(1): bya ba'i tshig gla dgas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sa la pa// byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad/ d+hedang ldan pa'i khong re dag dang / lnga dang / myi dang / lha ma yin dang // dri zad bcas pa'i 'jig rten
83a5(1): bcom snan das kyis gsungs pa la ying rang ste/ mngon par ma // 'phags pa theg pa chen pos dang pa rab tu thos pashes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdor// rdzogs s+ho/ rang zhus
83a6(1): 'phags pa chos thams cad rnam par gtar la phab pa bstan ba/ lha'i bu rab thal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pachen po'i spyana'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 
83a7(1): ga rten gyims gnad dgaras 'dram pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sang brag rab tu mang ba dang / gzugs ma thu skyed pa dngo 'dod pa rung ba'i ba'i burnams dang / delas ga'as ba'i lha'i durnams/ 
83a8(1): tshu rgyal po rgya ma tshoms brdzogs pad+ma la'ong mang po rnams dang / gad byin kyi rgyal po ku Te dra ma sogs pa gnong spyan kyi thong mang be rnams dang / nam blded gi rgyal ze mangs can lathos le la nam 'khri ni cing ma
83b1(1): rnams dang / rnam yi bye dbang po smras can masogs pa lham mid kyi 'a rnams dang / phyi'am tha'i rgyal ze ston pa sa bags pa myi ma mang ma po rnams dang / na bye chen po'i dbang posag sadas la mchogs pa ste phyi na/ 
83b2(1): ba'i khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po'i bzhini byeng dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po rgya byed ska'i bu song phrag mang ba'i 'ang dang bcas pa dang / phyi mched kyi bdan po tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lnga'i bu 'bum phrag du ma tsho
83b3(1): dang bcas pa dang / rgyal po sa rgyal khong song srog du ma dang bcas pa dang / khyim bdag 'gon byed zas sbyin khrod dang bcas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ re dag la gatshogs pa Shar bzhi mang po rnams kyis ske da cing 'dun gyis ltal te chom no/ 
83b4(1): de'i de 'jam dpal gno nung byung pa yong de nyid du 'dus lang byung sa nas 'dug no// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zan byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byir myi ljon pa/ rab sA la sems kyang
83b5(1): 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu ras thal sems kyis khong phal po cher 'dra bar rig nas spyan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa cig tu bza rang nas pus mo g.yas pa lha nga sa la bcugs te/ bcom
83b6(1): ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gtso lang ngo // bcom ldan 'das ci ltang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog paShuhA
83b7(1): lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po batham pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtam pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa lags/ ji ltar ma
83b8(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyi chags pa ma mchis par sbyong ba lags/ ji lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba lags/ ji ltang na byang chub sems dbu' sems
83b9(1): po sa sarnas/ dris kyang chu ma pa 'a phes sa dpa zhin pams papa bya chu sems dpa bam
83b10(1): rtend pa lags// ji gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams/ 
84a1(1): chos smra ba lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka'
84a2(1): pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba lags/ ri ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi chos rgyad kyis myi gos pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub seMs/ 
84a3(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rting rapa ga dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la 'khas pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
84a4(1): po 'dus ma byas dang 'dres pas rnam par tha dad pa'i sgor zhugs pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshad bcad pa'i slad du snrel gzhi du sbrebs pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dngagra
84a5(1): chen po las kyi dkyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la 'khas pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lte ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'khas pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po
84a6(1): sems can yongs su sminang par bgyi ba dag la thabs la 'khas pa lagasaji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yo/ su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sos
84a7(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'bras pa'i sems ma mchil shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa lags/ ji lta bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu sor ba lags
84a8(1): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar rdzo ba lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dra ba 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltang na byang chub
84a9(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog rags thams cad kyis sngags par 'gyur ba lags pa/ ji lda na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge' ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbas ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltang ma bya
84a10(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug dang ldan pa legs/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
84b1(1): sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la slong dpon du gyung da pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad tu khan ma thogam mchis shing yod tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa lags/ de skad ces gco/ 
84b2(1): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rlung bral sems la 'di skad ces bka' bas yang to// rab rgyal sems legs so legs so// lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po 'jig rten thams cad la
84b3(1): mngon par 'phags pa/ 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren pa/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/ skal ba grangs myed bar go cha bgos pa/ rtson 'grus shin tu rten pa// deng sngon chen po/ sems can dpag tu myed pa'i don byed pa/ sems can dpag tu myed pa/ 
84b4(1): thang 'di pa la rab tu bgod pa la/ mkhas pa yon dpag tu myed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don tu / de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so// lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpal
84b5(1): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis de dag dang / yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag kyang thob/ par 'gyur ba/ ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// lha'i bu rab thal sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no zhes gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
84b6(1): ltang slar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' sa lang to// lha'i chu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs pan
84b7(1): mkhas pa mngon par sgrub pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i byams pa dang / don dang chos mngon par sgrub pa'i yobs pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga ste/ lha'i bu byang chub
84b8(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bani po de dag dang ldan na theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// thabs la khas pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i/ mngon sum shes rab rtogs par khong du/ 
84b9(1): chud gyur da cing / thams cad skyab phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la/ gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par sgrub par byed gyu la// don dang chos la shinang tu khas par gyudad pa'i// so so yang dag rig la spobs pa thob gyur da la// 
84b10(1): byang chub lam la mngon shes dag gis rnam par nyin/ des ni gzhan gyi dring la 'jog par myi 'byung ngo // sna'i byang chub sems dpa' sems 'da' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// snyam pa thams cad la rtson 'grus rtan pa/ 
85a1(1): yin te/ bani gang zhe na/ byir myi blogs pon 'grus dang / bams 'das pas le drolang nonod pa dang / byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sgrub pa la ying skyo ba myed pa dang ldan pa ste/ lha'i bu byangan
85a2(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ pham pa thams cad la tshon 'grus rtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sngon 'grus rten zhing bar du gnas pa myed gyu rad cing // bsam pa rnyog pa myed ni
85a3(1): yongs su dag gyur da la/ sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing / sangs rgyas chos rnams 'dod cing rtag tu skyo ba myed/ gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyad par de yod pa// de ni byang chub lam du nges 'byung rtan 'gyur/ 
85a4(1): zhing / byang chub yan lag lag thil bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur la// ring po kyi thogs 'jig rten yum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags
85a5(1): pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la 'doms par byed pa dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems skyed pa de dag byang chub tu sems skyed du 'jug pa dang / du sum yongasu
85a6(1): sngo zhing sprul pa dang 'dra ba dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas dge' ba'i snga pa thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang spang / de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ khas pa gang dag shes rab pha rolang/ 
85a7(1): phyi nang 'doms shing // byang chub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzin de 'jug byed lagang dag byang chub zhugs pas dus sum yid rang zhing // yid dang ma bral stsa la 'dra byang chub 'dod byed la/ dga' ba gang yin cung
85a8(1): zad byed pa thams cad ni/ thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la rtog par byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ye shes kyis chags pa myed par spyod pa yin te/ 
85a9(1): bzhi gang zhe na/ ye shes kyis byas pa'i bya ba byed cing nga rgyal gyis byas pa myi byed pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen la rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa byed la/ gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul du gyurd cing
85a10(1): sems can thams cad myi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing skye mched drug yongs su shes pa srung ba se// thob bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya sa// shes pam las byas
85b1(1): pa rgya mang byeng zhib nyen palas pa ga shes byed pa/ mang nyid kyi sus de sems byan shing / sa bkums pa 'das gi dbyis gdas babyed/ mas gcan pa del tu
85b2(1): be shes pas pa ros byin bcing rnam pa byed spyod pa yid// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen ze zam bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi mun pa dang bras pa yin te/ bzhi ga she de/ thas pas ngoms pa byed cing tshul bzhin kyi
85b3(1): rab tu sbyong ba dang / zang zing skyed pa'i sems kyis chos gnod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyed myed pa'i phyir shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sdu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul cig la 'jug pas tshus thams cad kyi 'jug pa la
85b4(1): 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag thos chos ngoms myed tshul bzhin rtog myed cing // de mnam sonod cing klog 'dzin rnyed pa chol myi byed/ nyon mongs sprin du spu ma rmi lam lta bur lta// chos nyid tha dad
85b5(1): myi byed de dag tshul cig 'jug/ che bdag chos bzhi de send khyang par thob gyur zhing / zhes rab skyon 'dras sun pas lang bA ltar 'jig rten rgyu// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan du khong nas
85b6(1): kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos thams cad 'dzind pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams cad la bdag myed pa ston/ 
85b7(1): pa'i snying rje chen po dang / btud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi go cha bgos pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ chos kun chud myi za ba'i gzungs thob cing / re nga
85b8(1): spogs ldan sems cad the tsom gcod par byed// snying rjes chos 'di thams cad dpag skyed stonod byed cing // mngon shes d+ma'i 'gogro bos nyon mongs bdud myi nyams/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi de dag gis 'jug ni// khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jigs pa/ 
85b9(1): byed/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// thos pas don la btond pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ zlos pa thams cad myi 'dzind pas thos pa dang kyi ldan zhing / bsgrubs pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs su spong
85b10(1): pa dang / yi ge dang sgra dang / smad dang tshig gi lam thams cad mngon par shes par bya ba'i phyir brag cha ltang mnyam pa nyidid khong du chud pa dang // don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa yongs su tshol zhing dga' bkur bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / rjod du myed pa'i don la 'jug
86a1(1): cing rjod pa'i don la ma yin te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya 'o// ci tsam mang du thos pa don la myi rtogs pas/ byis pa thos dang myi ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams/ srid sum sgra skad dbyangs dang tshig
86a2(1): las gang yod pa khrags krizhes de las don ldan smrathos nas/ don nyid rtogs shing dga' mthus tes kun byid kyi 'jug/ chos nyid 'dini don mchog yin te thong du byed/ 'dir dor dang sgra ma thob par gyung pa las// 
86a3(1): 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bar 'gyur// lha'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang / ldan na 'jig rten gyis tshul gyis chos la btonod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'du 'di'i gtab mer ba rnams la chos sodang
86a4(1): pa dang / skye bo phal po che 'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / rtong pa chen po dag la rjes su yang dran zhing byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / 'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gzhol ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya
86a5(1): ste// gang tshe skye bo mang po'i nang du son gyur ba// der ni khas pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye bo mang po 'dus par gyurang ba'i tshogs rnams la/ 'chi bar gyur pa'i 'du shes rnam par sgom par bya/ 
86a6(1): ni bas yod gzhan gyi gtong la rnam lnga'i/ gtong la yid rang bya'i byang chub/ sngo bya zhing / gang che 'du 'dzi dag dang brang bar gyur pa'i tsheder ni 'dren par gzhol bar rab tu 'dod par bya/ lha'i bu byung // 
86a7(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs bzhin du smra ba yin te/ bzhi gde zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems myi gtong ba dang / thos pa la nan tan snying por
86a8(1): 'dzinang pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang // rang bzhin gyis bdag myed pa la 'jug pa ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyam nga gnod par gyurd kyang byang chub sems myi gtong // de dag
86a9(1): skyob pa'i chos thos nan tan snying por byed// bka' blo bde'i 'thun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ mkhas pa drag rang bzhin bdag myed chos kun 'jug/ de ltar byon pa'i shes ldan smra bzhin byed gyur nga zhing / rtag bcom gyi
86a10(1): 'byod myi 'dor rjes mthun bdag myed ci yang myed// rtag tu snyanang pa'i phreng ba phyogs bcud grags gyurang zhing / de ltar chos smra de dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags/ lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po cho
86b1(1): bzhi dang ldan na// sems can rnams la chos smra ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid sgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos sond pa dang / bdag nyid dul ba dang / srungs pa dang / grol ba dang btul ba dang / 
86b2(1): yangs su mya ngan las 'das zhing sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang bsrung ba dang / dkrol ba dang / gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i bying ches gnod par byed pa dang /  bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa
86b3(1): byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyu dad cig/ sems can rnams kyang theg pa chen po la rab tu 'god par byed pa dang / bangag nyid chos 'dod cing chos 'dod pas// gzhan dag la yang sa/ rang bar byed pa se/ chos bzhi pa de dag dang po de la
86b4(1): 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgrub pa'i snying por byed cing 'gro la chos ston la/ dul srungs grol btul shi nang tu mya ngan 'das nas kyang / gang dag ma dul ma srungs ma grol ma tul zhing / mya ngan ma 'das de dag dkon mchog
86b5(1): chos 'jug byed// de dag byang chub sems la bsam pa des gyurd cing // / theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang 'god par byed/ rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan bla ma gus byed cing / sems can rnams la 'ang de
86b6(1): dang mthun pa'i chos rnams sonod // lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// mngon pa shes pa rnamasamangon par 'phags pa yin te/ bzhi gang she na/ yang dang yang tu/ 
86b7(1): tshangs pa'i gnas pa gni gnas pa dang / rtag par rgyun tu rab tu dben par gnas pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa dang / lus deng sems la gtam pa nyid du shes pa/ chos bzhi po de dag dang po// de la 'di skad ces bya ba te/ tshangs pa'i
86b8(1): gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing / dben par gnas pa la dga' ba skyed byed dang / shes pa zab mo'i bzod pa nges par thob gyurar cing / mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur da pa ste// de ltar mngon par thon pa'i
86b9(1): 'jigs pa myed pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par 'phags gyurd cing // de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi mngon sum gnas 'dra la/ sems can mang po rnams kyang yongs su smin byed 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub
86b10(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshom bani dang ldan na/ bdud thams cad kyis thub pa dka' ba yin te/ ngazhi gang zhen/ stong pa nyid kyis mngon pang sgrubs pa'i bsam gnyen bani dang / sems can thams cad kyi rtong pa'i snying rje re
87a1(1): po// dkon cog gsum gyi gdung myi gcod pa'i thon 'grus dang / thabs la 'khas par mngon par sgrubs pa'i pha rold tu phyidang pa drug te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshad myed song pas nges par bsam gtan pa ni spos
87a2(1): zhing // sems can yongs su skyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan/ dkom chog sum rgyun myi gcod por 'grus thob gyu da cing / kun tu thabs ldan pa rol phyi nang pa drug la 'jug// de ltar spyod 'khas blo ldan che bdag yid gzhungs pa// de dag/ 
87a3(1): bdud bzhi dag las yang dag 'das gyurd cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zind pa'i 'gro ba 'gon myed rnams// mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i lam la 'god par byed/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chom bzhin
87a4(1): dang ldan na/ blos rting dpag dka' ba yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang / don dang ldan zhing snyend par dka' ba dang / rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang / sems kyi ye shes sgrib pa myed pa la/ sems kyis
87a5(1): nges par rtogs par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya/ ste/ chos tshul zab mo dag la zhugs par gyudad pa dang / rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyend par dka' gyur nga la/ rtag tu yid byang chos la bsam pa
87a6(1): mgyu cig/ sams kyi sa nges pa rtog pa byed pags yi/ sa brtse pa ches tan pa gsos pa/ thon pa dag pangangs gyu / sa pa skyed pa'i gas pa/ 
87a7(1): dag grub byed pas// de phyir blo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi chos rgyad kyis myi gos pa yin te ho/ bzhi gang zhe na/ rnyed pa dang stanang pa dang
87a8(1): bstod pa dang / bde bas khengs pa myed pa dang / ma snyed pa dang myi snyanang pa dang / spang ba dang spyag sngal gyis zhum pa myed pa dang / sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par byed pa dang / phung po yongasu shes pa srung zhing dben
87a9(1): par lta ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ snyed dang snyan dang stod dang bde ba kun thob kyang // de dag la ni rnams kyang khengs par 'gyur ba myed/ ma snyed myi snyan smad dang sdug sngal thob gyur da kyang // de dag pade ma bzhin du chags myed
87a10(1): ga nyid kyang / sems can spyod pa tu bying dung thoso ma spyon cing / bung ba phyug gsags 'anas sa rta shes pa// sems ca par do do da jig rten myong byed kyang / 'ji na can kyis byonapa mu sa khrims supa dang 'as/ shA bu byang chub semapa ma
87b1(1): sesems dpa' chen po tshos pa ni dang ldan na/  / gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la baspyod pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe ma/ bdag la bdag skyed pa dang / sems can la sem sa myed pa dang / chos dben pa dang / ye shes chags pa myed pa steste/ chos pa'i po de dag dang po rje de la 'di skang
87b2(1): ces byas te/ bdag la bdag nyid tu yongs su shes gyur cing // sems can sems can myed par yang rjes su rtogs gyur nga la/ chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing / ye shes kha la chags pa yod sbyin pa'i// dpa' rnam
87b3(1): bab po dag la yongs su spyod byed la/ spyod pa myed la nag tu spyod par byed gyudad cing / 'dzin dang kun 'dzi nang dang rnam bral bas/ sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'/ bya/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
87b4(1): chos stond pas dbang po mkhas pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / shes rab rno ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya / 
87b5(1): mngon par shes pa rnams ni rab tu thob gyu rad cing // shes pas so so yang dag rig pa myi zad 'gyur// rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyurd cing sngon yang ni/ yang dag bsags pa yongs su dag pa thob gyur da la// sems can rnams kyi
87b6(1): dbang po yongs su shes byas nas// de dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams yongs su gnod par khyed// de dag pas nang pa 'bras bu myed pa ma yin te/ de phyir mya ngan 'das nas mya ngan 'ang bar byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' na
87b7(1): sems dbang chen tha chas pani dang ldan na/ 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas nas pa tha dad dang skong zhugs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ song ba nyid skyod yul du gyur nga zhing lta ba'i ching bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams tha rang bar byed pa nga
87b8(1): mtshan pa myed pa la gnas shing rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das par byed pa dang // smon pa myed pa la gnas shing sems can yongs su spyod par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba len pa dang / thabs la khas shing shes rab
87b9(1): kyis nges par byung ba ste/ chos bani pode dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong nyid spyod yul de dag lhas bcings grol byed cing / mtshan myong gnas shing sems can 'di dag yongs sbyi byed/ smonang pa phyed la gnas shing
87b10(1): sems cad smin par bya ba'i phyir// bsams bzhin skye zhing gang tu 'dod pa der skyer 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis nges 'byung nam tha da sgor gnas kyang / 'dus ma byas pa'i dbyings ni dus myin thob myi byed/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' seMs
88a1(1): ras mam tsha pa bani nga 'ad/ smras pa dang rgyal ma chang ba'i byed// ldel gning spangs pa sa mams pa yin te/ bzhig sher/ tshes kyi byi sa dun nas nosang dag pa shes pa dang / sgrib pa byed pa'i chom lam med sa ma
88a2(1): pa dang / kun tu rtog pa'i lta ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rang bzhin can kyi chos thams cad la ne sa drung byed pa se// chos bzhi po dri ngag dang ngo // / de la 'di dang ces bya ste/ sems gtam chos kyi dbyings su res
88a3(1): par 'byung 'gyur cig/ de dag rnams kyi sgrib pa 'ga' yang mthong myi 'gyur/ nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i pha lam rab byung ba// shes nas de la snrel gzhi kun tu son myi byed/ chos 'di thams cad dang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang // ma skyes ma 'gags ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa yin/ 
88a4(1): de dag kun khyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das gyur da nas/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal tshad gcod byed yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la 'khas pa yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ long pa spyod chen po
88a5(1): rgyu sbyin pa myi spong ba dang // mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyu tshul khrims myi spong ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa myi song ba dang / bral ba'i rgyu sgom pa myi spong ba se/ chos ba'i po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ba/ yo tsud che tu spyi
88a6(1): ba myi spong de'i 'bras bu de mtho ris skye rgyu tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bras bu de/ shes rab nyon mongs byed rgyu de'i 'bras bu de/ rnam grol reg rgyu sgo bar byed cing de'i 'bras bu de// rgyu bzhir de la rtag thon 'khas pa de dag ni
88a7(1): byang chub snying por dbang skud 'bras phyir mtshan pyod/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rte nad cing 'bre lang bar 'byung ba la 'khas pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba
88a8(1): yin pa dang / rtag par smra ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa byung na rga shi'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta ba par yang myi byed pa dang / ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi bir du 'gags par lta zhing srid pa 'gog par yang myi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang / 
88a9(1): / de la 'di skad ces bya ste// nam yang rtag par myi lta chad par ltung myi byed// des ni chos rnams rkyen byung byed pa po dang ni// tshor ba po myed rang bzhin rnam par dag par shes/ ma rig phra las rga shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba // rgyal ba/ 
88a10(1): kun gyis gsungs te de 'gags rgyu dang ni rkyen zad de phyir byin chad skye myi 'gyur zhes gsungs// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po chos bzhi rtsa dang ldan pa/ sems can yongs su smonang pa dag la thabs 'khas pa/ 
88b1(1): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems can thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang / dge' ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsags par la yongs su skyo ba myed pa dang / 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su tshol ba dang // sems can nas
88b2(1): kyi mos pa ci lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa thabs kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing nyon mos pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la rten/ dgel ba mchogs
88b3(1): shing 'dod pas yongs su skyob byed/ 'thang ba'i sgonas mya ngan las 'das yongs tshol zhing / sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shes/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi bldanan / bsam pa yongs
88b4(1): dag pas rtul zhugs grub pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// zhe 'gras pa'i sems myed cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
88b5(1): drapa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba
88b6(1): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ long spyod myi zad pa dang / chos stond pa myi zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / sems sa dang mnyam pa ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag rnams kyi
88b7(1): long skyong rtag tu myi zad cing / rtag tu chos kyis myi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag mngon shes lnga po myi zad rtag myi g.yo'o// rtag tu dran ldan bsam pa sa dang 'dra ba yin/ mnyam myed byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur nga
88b8(1): cing / mya ngan ma 'das gang la chos rnams de yod pa// de dag 'gro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur// byang chub mchog phyir myu rab tu nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na
88b9(1): 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis smra ba dang / bden pa bzhis shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa dang / chol bzhi po de dag dang ngo // 
88b10(1): de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis gnas byed cing / sbu pa'i dngos po dag la rtag tu dga' byed pa/ bden pa ba'i po dag la 'jigs myed dpa'o rnams// 'gro bas ri mor byas shing mchod pa byas pa 'gyur
89a1(1): ma 'das sa pa'i ba / ra ga pa na tu byos sa pa su da// de phyi ga rgyug
89a2(1): nub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan ma/ sreg chags thams cad kyis sngags par 'gyur ba yin te/ ba'i gang zhe na/ thos pa dang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing tshul ros pa byed pa dang / des shing 'grogs dbad ba/ 
89a3(1): bden pa la dga' zhing dbang po srung ba dang / bdag nyid bde bas sdig par chags pa myed cing rtag tu kha ni ma tho bar lta ba se// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa'i yon tan thob cing rdul khrims pha ro lang
89a4(1): sonod/ rdul chos skyed cing rtag tu des la btus zhugs pazang / nags dbu nags 'dab 'azang zhing dbring ba snom byed la/ dras ldan bdag pade kyi ltos khan mthos// gangs rtag tu dga' pa'i yod tu de song ba/ rang du tu sems na/ 
89a5(1): byi bying rtsor 'gyung zhing / de dag sems can don mang rtag tu byed gyu la/ de dag rtag tu byang du ba pyid yang yid gnos 'byung // lha'i bu byang chub sems dra pa'i sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na dge' ba'i spyod pa thams cad
89a6(1): kha smas pa myed pa yin te// bzhi gang zhe na/ dad pa dang ldan pa 'am/ kha rtsos 'grus dang ldan pa dang / snying rje chen po dang / ldan pa dang / dge' ba theg pa chen por yongs su sngo ba se/ chos bzhi po de dag dang
89a7(1): de la 'di skad ces bya ste// de dag dang ldan pa rol gnon pa brtan ldan zhing // de dag brtson 'grus mthu dang sobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun lo byams dang snying rje che ldan zhing // dge' ba byang chub yongs su sngo bar
89a8(1): byed pa ste// de phyir dge' ba kun la smras pa yod myin zhing // zla ba nya ba'i zla ba mkha' la skad ma'i// tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pa ltar// yang dang yang tu dge' ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur// lha'i bu
89a9(1): byang chub skyes srims dpa' chen po chos bani dang ldan na// shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhes/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / nan tan snying por byed pa dang / blo rab tu gnas pa dang / lhag
89a10(1): bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa dang / chos bzhi po de dag go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mkhas pa de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed/ de dag nan tan snying por byed cing bro rab gnas/ gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje lta bu'i// 
89b1(1): lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur/ 56/ mkhas pa gang dag chos bzhi de dag se nang byed na/ de dag rtag tu dge' ba'i gshes gnyen rten byed cing // dam bcas rnams la snying por sgrub par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu bAs/ 
89b2(1): rgyal gsung yang 'dzidzi par byed pa yid// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mam bzhi dang ldan na/ chos la dbang sbyang bas dbang phyug dang ldan pa yin te// bani gang zhe na/ yogs kyi thobs dang ldan zhing nyon mongs
89b3(1): gobs myed pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur zhing bdud kyis dbang sgyung ba myed pa dang / gzungs dang spros pa dang ldan pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos sonod par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag yen la 'as
89b4(1): ldan nyon mongs dbang mya 'gro// stobs kyis thun spangs lha rnams kun dang bral / sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud bzhi spangs gyur da ya/ sobs la rten par 'gyur zhing gzungs kyis 'khrug pa myed/ de dag stonod pa 'bras bu
89b5(1): myed par myed par myi 'gyur te/ de phyir myung tu dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la slob pon du gyur da pa yin te/ 
89b6(1): ni gang zhe na/ dargyal byed pa dang / bla ma la gus pa dang / bag yod pa dang 'dun pa drag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag go// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de rgyal skyed cing bram bus pas gnas kyung ngas/ 
89b7(1): kun nas bag yod byang chub mchog la 'dun drag cing / bsam pa thag pas smond cing rtag tu dran gyung da la/ slob pon dpe' khyud myed pa rtag tu spem pon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don 'khas shing
89b8(1): tshul dang tshul ma yin la khas pa'i rten pa rnams// 'jig rten kun mdza thams cad rtog par khong du chung // de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sprar de la 'dud/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos pa ni dang ldan ma
89b9(1): thams cad du kha na ma tho ba myed cing yon tan rnam pa thams cad ldan pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par bache ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa dang spobs pa dang / dge' pa thams cad dang myi bral zhing bag chags
89b10(1): dang bral ba dang / dga' ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing dbang skur ba thob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag drang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes shes pas rkye nadagabade gshegs kun kyi dgongs pa
90a1(1): mangs 'i rjes sa nga/  ldas bags byed byi yag kun las / deb sa na ning bang kur ba par gyus pa'o/ sa dbu 'a de ga pa'i sa tugs su rnyeng
90a2(1): na ma kyis shi gyungs pa di pa sa ru ses skyed // 
90a3(1): skyed mtsham la bzod parab pa lus// gdang byirnams kyi skye bu'i las sa gonan pa 'dus ni rnam 'ams ca tu kyi dul byed ci dri ma dang thal banas pa da go//  sus tu gang chen pa'i gten gyi ba'i ma
90a4(1): rlub tu rangatug ma zhing / 'jig rte na thams cad snang bachen pos byam par yang gyur to// skarnams kyis kyang lha'i kye tog gi ra rab tu labacing / lha'i mis snyan dag gi sgra yang byung bar gyu dad to// 6/ lda rnams kyis kyang lha tog gi char rab tu 'ab
90a5(1): A sgrim gan dag gi sgra yang byung bar grus to// surnams kyis kyang me tos dam da'o nga / klu'i me tog gi chang rab tu bda'o// lA ma yin dang / rnam tha snying dang / mu~M'i ma ni dang/  phyi chen po dang / mnod sbyin rnam sa kyis kyi
90a6(1): bcom ldan 'das la skra'i mchod pa dag gis mthos par byas so// zams cad dang lda pa'i khang rnams kyis kyang / me ma'i chos mgo sos/ e ma'ochos / zhes pan sum bu mched du rjod pa rje
90a7(1): tu rjod nas/ mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so//  de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum bcu rtsa gnyis pa de dag don da
90a8(1): tshigarnam par snyan la dbab par bstand pa de bka' bas lad kyis/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang chos sum bcu pa nyis po de dag gi don dang / rig rnam par sa nad la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
90a9(1): sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa yin/ 'dam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi rkyend kyis myi 'gro ba de ltar na/ lha bu byang chub sems
90a10(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring myi 'jog pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin// 'jam dpal
90b1(1): gis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi re byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms pa de ltar de ltar ma/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bathams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no// lha'i/ 
90b2(1): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa yin/ 'jam dpa' gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings
90b3(1): myi g.yo ba rjes su rtog pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis
90b4(1): chags pa myed par 'apyod ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad la chags par myi byed pa de ltar ma/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes kyi
90b5(1): chags pa myed par spyod pa yin no// lha'i bus smras bya/ 'jam dpal ji ltad / na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang byal ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ wA'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa
90b6(1): sems dpa' cher po/ chos thams cad rang bzhin kyis yongs su dag par shes pa byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' le'o sems dang chen po shes rab kyi mun pa dang bral ba yin/ lnga'i dus snyam pa
90b7(1): mdapa'a'i gang dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ze 'bang rnams kyi du 'jigs pa dang bras ba yid/ 'jam dpal gyis sgras bA/ gA'i bu ni ngag ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//  thams cad ma
90b8(1): khyer phyi byed pa byed par snang nga/ rnam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen mo gakhong nams kyi rang du 'dzinas pa dang thas payin no'i snyi bu sgrub pa'i/ 'angam dpe dri ga nga byung dub sems dbang sems dpa sem mthas pas
90b9(1): das rtod pa med/ 'jam dngas kyis smras ze/ zhwa'i bu gang gi byang dub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ze chos thams cad rjod du myed pa shes par byed pa de ltang na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po nga sa ra
90b10(1): no// gsus me ga nga byung chub sems dpa byam pa dpa dzin pa ter gyi nas kyim chos pa shed padzin/ 'jam pa sa kyi sla ba lu sa mis byang du ma sa pa
91a1(1): chos kyi dbyings ni ba nyid du shes par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rtond pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltad du/ byang chub sems dpa' tshe sad
91a2(1): dpa' chen po/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgra thams cad la rten par myi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu/ 
91a3(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen posangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin nono// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la cho ba smra
91a4(1): ba yin/ 'jas dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smra ba thams cad las ldog par byed pa de skad na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems cad rnams la chos zla
91a5(1): ba yin// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpal sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub seMs
91a6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad las g.yo bar myi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes/ pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pang yin no// lha'i bus
91a7(1): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul dka' ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs
91a8(1): par bya ba'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs su tshol ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na
91a9(1): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rting rtogs par
91a10(1): byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blos gting dpag dka' ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'o/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' ched po 'jig rten gyi chos rgyad kyis myi gos pa/ 
91b1(1): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis gos par myi 'gyur ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ 
91b2(1): 'jig rten gyi chos rgyad kyis rgyags pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dal gdag ning bag pa'i spyod pa yin 'das dpal gri'i smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
91b3(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo bdag la bdag myed skyid lug par myi 'gyur ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa spang ba rabs ji ltang ba/ 
91b4(1): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos stond pas dbang po la khas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta ba na byang nga chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pa/ 
91b5(1): rnam par tha dad pa'i sgor zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgo thams cad nas tha dad par sond par byed pa de dag na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems
91b6(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par tha rad pa'i sgor zhugs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar bcad pa'i phyir snrel gzhi sgrub pa la 'khas pa yin
91b7(1): Shangam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dang gi me byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa chol zhing lta bar byedas/ mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'ong ba cos zhing lta bar byed pa de snyan/ snyi'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems / 
91b8(1): chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal char bcad pa'i phyir snrel gzhi sgrubs pa la 'khas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyis rgyu la 'khas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras
91b9(1): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad myi 'pho bar lta ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la 'khas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
92a1(1): ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brelang par 'byung ba sa 'thab pa 'a/ 'das dpas kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' cher po chos thams cang
92a2(1): bdag po myed par shes par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la khas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so/ 
92a3(1): dpa' chen pos sems can yongs su smind par bya ba dag la thabs 'khas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul la smon par myi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang
92a4(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smind par bya ba dag la thabs 'khas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas rtul
92a5(1): zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su
92a6(1): dag par rtu la zhugs grub pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i seMs myed cing bzod pa'i go'os dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
92a7(1): ba pa/  bu gang gi'i byang chub ma pa ses rang sen po rnam pa nga btan du mangs su mya ngarnams 'das pa shes par byed pa de skad du/ sa cu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po ni 'gras pa'i
92a8(1): byed cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyinang pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// 
92a9(1): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyind pa thams cad kyi pha rold tu sond pa yin/ lha'i bus
92a10(1): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba'i yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sna'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi
92b1(1): zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed pa de ltar sa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig/ 
92b2(1): rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi spang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sdang ba de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang
92b3(1): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa de/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis sngags par 'gyur
92b4(1): ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'ga' yang len par myi byed// song bar myi byed pa de ltar na lha'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags
92b5(1): thams cad kyis sngags par 'gyur ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jamadapal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgelapa'i spyod pa thams cad la smas pa myed pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
92b6(1): smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnamatshang nam khwa dang chungs gnyam par shes par byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge' ba'i spyod pa thams cad/ tha
92b7(1): marnam pa skyed pa yin no// sna'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyu dad pa yin/ 'jas dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi che byang chub sems dbu'
92b8(1): sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings 'byed par myi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab gang la snying por gyurd pa yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub ses
92b9(1): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sa dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam du myed pa sems pas sems thams cad shes
92b10(1): pa byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyung bas dbang phyug dang ldan pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad sa
93a1(1): tho bar du ldan pa yin/ 'jas dpas kyis smras pa/ kwa'i bu gang gi ni byang chub sems dpa sems dpa'i chen po chus cis gis nus thams cad shes par byed cing / tshul thams cad kyis kyang dub cig zhes par byed pa
93a2(1): de ltar na/ lha'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la sratho bon du gyu dad pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa ni 'jam dpal ji ltang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha ra ma tho ba myed/ 
93a3(1): cing yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad gnyen po byed par rtogs nas chos 'ga' yang sgrub par myi byed chos 'ga'
93a4(1): yang seyang bar myi byed pa de ltar na/ lha'i bu byang chub bems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba myed cing / yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bas nang ba 'di bshad/ 
93a5(1): ba na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'i rgya dong gis myi skye ba'i chos la lung bas nad pa la bzod pa thob par gyu dang to// sgra dang kyi rnams kyi skyo dgul bdun khri nyis song ni chos la chos kyi myig rdus myed cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par
93a6(1): sa ba dubs pas kyi ba ma bye sa pangs 'jo na chub ba sem pa skyed pa/ 'am dpal babe du na bas 'dod pa'i phyi na das kyis kyang zhi gi ba blangs su / 
93a7(1): lha'i me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu phab bo// thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor rnam sa kyis kyanga'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur du bas bas nad pa 'di tho sa nas yid rangs pa dang / dga' ba dang bde ba skyes nas/ 
93a8(1): tshig 'di skad ces bdag chag gis kyang chos de dag thob par gyurd cig/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa'i spobs pa ci lta ba de lta bu'i spobs pa myi mched pa yang thob par gyur rad cig ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
93a9(1): kyang 'jam dpal gno rur gyurd pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam par snyanang la dbab pa snyan pa 'di legs par smra ste/ logs so legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de ras lha'i bu rab thal sems kyis/ 'jam
93a10(1): dpal gzhon nur gyurd pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji khyod b+h+yo b+h+yo las dga' ba 'dod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu 'di skad du khyod chos kyi dga' ba 'dod dam zhes zer ba ni/ lnga'i bu legs
93b1(1): bang bdungs pa'i chos 'ayul ba 'di ma chos kyi dga' bzhes bya ba ni sred pa dang 'ad pa sangs pa nyid te/ rlom 'dzin ma ma rtogs pa skyed pa'i phying 'dod pa byed pa yin no// rom 'di byig gi lamasas yang dran pang 'du
93b2(1): pa'i phyir star skye snang ba yin no// chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa myed pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no// chos 'di ni yus drug rabs 'dres pa'i phyir myi mthong ba yin no// / chos 'di ni sems dang yid ngas/ rnam pa shes pa dang bral
93b3(1): ba'i phyir bdag gi ba myed pa'o// chos 'di ni rten pa yongs su ma grub pa'i phyir bzung ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul myed pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir kani myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben ba'i phyir zag
93b4(1): pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' nam pang dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag nam rlag pa'i phyir 'gro ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni da ltar byed pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir
93b5(1): gnas pa n+da no / chos 'di ni rtag cig selang ba dang bral ba'i phyir sgo skyeb myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni nama' dang gtam kha'i phyir gte ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni gnyen po byed pa'i phyir chu
93b6(1): gnan zhiding gnam pa' yod// chos 'di ni bdud kyi yul thams cad las yong dag par 'das pa'i phyir g.yo ba byed pa dang rlom sems myed ba dang / ma rtags pa dang / rnam par ma rtags pa dang ga rlo
93b7(1): par ma bsgrags pa dang / kun tu ma snyand pa yin no// chos 'di ni skye ba dang 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir blang ba myed pa dang dor ba myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir gnas myed pa gnas
93b8(1): pa yin no// chos 'di ni yang dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer myed pa yin no// chos pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa myed pa yino// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang bral ba yin rje/ 
93b9(1): chos 'di ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye ba bzhi ba'i yin no// chos 'di ni phas kyis rgol ba thams cad bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa skyed pa yin no// chos 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba'i phyir
93b10(1): shind tu 'phag sa pa yin no// chos 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi phyir spyod pa myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni nges par ma brtags pa'i phyir mtshan ma myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni rnam par shes pa myi gnas pa'i phyir smod pa myed pa
94a1(1): rnam par dag pa'i phyir bad// byed pa yin no// chos pade ni gtan mngor bar grub pa myed pa'i phyir sems can myed pa'i yin no// chom 'di ni bzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir rtag pa myed pa yin no// !/ chos 'di ni bzod pa ras pa skyes bzhi
94a2(1): ma byung ba yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid myed pa yin no// chos 'di ni bzod ma nas yang dag par rgyun rang pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no// 
94a3(1): chos 'di ni bzod ma nas nye bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad pa myed pa yin no// chos 'dzi ni myi byed pa dang myi ldan pa'i phyir nam kha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin no// lha'i bu chos de lta bu la chos kyi dgu sa ji lta bu zhig yod// lha'i
94a4(1): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'di'i dga' ba ni kun tu grol ba myed pa'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu legs so legs so// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ chos 'di'i dka' ba ni gang la lus dang ngag dang
94a5(1): mas kyi tho ma byed pa'i smra bu 'den/ 'i kyi shisanams de ni gsas pa zlom pa byed pa 'in pa par desems rlo na kyis mamed par myi nus pa'i byer ro// 'i bus smras pa
94a6(1): 'jam dpal ci ltar na sems rnyog pa can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gzugs kyi mtshan rjes su dran pas sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sgra dang skad dang dbyangs
94a7(1): dang tshig gi lam gyis chos rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'bras bu thob par mngon tu byed pas dge' 'dun rjes su dran par byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// nyon mongs pa rtan song ba rjes su
94a8(1): dran bar byed pa ni sems rnyog pa can yin do// skye ba la rten pas lha rjes su dran par byed par ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// spros pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// bdag tu 'dzimang pa lag
94a9(1): ba'i byams pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems la nges par ma rtags pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sems the tsom can gyi snying rje'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// mya ngan la/ 
94b1(1): dam pa'i yang nga byam pa'i dad pa'i sems na sem rnas pa ca yin no// gnyis sa 'dapa pa ma nan sumam pa na sems pam shin// sras su gas bas pa nan/ 
94b2(1): shes pa sa pa shes ngamasem pa sem sa / skye dang na par sa das par ba pa phyims rnaM sem pa slos mdzi'o// smras dang sems sa na pa lu
94b3(1): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang po mI ni sem sa ni sems rnyon pa can yin no/ lba ba'i sobs dang ldan pa'i sobo lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yang lan
94b4(1): gi sem ma ni sems rlog pa cad yin no// 'du byed yi la byed pa la ston pa'i las sgom pa'i sems na sems rlom pa cad yin no// sprug sngal sa nga yongs su rton pa'i 'du shes cad kyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can med do// ku
94b5(1): 'byung ba la sgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'gog pa la zang yang 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyon pa can yin no// lam la sgom par 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can
